**Adidas Fresh Endurance Men Roll-On 50ml** offers long-lasting freshness and effective odor protection for up to 72 hours. It features an invigorating scent with citrus notes, a vegan formula, and is dermatologically tested.  It's alcohol-free for sensitive skin.

**Adidas Ice Dive Men Shower Gel 400ml** is an invigorating shower gel that will leave you feeling refreshed all day long. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Adidas Ice Dive Men Shower Gel 400ml**: 
â­ Apply an appropriate amount to your hand or shower puff. 
â­ Massage your body using circular motions until a rich lather forms. 
â­ Rinse your body thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Adidas Ice Dive Men Shower Gel 400ml**:
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau

**Adidas Pro Invisible Men Roll-On 50ml** provides long-lasting freshness and effective odor protection for up to 48 hours. Its invigorating scent and alcohol-free, vegan formula is dermatologically tested and won't stain your clothes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Adidas Pro Invisible Men Roll-On 50ml**:
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Apply evenly to underarms, ensuring complete coverage.
â­ Allow to dry completely before dressing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Adidas Pro Invisible Men Roll-On 50ml**:
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau, Aluminum Zirconium Octachlorohydrex Gly, Glycerin, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Steareth-2, Steareth-20, Parfum/Fragrance, Sodium Benzoate, Chlorphenesin, Disodium EDTA, Tocopherol, Olus Oil/Vegetable Oil/Huile Vegetale

**Adidas Ice Dive Men Spray 150ml**, a refreshing body spray designed to keep you feeling fresh for up to 48 hours. Its invigorating scent, with woody and citrus notes, will boost your confidence and energy throughout the day. The vegan formula is gentle on your skin and won't stain your clothes, making it perfect for everyday use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Adidas Ice Dive Men Spray 150ml**:
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Hold the can 15cm from your body and spray evenly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Adidas Ice Dive Men Spray 150ml**:
â­ Butane-Isobutane-Propane

Developed with sports scientists, these high-impact formulas are designed to reinvent your daily care routine.  **Adidas Active Skin & Mind** shower gel, with its concentrated glycerol-hyaluronic complex, provides fast skin moisture recovery after cleansing. Dermatologically tested and free from sulfates, it has a clean and vegan formula suitable for all skin types, even sensitive ones. Committed to the planet, the formula is 98% biodegradable, and the bottle is 100% recycled (excluding additives, cap & label) and refillable.

description_en:
**Adidas Pre-Sleep Calm Women Shower Gel Refill 400 ml**, give exercise your best shot with the Adidas shower gel active skin & mind range. Developed together with sports scientists, the high-impact formulas are designed to reinvent your daily care routine. Active skin & mind pre-sleep calm essential oils shower gel helps to comfort your senses before bedtime thanks to its relaxing fragrance featuring lavender essential oil. The glycero-hyaluronic complex provides fast skin moisture recovery after cleansing. Committed to athletes, the shower gel is dermatologically tested & free from sulfate-based surfactants. The clean & vegan formula is suitable for even sensitive skin types. Committed to the planet, the formula is 98% biodegradable and the refill bag reduces plastic waste.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Adidas Pre-Sleep Calm Women Shower Gel Refill 400 ml**:
â­ Use **Adidas** shower gel on wet skin, then massage gently.
â­ During a hot shower, before rinsing, take a deep breath for 6 counts, hold for 4 counts, then exhale for 10 counts. Repeat 3 times.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.
â­ For body use only.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Adidas Pre-Sleep Calm Women Shower Gel Refill 400 ml**:

**Always** XL Night Pads, 3x Protection for Heavy Nights, Maxi Thick, 48 Pads. Looking for ultimate comfort during heavy period nights? Experience nighttime comfort with **Always** XL Night Pads for a good nightâ€™s sleep during heavy flow. These extra-large pads are designed with advanced leak protection barriers for 3x protection and all-night comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Always** XL Night Pads
â­ Use the appropriate pad size for your flow.
â­ Change your pad every 4-6 hours or as needed.
â­ Dispose of used pads properly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Always** XL Night Pads
â­ Soft top sheet
â­ Super absorbent core
â­ Leak-guard barriers
â­ Longer back design

**Always** XL Night Pads are enhanced with advanced absorbent technology for maximum protection against leaks and wetness.  The longer back design protects against stains. Whether youâ€™re relaxing or on the go, these overnight pads offer full coverage and protection, boosting your confidence during heavy flow nights. Extra length and thickness provide maximum comfort and absorbency.  They are fragrance-free and dermatologically tested for gentleness on your skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Always Breathable Soft Maxi Thick, Night Sanitary Pads, 48 Pads**: â­ Remove protective wrapper before use. â­ Apply pad, ensuring wings are secured against underwear for a snug fit. â­ Change regularly for optimal hygiene and comfort.

description_en:
**Always Cotton Soft Ultra Thin, Large sanitary pads with wings, 16 Count** offers superior softness with its ultra-soft cotton material.  These pads are designed to be thinner and gentler on skin compared to many other cotton brands, providing exceptional comfort. To prevent irritation, they feature a soft top sheet with lotion. The ultra-absorbent gel core quickly absorbs wetness and prevents leaks. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Always Cotton Soft Ultra Thin, Large sanitary pads with wings, 16 Count**: 
â­ Place the sanitary pad correctly.
â­ Change the pad every 4-6 hours or as needed.
â­ Do not flush the pad down the toilet.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Always Cotton Soft Ultra Thin, Large sanitary pads with wings, 16 Count**: 
â­ Ultra-soft cotton top sheet
â­ Super absorbent gel core
â­ Soft top sheet with lotion

description_en:
**Always Breathable Soft Maxi Thick, Night Sanitary Pads, 24 Pads** offer superior overnight comfort and dryness. Experience ultimate protection with a soft topsheet that gently keeps wetness away from your skin.  **Always Breathable Soft Maxi Thick, Night Sanitary Pads, 24 Pads** feature flexible pillows that absorb and move with you, preventing chafing and keeping you fresh all night long. They also have an extra-absorbent core that instantly locks away liquid, providing total protection.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Always Breathable Soft Maxi Thick, Night Sanitary Pads, 24 Pads**:
â­ Peel off the protective strip before use.
â­ Secure the wings to your underwear for extra hold.
â­ Change regularly for hygiene and comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Always Breathable Soft Maxi Thick, Night Sanitary Pads, 24 Pads**:
â­ Soft, dry topsheet.
â­ Highly absorbent flexi-pillows.
â­ Super absorbent core.
â­ Anti-leak barriers.
â­ Soft wings.

With **Always** XXL, sleep soundly knowing you're protected. These pads are 40% longer and 30% wider than regular Always pads, providing superior coverage and leak protection. Experience superior absorbency and comfort thanks to their extra thickness. Dermatologically tested for gentle skin protection.

description_en:
**Always Pads Ultra Slim CurveWear Normal with Wings, 8 Pads** provide superior comfort and protection during your period. Featuring the new Always CurveWear technology, they offer a perfect fit that adapts to your body's curves without shifting or leaking. Designed to be thin where you want it and thick where you need it, ensuring zero gaps and zero leaks.  It also boasts a superior soft topsheet gentle to skin, odor lock technology and breathable non-sticky layer for an all-in-one experience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Always Pads Ultra Slim CurveWear Normal with Wings, 8 Pads**: 
â­ Secure the wings to your underwear for a better fit.
â­ Change your pad every 4-6 hours, or as needed.
â­ Dispose of used pads properly in a trash can.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Always Pads Ultra Slim CurveWear Normal with Wings, 8 Pads**: 
â­ Super soft topsheet
â­ Absorbent inner layer
â­ Breathable outer layer
â­ Side wings

description_en:
**Anua Hearleaf Pore Control Cleansing Oil 200ml** is a light cleanser for oily skin, helping to remove impurities from pores and deeply cleanse the skin. â­ Effective in eliminating makeup residue, blackheads, and sebum, while preventing pore congestion. â­ An essential step for double cleansing, resulting in glowing glass skin. â­ Mild ingredients with Heartleaf extract: gently remove blackheads, makeup & sebum without any pore clogging. â­ Non-comedogenic formula: safe to use for acne-prone and sensitive skin. â­ Provides a refreshing finish through the emulsification process that dissolves sebum by mixing water & oil.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Anua Hearleaf Pore Control Cleansing Oil**
â­ Apply the cleansing oil to dry skin and gently massage for 1-2 minutes.
â­ Emulsify with water to effectively remove sebum.
â­ Wash off all oil residue using a water-based cleanser.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Anua Hearleaf Pore Control Cleansing Oil**
â­ Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Sorbeth-30 Tetraoleate, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Butyl Avocadate, Fragrance, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Olea Europaea Fruit Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil, Vitis Vinifera Seed Oil, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Curcuma Longa

title_ar: **Ø£Ù†ÙˆØ§ Ù†ÙŠØ§Ø³ÙŠÙ†Ø§Ù…ÙŠØ¯ 10%+TXA 4% Ø³ÙŠØ±ÙˆÙ… ØªØµØ­ÙŠØ­ Ø§Ù„Ø¨Ù‚Ø¹ Ø§Ù„Ø¯Ø§ÙƒÙ†Ø© 30 Ù…Ù„**
description_en:
**Anua Niacinamide 10%+TXA 4% Dark Spot Correcting Serum 30ml** is a highly effective serum designed to brighten skin and reduce the appearance of dark spots. Its rich formula combines 10% Niacinamide and 4% Tranexamic Acid to visibly diminish dark spots and improve skin tone. It also features Ceramides and Hyaluronic Acid to maintain skin hydration and suppleness. With regular use, you'll notice brighter, smoother, and more balanced skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Anua Niacinamide 10%+TXA 4% Dark Spot Correcting Serum 30ml**
â­ Apply a few drops to your cleansed skin.
â­ Gently massage until fully absorbed.
â­ Use morning and night.
â­ Use a high SPF sunscreen during the day.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Anua Niacinamide 10%+TXA 4% Dark Spot Correcting Serum 30ml**
â­ Water, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Tranexamic Acid, Butylene Glycol, Diethoxyethyl Succinate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Arbutin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Alpha-Arbutin, Coccinia Indica Fruit Extract, Eclipta Prostrata Extract, Macadamia Integrifolia Seed Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Extract, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Chamaecyparis Obtusa Leaf Extract, Prunus Persica (Peach) Flower Extract, Camellia Sinensis Seed Oil, Yeast Ferment Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Artemisia Princeps Leaf Extract, Candida Bombicola/Glucose/Methyl Rapeseedate Ferment, Hyaluronic Acid, Pentylene Glycol, Betaine Salicylate, Sucrose Palmitate, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Gellan Gum, Sodium Phytate, Cellulose, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Panthenol, Cyanocobalamin, Polyglutamic Acid, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Ceramide NP, Dextrin, Asiaticoside, Madecassic Acid, Asiatic Acid, Dimethylsilanol Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Potassium Hyaluronate, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Sodium Hyaluronate Dimethylsilanol, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Xanthan Gum

description_en:
**Anua Heartleaf 77% Soothing Toner 250ml** is a soothing toner enriched with 77% Heartleaf Extract. It provides intense hydration and helps soothe sensitive skin. It contains 3 types of Hyaluronic Acids to keep skin hydrated and protected. Suitable for all skin types thanks to its EWG Green Level ingredients.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Anua Heartleaf 77% Soothing Toner 250ml**:
â­ Use after ampoule as both morning & night skincare regimen.
â­ Follow up with sunscreen in the morning routine.
â­ Multiple layers are recommended for dry winter season.
â­ Smooth over face & neck.
â­ May be used with a small spatula or own fingers.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Anua Heartleaf 77% Soothing Toner 250ml**:
â­ Houttuynia Cordata Extract
â­ Glycerin
â­ Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride
â­ Amaranthus Caudatus Seed Extract (Antioxidant and moisturizing benefits)
â­ Tocopherol (Vitamin E, with antioxidant properties)

**Anua Hearleaf Silky Moisture Suncream 50ml** is a luxurious sunscreen that provides high-level protection against harmful UV rays. Its silky, non-greasy formula leaves your skin feeling hydrated and protected all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Anua Hearleaf Silky Moisture Suncream 50ml**:
â­ Apply liberally to skin 15 minutes before sun exposure.
â­ Reapply every two hours, or after swimming or sweating.
â­ Use as the last step in your skincare routine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Anua Hearleaf Silky Moisture Suncream 50ml**:
â­ Water
â­ Houttuynia Cordata Extract
â­ Dibutyl Adipate
â­ Propanediol
â­ And more effective ingredients.

title_en: Anua Heartleaf Pore Clay Pack 100ml
title_ar: Ø¹Ø¨ÙˆØ© Ø·ÙŠÙ† Ù…Ø³Ø§Ù… Ø£Ù†ÙˆØ§ Ù‡Ø§Ø±ØªÙ„ÙŠÙ 100Ù…Ù„
description_en:
**Anua Heartleaf Pore Clay Pack** is a gentle pore care clay mask. It deeply cleanses, exfoliates, reduces acne, and absorbs oil.  Its rich formula with Heartleaf and Cica extracts provides anti-inflammatory benefits and restores the skin barrier.  It also contains Hyaluronic Acid, soluble collagen, and protease for hydration and smoothness. It features a creamy texture and a refreshing eucalyptus scent.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Anua Heartleaf Pore Clay Pack**: 
â­ Wash your face. 
â­ Apply **Anua Heartleaf Pore Clay Pack** all over your face, avoiding the eye and mouth area. 
â­ Leave on for 3-5 minutes. 
â­ Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water. 
â­ Use once or twice a week.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Anua Heartleaf Pore Clay Pack**: 
â­ Water, Kaolin (20%), Houttuynia Cordata Extract (10.1%), Glycerin, Propanediol, Butylene Glycol, Bentonite (35,000 ppm), Hexylene Glycol, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, 1,2-Hexanediol, Glyceryl Glucoside, Betaine, Decyl Glucoside, Centella Asiatica Extract, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Laminaria Japonica Leaf Extract, Eclipta Prostrata Leaf Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Soluble Collagen, Cetyl Potassium Phosphate, Calamine, Houttuynia Cordata Powder (3,060 ppm), Xanthan Gum, Dipropylene Glycol, Chlorella Vulgaris Powder, Sodium Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Polyisobutene, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Allantoin, Sorbitan Oleate, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Fructooligosaccharides, Protease, Beta-Glucan, Panthenol, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Ceramide NP, Quercetin (100 ppm), Palmitoyl Tripeptide-5, Fragrance, Hydroxyacetophenone, Ethylhexylglycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Yellow Iron Oxide

description_en:
**Anua Birch 70 Moisture Boosting Toner 250ml** is a rich toner formulated with 70% of Japanese White Birch Sap, designed to deeply hydrate and strengthen your skin barrier.  It contains panthenol and ten types of hyaluronic acid to maintain optimal pH balance and long-lasting moisture. Its gentle, plant-based formula is free of harsh chemicals, making it suitable for all skin types, even sensitive skin. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Anua Birch 70 Moisture Boosting Toner 250ml**: 
â­ After cleansing, apply an appropriate amount of **Anua Birch 70 Moisture Boosting Toner 250ml** to your face and neck.
â­ Gently pat until fully absorbed.
â­ Use morning and night for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Anua Birch 70 Moisture Boosting Toner 250ml**: 
â­ Betula Platyphylla Japonica Juice
â­ Dipropylene Glycol
â­ Vegetable Glycerin
â­ 1,2-Hexanediol
â­ Methylpropanediol
â­ Betaine

**Anua Heartleaf Cream Mask Night Solution 25ml** is a luxurious overnight mask packed with heartleaf extract, ceramide, and panthenol. It soothes and brightens your skin while maximizing moisture absorption. Perfect for sensitive skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Anua Heartleaf Cream Mask Night Solution 25ml**: 
â­ After cleansing, apply toner.
â­ Apply the mask to your face, avoiding the eye and lip areas.
â­ Leave on for 15-20 minutes.
â­ Gently pat the remaining essence into your skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Anua Heartleaf Cream Mask Night Solution 25ml**:
â­ Water, Dipropylene Glycol, Glycerin, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Panthenol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Phytosphingosine, Ceramide NP, Houttuynia Cordata Extract, 1,2-Hexanediol, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Glyceryl Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Carbomer, Arginine, Hydroxyacetophenone, Caprylyl Glycol, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tocopherol, Sodium Phytate.

description_en:
**Anua Green Lemon Vita C Blemish Serum Mask 25ml** is a brightening sheet mask that helps reduce the appearance of spots and brightens skin tone while keeping it moisturized. â­ Formulated with Green Lemon Extract rich in Vitamin C, it revitalizes fatigued and dull skin. â­ Contains Glutathione, Vitamin E, and Ferulic Acid to boost brightening and suppress melanin production. â­ Water gel sheet material with high adherence delivers essence effectively.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Anua Green Lemon Vita C Blemish Serum Mask 25ml**:
â­ After cleansing, prep skin with toner. â­ Apply the sheet mask evenly, avoiding lips and eyes. â­ Remove gently after 10-20 minutes and pat for better absorption.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Anua Green Lemon Vita C Blemish Serum Mask 25ml**:
â­ Purified Water, Butylene Glycol, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract (20,000ppm), Niacinamide, 1,2-Hexanediol, Dipropylene Glycol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Arginine, Allantoin, Acrylate/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Carbomer, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Disodium EDTA, Fragrance, Ascorbic Acid (100ppm), Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract, Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Extract, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Corallina Officinalis Extract, Ferulic Acid, Glutathione, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopherol, Apium Graveolens (Celery) Extract, Brassica Oleracea Italica (Broccoli) Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Fruit Extract, Prunus Mume Fruit Extract, Limonene, Citronellol, Linalool.

description_en:
**Anua Heartleaf Quercetinol Pore Deep Cleansing Foam**, a cleansing foam enriched with Heartleaf extract, designed for deep pore cleansing and gentle exfoliation of dead skin cells. â­ Suitable for oily and combination skin. â­ Deep pore cleansing. â­ Gentle exfoliating. â­ Light foam texture. â­ Refreshing and hydrating finish. â­ 99.5% pore cleansing after first use (based on our tests).

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Anua Heartleaf Quercetinol Pore Deep Cleansing Foam**: 
â­ Thoroughly cleanse makeup with cleansing oil. â­ Dispense adequate amount onto hands. â­ Add a little water and rub to create foam. â­ Gently massage onto your face. â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Anua Heartleaf Quercetinol Pore Deep Cleansing Foam**: 
â­Houttuynia Cordata Flower/Leaf/Stem Water, Glycerin, Sodium Cocoyl Glycinate, Water, Sodium Lauroyl Glutamate, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Coco-Glucoside, Decyl Glucoside, Hectorite, Sodium Chloride, 1,2-Hexanediol, Betaine Salicylate, Potassium Benzoate, Houttuynia Cordata Powder, Polyquaternium-67, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Butylene Glycol, Gardenia Florida Fruit Extract, Dextrin, Disodium EDTA, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Acetate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Pinus Palustris Leaf Extract, Ulmus Davidiana Root Extract, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Flower Extract, Pueraria Lobata Root Extract, Pentylene Glycol, Capryloyl Salicylic Acid, Tocopherol, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Potassium Hyaluronate, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Quercetin.

**Anua Heartleaf Pore Control Cleansing Oil Mild 200ml** is a gentle yet effective cleansing oil that gently removes makeup and controls oil, minimizing the appearance of pores. Suitable for all skin types, especially oily and acne-prone skin. Absorbs easily without leaving any oily residue. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Anua Heartleaf Pore Control Cleansing Oil Mild 200ml**:
â­ Apply an appropriate amount of oil to dry hands.
â­ Gently massage the oil onto your dry face, focusing on makeup areas.
â­ Rinse your face thoroughly with lukewarm water.
â­ Follow with your regular cleanser for deeper cleaning.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Anua Heartleaf Pore Control Cleansing Oil Mild 200ml**:
â­ Heartleaf Extract
â­ Natural Plant Oils

description_en:
**Anua Heartleaf 77% Soothing Toner 40ml** is your perfect toner for healthy, glowing skin. â­ Effectively soothes skin, regardless of skin type. â­ Organically extracted from a proprietary farm in Korea. â­ Mild and easy-to-use formula. â­ Helps restore pH balance. â­ Tightens enlarged pores. â­ Perfectly prepares skin for your next skincare regimen. â­ Suitable for all skin types. â­ Natural formula rich in 77% Heartleaf extract. â­ Absorbs easily and helps makeup last longer.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Anua Heartleaf 77% Soothing Toner**: 
â­ Pour a small amount onto hands or a cotton pad. â­ Gently pat onto cleansed skin. â­ Wipe your skin gently if using a cotton pad.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Anua Heartleaf 77% Soothing Toner**: 
â­ Houttuynia Cordata Extract, Water, 1,2-Hexanediol, Glycerin, Betaine, Butylene Glycol, Isopentyldiol, Panthenol, Centella Asiatica Extract, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Methylpropanediol, Portulaca Oleracea Extract, Tromethamine, Disodium EDTA, Chamomilla, Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Vitex Agnus-Castus Extract, Phellinus Linteus Extract, Arctium Lappa Root Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Fruit Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Saccharum Officinarum (Sugar Cane) Extract

â­ Wash your hands thoroughly.

**Aptamil Advance Infant Milk Formula Stage (1) 900Gm** is a scientifically advanced formula, inspired by your baby's needs. Designed to support their nutritional requirements from birth to 6 months. It features Pronutra Advance, a unique blend of ingredients for healthy growth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Aptamil Advance Infant Milk Formula Stage (1) 900Gm**:

â­ Boil water and let it cool to 40Â°C.
â­ Measure the required amount of water and powder (refer to feeding guide).
â­ Add powder to water, and shake the bottle well.
â­ Test the milk temperature before feeding.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Aptamil Advance Infant Milk Formula Stage (1) 900Gm**:

description_en:
**Aptamil Advance Infant Milk Formula Stage (1) 400Gm** is a scientifically advanced, patented formula inspired by your baby's needs. Designed to support their nutritional requirements from birth to 6 months. The only formula with Pronutra-Advance, combining unique ingredients with an advanced process.

â­ Infant formula milk
â­ With Pronutra Advance
â­ Suitable from birth up to 6 months
â­ Rich source of iron and vitamins A, C, and D
â­ Active progression
â­ 400g size
â­ Easy-to-use packaging: one-hand preparation design, easy open and close, and easy-to-use scoop.
â­ Our blend of LCPs (Omega 3 (DHA) and Omega 6 (AA))
â­ Dietary fiber

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Aptamil Advance Infant Milk Formula Stage (1) 400Gm**:
â­ Wash and sterilize all utensils.
â­ Boil water, let it cool for 30 minutes (40Â°C).
â­ Measure the required amount of water (refer to feeding chart).
â­ Use the enclosed scoop. Do not compress the powder.
â­ Add powder to water. Avoid excess or deficiency.
â­ Cap the bottle and shake well for 10 seconds.
â­ Test temperature before feeding (37Â°C).

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Aptamil Advance Infant Milk Formula Stage (1) 400Gm**:(Please refer to packaging for a full ingredient list)

description_en:
**Aptamil Advance Cesar No (2) 800 Gm** is a follow-on formula nutritionally tailored for babies born by Cesarean section. It's designed to support your baby's nutritional needs from 6-12 months. Based on 50 years of advanced research, **Aptamil Advance Cesar No (2)** provides essential nutrients to help support their growth and development.

â­ Nutritionally complete formula
â­ Suitable for babies born by C-section
â­ Contains NutriFibers
â­ Contains Omega-3 & 6
â­ Palm oil free

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Aptamil Advance Cesar No (2)**
â­ Wash hands and sterilize all utensils.
â­ Boil fresh water; let cool for 30 minutes to approx. 40Â°C.
â­ Measure required water (see feeding guide) into a sterilized bottle.
â­ Always use the provided scoop; level off powder.
â­ Add the correct amount of powder to the water. Avoid over or under-measuring.
â­ Cap the bottle and shake vigorously for 10 seconds.
â­ Check temperature on your wrist before feeding (37Â°C).

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Aptamil Advance Cesar No (2)**
â­ Lactose (from cow's milk)
â­ Vegetable oils
â­ Skimmed cowâ€™s milk
â­ Demineralized whey
â­ Galacto-oligosaccharides
â­ Whey concentrate
â­ Cowâ€™s Milk Protein
â­ Fructo-oligosaccharides
â­ Fish oil
â­ and more...

title_ar: **Ø§Ø¨ØªØ§Ù…ÙŠÙ„ Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ Ø±Ù‚Ù… (1) Ø§ÙˆÙ…Ù†ÙŠÙˆ 400 Ø¬Ù…**
description_en:
**Aptamil Baby Milk No.(1) Omneo 400 gm** is a special medical purpose infant formula for babies from birth to 6 months. It features a unique formulation with 62% less lactose, beta palmitate, and partially hydrolyzed protein. This helps reduce digestive discomfort in infants, providing them with greater comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Aptamil Baby Milk No.(1) Omneo 400 gm**:
â­ Wash your hands and sterilize all utensils.
â­ Boil fresh water and let it cool for 30 minutes.
â­ Measure the required amount of water (refer to feeding guide) and pour it into a sterilized bottle.
â­ Always use the provided scoop, level the powder with the built-in leveler. Do not press extra powder into the scoop.
â­ Add the correct amount of powder to the water. Adding too many or too few scoops can be harmful.
â­ Cap the bottle and shake well (for 10 seconds) until the powder dissolves.
â­ Check the temperature on your wrist before feeding (37 degrees Celsius).

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Aptamil Baby Milk No.(1) Omneo 400 gm**:
â­ Partially hydrolyzed protein
â­ 62% less lactose
â­ Beta palmitate

#babyformula #aptamil #omneo #infant #babyhealth #babyfood #ksa #baby #health #babycare

description_en:
**Aptamil Advance Junior Growing Up Milk Formula Stage (3) 400 G** is a scientifically advanced formula designed for toddlers aged 1-3 years. Developed based on 40 years of research to meet your child's nutritional needs. Contains PronutraÂ® ADVANCE, a unique blend of ingredients for healthy and holistic growth.

â­ Growing-up milk for toddlers aged 1-3 years
â­ Rich in iron and vitamins A, C, and D to support the immune system
â­ Easy to prepare using the included scoop
â­ Unique easy-open and easy-close packaging
â­ Rich source of dietary fiber and Omega 3 (DHA) and Omega 6 (AA) fatty acids

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Aptamil Advance Junior Growing Up Milk Formula Stage (3) 400 G**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparation.
â­ Add 6 scoops of powder to 180ml of previously boiled, cooled water (lukewarm or cold).
â­ Shake the bottle vigorously for 10 seconds until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Use prepared milk within one hour and discard any leftovers.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Aptamil Advance Junior Growing Up Milk Formula Stage (3) 400 G**:
â­ Skimmed milk
â­ Lactose
â­ Vegetable oils
â­ Whey
â­ Long chain polyunsaturated fatty acids (LCPs) (DHA & AA)
â­ Minerals and Vitamins

description_en:
**Aptamil Baby Milk Omneo Stage (2) 400 gm** is a specially formulated follow-on milk for babies from 6 to 12 months.  It features a unique blend with 45% less lactose and beta palmitate to support digestive health and reduce discomfort. Contains partially hydrolysed protein for easy digestion. Pack size: 400g.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Aptamil Baby Milk Omneo Stage (2) 400 gm**: 
â­ Wash and sterilize all utensils.
â­ Boil fresh water and let it cool for 30 minutes.
â­ Measure the required amount of water (refer to feeding guide) and pour it into a sterilized bottle.
â­ Use the scoop provided. Do not press extra powder into the scoop.
â­ Add the correct amount of powder to the water. Avoid over or under measuring.
â­ Cap the bottle and shake well for 10 seconds.
â­ Check the temperature of the milk before feeding (37 degrees Celsius).

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Aptamil Baby Milk Omneo Stage (2) 400 gm**:
â­ Whey Protein
â­ Skimmed Milk Powder
â­ Vegetable Oils
â­ Lactose
â­ Minerals
â­ Vitamins

description_en:
**Aptamil Baby Milk AR 400 gm** is specially formulated for infants experiencing reflux. Its unique composition helps reduce the incidence and severity of regurgitation. **Aptamil Baby Milk AR 400 gm** contains a special thickening agent that helps to prevent reflux by thickening the milk in your baby's stomach.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Aptamil Baby Milk AR 400 gm**:
â­ Wash hands and sterilize all utensils.
â­ Boil fresh water and allow to cool for 30 minutes.
â­ Measure the required amount of water (refer to feeding guide) and pour into a sterilized bottle.
â­ Use the provided scoop and level the powder with the built-in leveler.
â­ Add the correct amount of powder to the water.
â­ Cap the bottle and shake well (for 10 seconds) until powder is dissolved.
â­ Check the temperature on your wrist before feeding (37 degrees Celsius).

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Aptamil Baby Milk AR 400 gm**:
â­ Infant-specific ingredients.
â­ Thickening agent.
â­ Essential nutrients. (Complete ingredient list available on the product packaging)

description_en:
**Aptamil Advance Junior 3** is a nutritionally tailored growing-up milk formula, based on 50 years of research inspired by toddlersâ€™ needs.  Specifically designed to support your child's nutritional requirements from 1-3 years. Nutricia has over 120 years of expertise in early life nutrition.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Aptamil Advance Junior 3**
â­ Wash hands and sterilize all utensils.
â­ Boil fresh water and let it cool to approximately 40Â°C.
â­ Use the provided scoop; do not press the powder.
â­ Add the correct amount of powder to water and shake well for 10 seconds.
â­ Check temperature on your wrist before feeding your toddler.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Aptamil Advance Junior 3**
â­ Lactose (from cow's milk)
â­ Vegetable oils (Sunflower oil, Coconut oil, Rapeseed oil)
â­ Skimmed cow's milk
â­ Whey protein
â­ Galacto-oligosaccharides
â­ Fructo-oligosaccharides
â­ and other vitamins and minerals.

**Aptamil Advance Junior 3** provides your toddler with the complete nutrition they need during this growth stage. It contains dietary fiber, Omega-3 & 6, and is palm oil-free.

description_en:
**Aptamil Baby Milk PDF 400 gm** is specially formulated to meet the increased nutritional needs of premature and low birth weight infants after hospital discharge.  It's enriched with essential vitamins and minerals to support healthy growth until they reach their ideal weight. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Aptamil Baby Milk PDF 400 gm**: 
â­ Wash hands and sterilize all utensils.
â­ Boil fresh water and allow to cool for 30 minutes.
â­ Measure the required amount of water (refer to feeding guide) and pour into a sterilized bottle.
â­ Use the provided scoop and level off the powder. Do not press extra powder into the scoop.
â­ Add the correct amount of powder to the water. Too much or too little can be harmful.
â­ Cap the bottle and shake well (for 10 seconds).
â­ Check the temperature of the milk before feeding (37 degrees Celsius).

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Aptamil Baby Milk PDF 400 gm**: (Please refer to packaging for a complete list of ingredients)
â­ Carefully selected ingredients to meet the needs of premature and low birth weight babies.
â­ Enriched with essential vitamins and minerals.

description_en:
**Aptamil Pepti Junior 400 gm** is a complete, specialized infant formula designed for babies with cow's milk protein allergy or malabsorption. It uses extensively hydrolyzed whey protein, is rich in long-chain polyunsaturated fatty acids (LCPUFA) and arachidonic acid, and includes nucleotides important for gut cell regeneration. **Aptamil Pepti Junior** is a special medical food.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Aptamil Pepti Junior**:
â­ Wash hands and sterilize all utensils.
â­ Boil fresh water and let cool to 40Â°C.
â­ Measure required water (see feeding guide) into a sterilized bottle.
â­ Use the provided scoop, level the powder, do not press.
â­ Add the correct amount of powder to the water.
â­ Cap the bottle and shake vigorously for 10 seconds.
â­ Check the milk temperature before feeding (37Â°C).

â­ Hypoallergenic infant formula milk.

â­ Helps reduce the risk of food allergies.
â­ Baby Food Stage: Stage 1
â­ Size: 400g

description_en:
**Aquafresh** Toothpaste is specially designed for children's big teeth (6-8 years). Your child's little teeth enamel is 50% thinner than yours, and new big teeth take up to 3 years to reach full strength. **Aquafresh** provides specialized protection for their mixed teeth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Aquafresh** Toothpaste Children Big Teeth:
â­ Apply a pea-sized amount to a soft-bristled toothbrush.
â­ Brush your child's teeth gently in circular motions twice daily.
â­ Rinse your child's mouth thoroughly with water after use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Aquafresh** Toothpaste Children Big Teeth:
â­ Fluoride for sugar acid protection.
â­ Gentle ingredients on gums and teeth.
â­ Fresh mint flavor.

description_en:
**Aquafresh Toothpaste Children Little Teeth** is specially designed for little teeth (3-5 years). Your child's enamel is 50% thinner than yours, making them more susceptible to cavities. This toothpaste provides gentle care that keeps their little teeth healthy and strong.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Aquafresh Toothpaste Children Little Teeth**:
â­ Apply a small amount of **Aquafresh Toothpaste Children Little Teeth** to a soft toothbrush.
â­ Gently brush your child's teeth twice daily, or as directed by a dentist.
â­ Ensure to rinse your child's mouth thoroughly after each brushing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Aquafresh Toothpaste Children Little Teeth**:
â­ Fluoride for cavity protection.
â­ Mild mint flavor suitable for children.
â­ Gentle on enamel formula.

description_en:
**Aquafresh Toothbrush For Kids Milk Teeth** is the perfect toothbrush for kids aged 0-2 years. â­ Its easy-grip design and non-slip handle help children brush their teeth effectively. â­ Specially designed to gently and thoroughly clean milk teeth without harming sensitive gums. â­ Extra-soft bristles with multiple angles ensure complete cleaning. â­ Its compact size fits comfortably in children's mouths, easily reaching all corners. â­ It comes in bright colors and fun designs to encourage children to brush their teeth. â­ Features a rubber cushion at the back of the brush head. â­ Its easy-grip handle and flexible neck reduce pressure on teeth. â­ Color indicator bristles show the required amount of toothpaste.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Aquafresh Toothbrush For Kids Milk Teeth**: 
â­ Rinse the toothbrush with warm water. â­ Apply a pea-sized amount of toothpaste. â­ Gently move the toothbrush back and forth along the teeth. â­ Brush both sides and the top of the teeth. â­ Brush for at least two minutes. â­ Rinse your mouth thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Aquafresh Toothbrush For Kids Milk Teeth**: 
â­ Aqua, Hydrated Silica, Sorbitol, Glycerin, Xanthan Gum, Titanium Dioxide, Aroma, Sodium Saccharin, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, and Sodium Fluoride. Contains: Sodium Fluoride 0.221% w/w (1000 ppm Fluoride).

description_en:
**Aquafresh** Toothbrush Junior Kids Big Teeth Soft is specially designed for kids over 6 years old, combining gentle gum care with effective teeth cleaning.  The innovative design features mixed bristle lengths to clean between teeth and gums effectively, while the flexible neck withstands brushing pressure. The cushioned brush head protects delicate gums, making it the ideal choice for children.  Available in multiple colors.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Aquafresh**:
â­ Wash the brush and mouth thoroughly.
â­ Apply a small amount of toothpaste to the brush.
â­ Position the brush at a 45-degree angle to the gum line.
â­ Brush teeth in a circular motion.
â­ Gently brush chewing surfaces back and forth.
â­ Spit out the paste and rinse your mouth thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Aquafresh**:
â­ High-quality soft bristles.
â­ Ergonomically designed comfortable handle.
â­ Cushioned brush head for gum protection.
â­ Flexible brush neck.

description_en:
**ARS Liquid Refill 360 Hours** is the perfect solution for repelling mosquitoes and harmful insects. â­ Kills mosquitoes within 2 minutes. â­ Smokeless and odorless. â­ Compatible with all ARS electric mosquito repellent machines. â­ Lasts for 360 hours. â­ Safe to use around children and families. â­ Economical and easy to use. â­ Ensures low electricity consumption. â­ Protects against mosquito-borne diseases like malaria, chikungunya, and Zika. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **ARS Liquid Refill 360 Hours**: â­ Remove the bottle cap. â­ Insert the bottle into the machine and turn clockwise until tightly secured. â­ Ensure the bottle is in an upright position. â­ Plug the device into an electrical outlet in a well-ventilated room. â­ When finished, simply switch off. â­ Replace the empty bottle with a new one. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **ARS Liquid Refill 360 Hours**: â­ Active ingredient: Prallethrin 0.666 w/v%. â­ Inert ingredient: 99.33%.

**ARS Mosquito Repellent Spray 100 ml** provides effective and long-lasting protection against mosquitoes and other flying insects, keeping your family safe from annoying bites. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **ARS Mosquito Repellent Spray 100 ml**:
â­ Apply sunscreen first, let it absorb, then spray **ARS Mosquito Repellent Spray 100 ml** evenly.

â­ Don't forget ankles and knees.
â­ Be cautious around children.
â­ Avoid overuse.

description_en:
**Avalon Alpha Plus Brightening 4 In 1 Scrub 100 Ml** is a facial and body scrub and cleanser that brightens your skin. â­ Deeply cleanses and removes dead skin cells. â­ Brightens skin and gives it radiance. â­ Suitable for all skin types. â­ Gentle formula on the skin. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Avalon Alpha Plus Brightening 4 In 1 Scrub 100 Ml**: 
â­ As a daily cleanser: Wash the area and gently dry while maintaining some moisture. Apply it to slightly wet skin and gently massage in circular motions to cleanse. 
â­ As a scrub: Wash the area and gently dry it. Apply a generous amount of the scrub as a mask to dry skin and leave for 15 minutes. Rinse with warm water in gentle circular motions.

description_en:
**Avalon Antiseptic Solution 250 ml** is an effective antiseptic solution containing Povidone Iodine 100mg/ml. It kills a wide range of germs, including bacteria, viruses, and fungi.  It's used for the prevention and treatment of minor skin infections such as cuts, scrapes, and minor burns. For adults and children over two years old. Apply topically to the affected area once or twice daily. Keep out of reach of children. Do not use on children under two years old or if allergic to any components of **Avalon Antiseptic Solution 250 ml**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Avalon Antiseptic Solution 250 ml**:
â­ Apply directly to the affected area of skin.
â­ Allow to dry.
â­ Cover with a dressing if desired.
â­ Use once or twice daily.
â­ Keep out of reach of children.
â­ Do not use on children under two years of age.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Avalon Antiseptic Solution 250 ml**:
â­ Povidone Iodine 100mg/ml
â­ Other ingredients

**Avalon Povidone-Iodine U.S.P. 1% W/V Mouthwash 135ml** effectively treats mouth and throat infections, such as gingivitis and mouth ulcers. It kills harmful microorganisms, maintaining oral health before, during, and after dental and oral surgeries.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Avalon Povidone-Iodine U.S.P. 1% W/V Mouthwash 135ml**:
â­ Pour into a cup.
â­ Dilute with warm water as needed.
â­ Swish in mouth and spit out.
â­ Gargle for 30 seconds.
â­ Repeat as directed by your physician or pharmacist.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Avalon Povidone-Iodine U.S.P. 1% W/V Mouthwash 135ml**:
â­ Povidone-Iodine
â­ Other ingredients

For external use only. Do not swallow. Keep out of reach of children.

description_en:
**Avalon Ez 12 Regular Mouthwash 250 Ml** - Experience long-lasting freshness with our amazing mouthwash! â­ Eliminates bad breath and prevents recurrence. â­ Provides instant effect lasting up to 12 hours. â­ Refreshing mint flavor. â­ Contains 0.05% sodium fluoride to strengthen tooth enamel.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Avalon Ez 12 Regular Mouthwash 250 Ml**: 
â­ Use 10ml and rinse for 30-60 seconds. â­ Recommended for daily use from age 12 and above. â­ For a 24-hour effect, use morning and evening. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Avalon Ez 12 Regular Mouthwash 250 Ml**: 
â­ Chlorhexidine diacetate â­ Sodium fluoride â­ Menthol

description_en:
**Avalon Pharma Hairpan Spray Vitamin Tonic** 140ml, a vitamin-rich spray that strengthens and stimulates hair growth. â­ Nourishes hair from roots to ends. â­ Promotes healthy and strong hair growth. â­ Effective formula containing Dexpanthenol (Vitamin B5). â­ Easy to use and quickly absorbed. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Avalon Pharma Hairpan Spray Vitamin Tonic**: â­ Spray onto scalp and hair from a distance of 15cm. â­ Distribute evenly throughout the hair. â­ Let it air dry. â­ Use daily or as needed. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Avalon Pharma Hairpan Spray Vitamin Tonic**: â­ Dexpanthenol. â­ Purified Water. â­ Ethanol. â­ PEG 40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil. â­ Lonicera Caprifolium Extract. â­ Isopropyl Myristate. â­ FD&C Yellow No 6.

description_en:
**Avalon Organics Body Wash With Lavender 355 Ml** is a luxurious lavender-infused shower gel. This gentle, plant-based formula unites lavender essential oil, quinoa protein, aloe, and botanical cleansers to purify and nourish even extra-dry skin, while the calming aroma of lavender soothes the mind and body.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Avalon Organics Body Wash With Lavender 355 Ml**:
â­ Apply to damp skin. 
â­ Gently massage into a rich lather. 
â­ Rinse thoroughly. 
â­ For a relaxing bath, add a small amount to running water. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Avalon Organics Body Wash With Lavender 355 Ml**:
â­ Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice
â­ Aqua (Water)
â­ Coco-Glucosides
â­ Sodium Lauryl Glucosides Hydroxypropylsulfonate
â­ Glycerin
â­ Heptyl Glucoside
â­ Xanthan Gum
â­ Babassu Oil Polyglyceryl-4 Esters
â­ Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Oil
â­ Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil
â­ Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil
â­ Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract
â­ Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract
â­ Chenopodium Quinoa Seed
â­ Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate
â­ Alcohol
â­ Bisabolol
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Inulin
â­ Sodium Chloride
â­ Benzyl Alcohol
â­ Potassium Sorbate
â­ Sodium Benzoate
â­ Coumarin
â­ Limonene
â­ Linalool.

description_en:
**Avalon Organics Lavender Lotion 355 G** provides luxurious hydration and essential nourishment for soft, smooth skin. â­  Nourishing lavender essential oil, aloe, plant lipids and nutrient-rich beta-glucan work together to restore skin's natural lipid balance. â­ Long-lasting hydration instantly replenishes, rebalances and softens extra dry skin. This bottle is made with 100% recycled material. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Avalon Organics Lavender Lotion 355 G**: 
â­ Daily use helps prevent and relieve extra dry skin. 
â­ Most effective when used after bathing and hand washing. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Avalon Organics Lavender Lotion 355 G**: 
â­ Aqua (Water), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice(1), Glycerin, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil(1), Glyceryl Stearate SE, Stearic Acid, Avena Sativa (Oat) Bran, Beta-Glucan, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract(1), Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract(1), Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract(1), Echinacea Angustifolia Extract(1), Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract(1), Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter(1), Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil(1), Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Oil(1), Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil(1), Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil(1), Arginine, Bisabolol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetyl Alcohol, Potassium Hydroxide, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Stearyl Alcohol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Xanthan Gum, Alcohol(1), Benzyl Alcohol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Citral, Coumarin, Geraniol, Limonene, Linalool. (1) Certified Organic Ingredient. Product is preserved with Sodium Benzoate.

description_en:
**Avalon Organics Peppermint Lotion 355 Ml** is a luxurious hand and body lotion with a refreshing peppermint scent. â­ Enriched with revitalizing peppermint essential oil, aloe, vitamin E, and nutrient-rich beta glucan. â­ Deeply hydrates and restores skin's natural balance. â­ Suitable for all skin types, especially dry skin. â­ Leaves skin feeling soft, smooth, and refreshed. â­ Lightweight and fast-absorbing formula. â­ Perfect for daily use. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Avalon Organics Peppermint Lotion 355 Ml**: â­ Apply to skin after bathing or washing hands. â­ Massage gently until fully absorbed. â­ Use daily for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Avalon Organics Peppermint Lotion 355 Ml**: â­ Aqua (Water), â­ Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, â­ Glycerin, â­ Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, â­ Glyceryl Stearate SE, â­ Stearic Acid, â­ Avena Sativa (Oat) Bran, â­ Beta-Glucan, and other natural ingredients. Vegan, paraben-free, sulfate-free, cruelty-free, no artificial colors or fragrances, and phthalate-free.

description_en:
**Aveeno Baby Soothing Wash 250ml** is a gentle formula designed to help maintain your baby's skin microbiome balance. It soothes and helps relieve dry, sensitive skin prone to itchiness. pH balanced, fragrance-free, and free from sulphates, soaps, and dyes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Aveeno Baby Soothing Wash 250ml**:
â­ Squeeze onto hands or a soft cloth.
â­ Apply gently to your baby's skin.
â­ Lather and rinse.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Aveeno Baby Soothing Wash 250ml**:
â­ Aqua
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine
â­ Glycerin
â­ Coco-Glucoside
â­ Sodium Lauroamphoacetate
â­ Sodium Chloride
â­ Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate
â­ Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract
â­ Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Flour
â­ Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Oil
â­ Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil
â­ Coconut Acid
â­ Lecithin
â­ Glyceryl Oleate

â­ Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer
â­ Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides Citrate
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Sodium Hydroxide
â­ Ascorbyl Palmitate
â­ Tocopherol
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate

**Aveeno Baby Calming Comfort Wash 250ml** is a gentle, soothing wash that cleanses your baby's delicate skin while maintaining its natural balance.  It contains natural oat extract and a calming lavender scent to help soothe your baby before bedtime.  **Aveeno Baby Calming Comfort Wash 250ml** is designed to be gentle on sensitive skin, tear-free, and pH balanced.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Aveeno Baby Calming Comfort Wash 250ml**: 
â­ Apply a small amount to your hand or a washcloth.
â­ Gently massage onto your baby's skin.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.

â­ Aqua
â­ Cocamidopropyl Betaine

â­ Glycerin
â­ Oat Extract
â­ and other gentle ingredients.

description_en:
**AVEENO** Body Cream Moisturising 100ml is a lightweight, non-greasy moisturiser, specially developed for dry and sensitive skin. It delivers intense moisture and hydration, while helping to strengthen the skin's natural barrier. Formulated with naturally active colloidal oatmeal, it replenishes your skin with essential moisture, restoring its natural protective barrier, and leaving your skin looking and feeling soft, smooth and healthy. This formula is ideal for eczema-prone skin and relieves itching sensations. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **AVEENO** Body Cream Moisturising 100ml
â­ Apply to dry and sensitive skin as often as required.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **AVEENO** Body Cream Moisturising 100ml
â­ Water, Glycerin, Distearyldimonium Chloride, Isopropyl Palmitate, Paraffinum Liquidum, Cetyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Avena Sativa Kernel Flour, Allantoin, Paraffin, Cera Microcristallina, Isopropyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Myristyl Alcohol, Sodium Chloride, Benzyl Alcohol.

#AVEENO #Moisturizer #BodyCream #SkinCare #DrySkin #SensitiveSkin #Beauty #SkinHealth #KSA #SaudiArabia #BodyLotion

description_en:
**Avalon-Avogain 5% Solution 50 ml** is an effective topical solution for hair growth and preventing hair loss. â­ Contains 5% Minoxidil, ideal for treating hormonal baldness in men. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Avalon-Avogain 5% Solution 50 ml**: 
â­ Ensure both scalp and hair are dry before application. 
â­ Apply 1ml of the solution to the affected area by pressing the sprayer 8-10 times. 
â­ Gently massage with fingertips. 
â­ Allow the solution to dry naturally. 
â­ Use twice daily for at least four months. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Avalon-Avogain 5% Solution 50 ml**: 
â­ Minoxidil 5%. 

For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. If Minoxidil enters the bloodstream, it may cause side effects. #Avogain #HairGrowth #BaldnessTreatment #Minoxidil #HairCare #HairCareProducts #Beauty #HairHealth #HealthyHair #HairLoss

description_en:
**Avalon-Avogain 2% Solution 50 ml** is an effective topical solution that helps treat hereditary hair loss. â­ Contains Minoxidil, an active ingredient that improves blood flow to hair follicles. â­ Suitable for men and women aged 18-65. â­ Use twice daily for at least two months to see results. â­ New hair may initially appear soft, then become thicker with continued use. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Avalon-Avogain 2% Solution 50 ml**: â­ Apply to dry scalp twice daily. â­ Distribute evenly with your fingers. â­ Avoid inhaling the spray. â­ Use for at least two months to see results. â­ Continue use to maintain results. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Avalon-Avogain 2% Solution 50 ml**: â­ Minoxidil 2%. â­ Ethanol. â­ Propylene Glycol. â­ Other ingredients.

description_en:
**Avalon-Avocom 0.1% W/W Cream 30 gm** is an effective topical cream that relieves redness, swelling, itching, inflammation, and discomfort associated with various skin conditions, including psoriasis and eczema. â­It is used by applying it to the affected area to reduce swelling, redness, and itching. â­Contains mometasone, a powerful corticosteroid, that soothes inflamed skin. â­Helps to avoid eczema flare-ups and reduces dry, itchy, and red skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Avalon-Avocom 0.1% W/W Cream 30 gm**: â­Apply a thin film to the affected area once daily as directed by your doctor. â­Rub in gently. â­Do not cover the area with bandages unless instructed by your doctor. â­Wash and dry your hands before use. â­Spread the cream evenly over the affected area. â­Use it on all affected areas, not just the worst. â­Avoid using it on broken skin or cuts. â­Wash your hands after use (unless you are treating your hands). â­Wait at least 10 minutes before using other creams.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Avalon-Avocom 0.1% W/W Cream 30 gm**: â­Mometasone Furoate.

description_en:
**Bepanthen Anti-Scar Gel** is specially formulated to help prevent the formation of red and raised scars, leaving minimal trace of wounds.  **Bepanthen Anti-Scar Gel** also helps to flatten older scars and reduces redness, itching, and tightness associated with scars. Use only after wounds have fully healed.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bepanthen Anti-Scar Gel**
â­ Apply a sufficient amount of gel to the scar, and let it dry before dressing.
â­ Use twice daily, morning and evening, or after showering or strenuous exercise.
â­ Use for at least two months.
â­ Use the massage ball before applying the gel to older scars (more than a month old).

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bepanthen Anti-Scar Gel**
â­ Purified water, Panthenol, Panthenyl Glycol, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, DC7-Silicone Blend 0992, and Anhydrous Citric Acid.

#Bepanthen #AntiScarGel #ScarTreatment #Skincare #SkinBeauty #SkinHealth #BeautyProducts #KSA #HealthCare #SuccessfulExperiences

description_en:
**Bepanthen Gentle Body Cleansing Wash Gel 400ml** is a gentle body wash that effectively cleanses dry skin, removing impurities while maintaining its natural protective barrier.  It contains a blend of mild cleansing agents that cleanse effectively without disturbing natural moisture levels, leaving skin feeling refreshed and soft. Its soap-free formulation is ideal for dry and sensitive skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bepanthen Gentle Body Cleansing Wash Gel 400ml**:
â­ Massage onto wet skin.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bepanthen Gentle Body Cleansing Wash Gel 400ml**:
â­ Dexpanthenol
â­ Niacinamide
â­ Glycerine
â­ Physiological lipids
â­ Argan oil

Free from preservatives, fragrance, and colorants. Dermatologically tested. Use daily for soft, healthy skin.

**Bepanthen** Replenishing Body Lotion is the perfect solution for very dry and sensitive skin. It provides immediate, long-lasting hydration for up to 48 hours and supports the skin's natural regeneration.  Specially formulated to relieve the signs of dry skin such as flakiness, roughness and cracked skin. Contains effective natural ingredients such as shea butter and argan oil, in addition to the advanced dexpanthenol repair complex that regenerates the skin from within. Free from preservatives, fragrances, and colorants. Suitable for adults and babies.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bepanthen** Replenishing Body Lotion

â­ Gently massage until fully absorbed.

â­ Dexpanthenol
â­ Niacinamide

description_en:
**Bepanthen Sensiderm** cream provides effective relief from itch and redness caused by various skin irritations, including eczema.  Its cortisone-free formula is gentle enough for sensitive skin, containing no preservatives or perfumes.  It rebuilds the skin's protective barrier, deeply moisturizes, and relieves symptoms in as little as 30 minutes. With **Bepanthen Sensiderm**, experience healthy, hydrated skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bepanthen Sensiderm**: 
â­ Apply cream to affected area as needed.
â­ Suitable for adults and children.
â­ Can be used with Sensidaily cream during flare-free periods.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bepanthen Sensiderm**: 
â­ High-quality, healing ingredients.
â­ Free from cortisone, preservatives, and perfumes.
â­ Contains lamellar lipid technology.

description_en:
**Bepanthen** Moisturizing Cream is perfect for dry and damaged skin. It gently aids natural skin recovery, keeping it soft, smooth, and moisturized.  Its light formulation swiftly penetrates the skin, protecting it from dryness and environmental factors. **Bepanthen** contains dexpanthenol (Provitamin B5), which converts into pantothenic acid in skin cells, helping to regenerate and heal skin, restoring its healthy look. It soothes skin irritations like dryness, redness, sunburns, and minor burns. Ideal for moisturizing rough and dry areas on the face, elbows, hands, and feet. With over 75 years of expertise, you can trust **Bepanthen** for effective skin care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bepanthen**: 
â­ Apply once to several times a day as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bepanthen**: 
â­ Dexpanthenol (Provitamin B5).

description_en:
**Bepanthen** Nappy Care, the protective ointment, gently cares for your baby's delicate skin, protecting it from nappy rash and irritation. Its gentle formula is enriched with Pro-Vitamin B5, which helps regenerate and moisturize the skin. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bepanthen**: 
â­ Apply a thin layer to the inflamed or red skin. 
â­ Use daily with every nappy change. 
â­ Allows your baby's skin to breathe. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bepanthen**: 
â­ Pro-Vitamin B5 
â­ Gentle ingredients suitable for sensitive skin. 

**Bepanthen** is your ideal choice for your baby's skin care; it does not contain artificial colors, fragrances, or preservatives. Enjoy peace of mind with over 75 years of expertise in skincare. 

#Bepanthen #Skincare #BabyCare #NappyRashCream #BabySkin #BabyProducts #Motherhood #Infant #Baby #Riyadh

description_en:
**Bepanthen Nappy Care 100gm** is a protective baby ointment designed to shield your baby's delicate skin from nappy rash and irritation. Its unique formula, enriched with Provitamin B5, helps regenerate and moisturize the skin, making it ideal for sensitive skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bepanthen Nappy Care**:
â­ Apply a thin layer of ointment to your baby's skin after each nappy change.
â­ Use daily to protect against nappy rash.
â­ Suitable for use on inflamed or irritated skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bepanthen Nappy Care**:
â­ Provitamin B5
â­ Gentle ingredients suitable for sensitive skin, free from artificial fragrances, colors, and preservatives.

**Bepanthen Nappy Care** is the perfect choice to protect your baby's skin from nappy rash irritation, thanks to its effective formula and Bepanthen's expertise spanning over 75 years. Give your baby the superior care they deserve! #Bepanthen #BabyCare #SkinProtection #NappyRash #HealthySkin #BepanthenOintment #BabyProducts #Infant #Motherhood #BabySkinCare

description_en:
**Bepanthen Plus** is an advanced cream for treating minor burns, wounds, and scratches. It features a unique formula combining effective antiseptic properties and Provitamin B5 (dexpanthenol) to promote the natural healing process of the skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bepanthen Plus**: 
â­ Gently cleanse the affected area before use.
â­ Apply an appropriate amount of **Bepanthen Plus** to the affected area and spread evenly.
â­ Repeat as needed, two or three times daily.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bepanthen Plus**: 
â­ Dexpanthenol (Provitamin B5)
â­ Chlorhexidine
â­ Other ingredients to help moisturize and soothe the skin.

**Bepanthen Plus**, your optimal choice for skin care and treatment of minor wounds and burns. Enjoy its effectiveness and safety, and the return of your skin to its health and radiance.

title_ar: Ø¨ÙŠØ¨Ø§Ù†Ø«ÙŠÙ† ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… 30 Ø¬Ù… 2+1
description_en:
**Bepanthen Cream** is the perfect cream for dry and damaged skin. It gently aids daily moisturizing, keeping your skin soft, smooth, and hydrated. Its light formula quickly penetrates the skin, protecting it from harmful environmental factors. **Bepanthen Cream** contains dexpanthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5), which is converted in skin cells into pantothenic acid, helping to regenerate and heal the skin and restore its healthy look.  **Bepanthen Cream** is used to treat skin irritations such as dryness, redness, sunburns, and minor burns. It can also be used to moisturize rough and dry areas on the face, elbows, hands, and feet.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bepanthen Cream**: 
â­ Apply the cream once to several times a day as needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bepanthen Cream**: 
â­ Dexpanthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5)

description_en:
**Bigen Lady Hair Color No Ammonia Brownish/Black 20** gives you natural-looking, shiny black-brown hair in minutes! A safe and effective hair color, free of ammonia and enriched with natural ingredients. Achieve salon-quality results from the comfort of your home.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bigen Lady Hair Color No Ammonia Brownish/Black 20**:
â­ Wear gloves and mix equal amounts of colorant and developer.
â­ Section your hair and apply the mixture evenly, ensuring complete coverage of gray hair.
â­ Leave for 10 minutes, then rinse with water and shampoo.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bigen Lady Hair Color No Ammonia Brownish/Black 20**:
â­ Cream Colorant: Stearyl Alcohol, Diglycerin, Petrolatum, P-phenylenediamine, Water, Ammonium Hydroxide, Ceteth-20, Dimethicone, Peg-20, Achillea Millefolium Extract, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract, Foeniculum Vulgare Fruit Extract, Humulus Lupulus Extract, Melissa Officinalis Leaf Extract, Polyquaternium-6, Pullulan, Viscum Album Fruit Extract, Cyclopentasiloxane, Arginine, Ascorbic Acid, Sodium Sulfite, Trisodium EDTA, 2,4-diaminophenoxyethanol Hcl, Resorcinol, Fragrance
â­ Developer Cream: Hydrogen Peroxide, Cetyl Alcohol, Cetheth-2, Isostearyl Alcohol, Water, Ppg-4-ceteth-20, Propylene Glycol, Steartrimonium Chloride, Citric Acid

description_en:
**Bigen Hair Color Men's Beard Color Dark Brown B103** leaves no stains and perfectly covers grey without staining your skin.  A non-drip, high-viscosity cream that covers your beard without dripping. The Fast-Touch comb easily applies to any part of your beard, even shorter styles.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bigen Hair Color Men's Beard Color Dark Brown B103**:
â­ Squeeze out equal amounts of cream from both tubes onto the mixing tray.
â­ Apply the mixture to your beard using the applicator comb.
â­ Avoid contact with the nose and mouth.
â­ Rinse your beard with lukewarm water and shampoo once the desired color is achieved.
â­ Wet the colored area with water and gently rub before rinsing to keep your skin clean.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bigen Hair Color Men's Beard Color Dark Brown B103**:
â­ Cream Colorant
â­ Cream Developer
â­ Applicator Comb
â­ Tray
â­ Gloves
â­ Instruction Leaflet

description_en:
**Bigen Lady Colore No Ammonia 10 Natural Black** is your perfect solution for covering grey hair and achieving lustrous, vibrant black hair in just 10 minutes!  **Bigen Lady Colore No Ammonia 10 Natural Black** features a creamy, easy-to-apply formula that's free from ammonia, ensuring your scalp and hair are protected from harsh chemicals. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bigen Lady Colore No Ammonia 10 Natural Black**:
â­ Mix equal amounts of cream colorant and cream developer in a bowl.
â­ Section your hair and apply the mixture to the entire length of your grey hair.
â­ After 10 minutes, rinse your hair thoroughly with water and shampoo.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bigen Lady Colore No Ammonia 10 Natural Black**:
â­ Cream Colorant: Water, Stearyl Alcohol, Petrolatum, Ceteth-20 P-phenylenediamine, Ammonium Hydroxide, Diglycerin, Peg-20, Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethicone, Achillea Millefolium Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Foeniculum Vulgare Fruit Extract, Humulus Lupulus Extract, Melissa Officinalis Leaf Extract, Polyquaternium-6, Pullulan, Viscum Album Fruit Extract, Arginine, Ascorbic Acid, Sodium Sulfite, Trisodium EDTA, 2,4-diaminophenoxyethanol Hcl, Resorcinol, Fragrance
â­ Developer Cream: Water, Hydrogen Peroxide, Steartrimonium Chloride, Cetyl Alcohol, Propylene Glycol, Cetheth-2, Isostearyl Alcohol, Ppg-4-ceteth-20, Citric Acid

description_en:
**Bigen Men's Beard Hair Color** provides a natural and effective solution for covering gray hairs in your beard.  **Bigen Men's Beard Hair Color** features a non-drip creamy texture for easy and precise application without staining your skin. It comes with a specialized comb for effortless coloring, even in hard-to-reach areas. **Bigen Men's Beard Hair Color** perfectly covers gray hair with a formula enriched with taurine and olive oil for long-lasting color.  Ammonia-free, with a pleasant scent. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bigen Men's Beard Hair Color**:
â­ Squeeze out equal amounts of cream from both tubes into the mixing tray.
â­ Apply the mixture to your beard using the applicator comb.
â­ Avoid contact with the nose and mouth.
â­ Rinse your beard with lukewarm water and shampoo once the desired color is achieved.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bigen Men's Beard Hair Color**:
â­ Cream Colorant
â­ Cream Developer
â­ Applicator Comb
â­ Tray
â­ Gloves
â­ Instruction Leaflet

description_en:
**Bigen Hair Color Powder Black** is the perfect way to achieve vibrant, jet-black hair without causing damage! This unique hair color boasts an ammonia-free and odorless formula, making it safe and effective for all hair types. **Bigen Hair Color Powder Black** provides permanent coverage without the need for prior bleaching or lifting, while nourishing and moisturizing your hair. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bigen Hair Color Powder Black**: 
â­ Wash your hair with a suitable shampoo.
â­ Ensure your hair is free from any styling products.
â­ Apply a layer of petroleum jelly to your forehead to prevent staining.
â­ Wear the gloves provided.
â­ Mix the powder with water in a non-metallic bowl.
â­ Apply the mixture to your hair from roots to ends.
â­ Comb your hair thoroughly.
â­ Rinse your hair with warm water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bigen Hair Color Powder Black**: 
â­ Safe coloring powder.
â­ Moisturizing and nourishing ingredients.
â­ Ammonia and henna-free.

description_en:
**Bigen Hair Color Men's Beard Natural Black B101** is the perfect beard color for men. It perfectly covers gray without staining your skin. Its high-viscosity cream formula prevents dripping and mess. Its specialized comb makes application easy, even on short beards.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bigen Hair Color Men's Beard Natural Black B101**:
â­ Squeeze equal amounts of cream from both tubes into the mixing tray.
â­ Apply the mixture using the provided comb, avoiding contact with the nose and mouth.
â­ Rinse the beard with lukewarm water and shampoo after achieving the desired color. Wet the beard before rinsing and gently rub to remove any residue.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bigen Hair Color Men's Beard Natural Black B101**:
â­ Cream Colorant
â­ Cream Developer
â­ Applicator Comb
â­ Mixing Tray
â­ Gloves
â­ Instruction Leaflet

description_en:
**Bigen Lady Color No Ammonia Light/Brown 50** gives you natural-looking, Light Brown hair in just 15 minutes! Ammonia-free, safe, and effective. Natural herbal ingredients moisturize and add shine. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bigen Lady Color No Ammonia Light/Brown 50**:
â­ Wear gloves and mix equal amounts of cream colorant and developer.
â­ Section your hair and apply the color with a brush.
â­ Cover all hair, then rinse thoroughly with shampoo and water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bigen Lady Color No Ammonia Light/Brown 50**:
â­ Cream Colorant: Stearyl Alcohol, Petrolatum, P-phenylenediamine, Water, Ammonium Hydroxide, Ceteth-20, Dimethicone, Peg-20, Achillea Millefolium Extract, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract, Foeniculum Vulgare Fruit Extract, Humulus Lupulus Extract, Melissa Officinalis Leaf Extract, Polyquaternium-6, Pullulan, Viscum Album Fruit Extract, Cyclopentasiloxane, Arginine, Ascorbic Acid, Sodium Sulfite, Trisodium EDTA, 2,4-diaminophenoxyethanol Hcl, Resorcinol, Fragrance.
â­ Developer Cream: Hydrogen Peroxide, Cetyl Alcohol, Cetheth-2, Isostearyl Alcohol, Water, Ppg-4-ceteth-20, Propylene Glycol, Steartrimonium Chloride, Citric Acid.

description_en:
**Bigen Lady Color No Ammonia Medium/Ash Brown 41** gives you natural-looking, Medium Ash Brown hair at home! â­ Perfect gray coverage. â­ Long-lasting color. â­ Moisturizing natural ingredients. â­ Easy and quick application. â­ Ammonia-free, safe for your hair.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bigen Lady Color No Ammonia Medium/Ash Brown 41**: â­ Wear gloves. â­ Mix equal parts of cream colorant and developer. â­ Section hair and apply mixture with a brush. â­ Cover all gray hair. â­ Wash hair thoroughly with shampoo and water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bigen Lady Color No Ammonia Medium/Ash Brown 41**: â­ Cream Colorant: Stearyl Alcohol, Petrolatum, P-phenylenediamine, Water, Ammonium Hydroxide, Ceteth-20, Dimethicone, Peg-20, Achillea Millefolium Extract, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract, Foeniculum Vulgare Fruit Extract, Humulus Lupulus Extract, Melissa Officinalis Leaf Extract, Polyquaternium-6, Pullulan, Viscum Album Fruit Extract, Cyclopentasiloxane, Arginine, Ascorbic Acid, Sodium Sulfite, Trisodium EDTA, 2,4-diaminophenoxyethanol Hcl, Resorcinol, Fragrance. â­ Developer Cream: Hydrogen Peroxide, Cetyl Alcohol, Cetheth-2, Isostearyl Alcohol, Water, Ppg-4-ceteth-20, Propylene Glycol, Steartrimonium Chloride, Citric Acid.

description_en:
**Bigen Lady Color No Ammonia Medium/Blonde 70** gives you natural-looking, Medium-Blonde hair in just 15 minutes! Ammonia-free for a safe and effective coloring experience. Natural herbal ingredients moisturize and add shine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bigen Lady Color No Ammonia Medium/Blonde 70**:
â­ Put on gloves and mix equal amounts of cream colorant and developer.
â­ Section hair and apply color with a brush.
â­ Cover all grey hair.
â­ Wash hair thoroughly with shampoo and water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bigen Lady Color No Ammonia Medium/Blonde 70**:
â­ Cream Colorant: Stearyl Alcohol, Diglycerin, Petrolatum, P-phenylenediamine, Water, Ammonium Hydroxide, Ceteth-20, Dimethicone, Peg-20, Achillea Millefolium Extract, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract, Foeniculum Vulgare Fruit Extract, Humulus Lupulus Extract, Melissa Officinalis Leaf Extract, Polyquaternium-6, Pullulan, Viscum Album Fruit Extract, Cyclopentasiloxane, Arginine, Ascorbic Acid, Sodium Sulfite, Trisodium EDTA, 2,4-diaminophenoxyethanol Hcl, Resorcinol, Fragrance.
â­ Developer Cream: Hydrogen Peroxide, Cetyl Alcohol, Cetheth-2, Isostearyl Alcohol, Water, Ppg-4-ceteth-20, Propylene Glycol, Steartrimonium Chloride, Citric Acid.

**Bigen Lady Color No Ammonia Dark/Blonde 60** provides natural-looking, dark blonde hair from the comfort of your home!  **Bigen Lady Color No Ammonia Dark/Blonde 60** features natural herbal ingredients that moisturize and add shine to your hair. Ammonia-free for safe and effective results.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bigen Lady Color No Ammonia Dark/Blonde 60**:
â­ Wear gloves and mix equal parts cream colorant and developer.
â­ Section hair and apply the mixture using a coloring brush, ensuring grey hair is covered.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with shampoo and water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bigen Lady Color No Ammonia Dark/Blonde 60**:
â­ Cream Colorant: Stearyl Alcohol, Diglycerin, Petrolatum, P-phenylenediamine, Water, Ammonium Hydroxide, Ceteth-20, Dimethicone, Peg-20, Achillea Millefolium Extract, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract, Foeniculum Vulgare Fruit Extract, Humulus Lupulus Extract, Melissa Officinalis Leaf Extract, Polyquaternium-6, Pullulan, Viscum Album Fruit Extract, Cyclopentasiloxane, Arginine, Ascorbic Acid, Sodium Sulfite, Trisodium EDTA, 2,4-diaminophenoxyethanol Hcl, Resorcinol, Fragrance
â­ Developer Cream: Hydrogen Peroxide, Cetyl Alcohol, Cetheth-2, Isostearyl Alcohol, Water, Ppg-4-ceteth-20, Propylene Glycol, Steartrimonium Chloride, Citric Acid

description_en:
**Bigen Lady Colore No Ammonia Deep Chestnut 44** is the perfect choice for the modern, busy woman. With over 30 years of expertise in hair coloring, Bigen offers a unique, fast, and effective formula to color your hair easily in just 10 minutes! Enjoy a refreshing floral scent that lasts long, giving your hair a feeling of comfort and calmness. Thanks to its ammonia-free formula, **Bigen Lady Colore No Ammonia Deep Chestnut 44** guarantees a safe experience free of harmful chemicals.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bigen Lady Colore No Ammonia Deep Chestnut 44**:
â­ Wear the provided gloves.
â­ Mix an appropriate amount of color cream and developer cream in a bowl.
â­ Distribute the mixture evenly on dry hair using a brush.
â­ Wait 10 minutes and then rinse your hair thoroughly with shampoo and water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bigen Lady Colore No Ammonia Deep Chestnut 44**:
â­ Natural herbal extracts (balm mint, chamomile, hops, fennel, mistletoe, yarrow).
â­ Taurine-enriched formula for a long-lasting deep chestnut color.

**Bioderma Pigmentbio Foaming Cream For Sensitive Skin 200 ml** is a gentle, moisturizing daily cleanser suitable for sensitive skin prone to dark spots. It gently removes impurities and enhances skin radiance. It contains a rich formula with active ingredients that help reduce the appearance of dark spots and prevent their reappearance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bioderma Pigmentbio Foaming Cream For Sensitive Skin 200 ml**:
â­ Apply to wet skin.
â­ Gently lather.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Can be used as a face mask once or twice a week: apply a thick layer for 5 minutes, then moisten, lather and rinse thoroughly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bioderma Pigmentbio Foaming Cream For Sensitive Skin 200 ml**:
â­ Active ingredients recognized for their depigmenting action.
â­ Coco Glucoside/Glyceryl Oleate to strengthen the skin barrier.
â­ AHAs and gentle exfoliating microbeads to eliminate color irregularities.

description_en:
**Bioderma Atoderm Nourishing Cleansing Oil 1 L** gently cleanses and instantly soothes sensitive, dry skin. â­ Leaves skin feeling soft, nourished, and comfortable. â­ Suitable for the whole family, including babies and children. â­ Enriched with vegetal biolipids and Vitamin PP. â­ Non-comedogenic and does not sting the eyes. â­ Silky texture with a light fragrance. â­ Effectively cleanses without drying the skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bioderma Atoderm Nourishing Cleansing Oil 1 L**:
â­ Apply to wet skin. â­ Gently massage. â­ Rinse thoroughly. â­ Use once or twice daily.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bioderma Atoderm Nourishing Cleansing Oil 1 L**:
â­ AQUA/WATER/EAU â­ GLYCERIN â­ PEG-7 GLYCERYL COCOATE â­ SODIUM COCOAMPHOACETATE â­ LAURYL GLUCOSIDE â­ COCO-GLUCOSIDE â­ GLYCERYL OLEATE â­ CITRIC ACID â­ PEG-90 GLYCERYL ISOSTEARATE â­ FRAGRANCE (PARFUM) â­ MANNITOL â­ POLYSORBATE 20 â­ XYLITOL â­ LAURETH-2 â­ RHAMNOSE â­ NIACINAMIDE â­ FRUCTOOLIGOSACCHARIDES â­ TOCOPHEROL â­ HYDROGENATED PALM GLYCERIDES CITRATE â­ LECITHIN â­ ASCORBYL PALMITATE. description_en:
**Bioderma Atoderm Shower Gel 1 Liter** is a gentle cleansing shower gel that softens and protects the skin barrier. Its soothing properties reduce sensations of tightness in normal to dry skin. Soap-free, with a naturally bluish colour and subtle fragrance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bioderma Atoderm Shower Gel 1 Liter**:
â­ Apply on wet skin.
â­ Work into a lather.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.
â­ Gently pat dry.
â­ Follow with an Atoderm skincare product.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bioderma Atoderm Shower Gel 1 Liter**:
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau
â­ Sodium Laureth Sulfate
â­ Coco-Betaine
â­ Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate
â­ Glycerin
â­ Methylpropanediol
â­ Coco-Glucoside
â­ Glyceryl Oleate
â­ Disodium Edta
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Capryloyl Glycine
â­ Copper Sulfate
â­ Xylitylglucoside
â­ Anhydroxylitol
â­ Xylitol
â­ Niacinamide
â­ Glucose
â­ Fructooligosaccharides
â­ Mannitol
â­ Tocopherol
â­ Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides Citrate
â­ Lecithin
â­ Rhamnose
â­ Ascorbyl Palmitate
â­ Fragrance (Parfum).

description_en:
**Bioderma Sebium Pore Refiner Cream For Oily Skin 30 ml** is a dermatological face care that helps visibly correct the look of enlarged pores. It's specifically formulated to reduce the appearance of pores for combination to oily skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bioderma Sebium Pore Refiner Cream For Oily Skin 30 ml**: 
â­ Use on cleansed skin. 
â­ Apply all-over or on targeted areas of the face, like the T-zone (forehead, nose, and/or chin).  
â­ Can be used alone or layered with an additional moisturizer. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bioderma Sebium Pore Refiner Cream For Oily Skin 30 ml**: 
â­ Fluidactivâ„¢ patented complex. 
â­ Agaric acid. 
â­ Mattifying powders. 

â­ The exclusive Fluidactivâ„¢ patented complex biologically targets sebum quality, keeping pores from becoming clogged and contributing to visibly reduce the appearance of irregularities. 
â­ Agaric acid, an astringent ingredient, in combination with a smoothing ingredient refines skin texture and preserves its natural radiance. 
â­ Mattifying powders reduce shine. 
â­ Visibly tightens pores for up to 8 hours. 
â­ Good tolerance, non-comedogenic. 
â­ Makeup base.

**Bioderma Pigmentbio Foaming Cream 500 Ml** is a gentle yet effective brightening cleanser for sensitive skin prone to dark spots. It gently cleanses and enhances radiance, formulated with active ingredients to reduce the appearance of dark spots and prevent their formation. Its creamy foam texture leaves skin feeling soft and moisturized.  It can also be used as a face mask for even more effective results.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bioderma Pigmentbio Foaming Cream 500 Ml**:
â­ Apply to wet skin.

â­ AQUA/WATER/EAU

description_en:
**Bioderma Atoderm Gel Douche** is a gentle cleansing shower gel that softens and protects the skin barrier. Its soothing properties reduce sensations of tightness in normal to dry skin. Soap-free, with a naturally bluish color, and a subtle fragrance. â­ Gently cleanses and respects skin balance â­ Soothes and protects â­ Leaves skin soft â­ Rinses easily thanks to its creamy foam â­ Suitable for all skin types

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bioderma Atoderm Gel Douche**: 
â­ Use once or twice a day. 
â­ Apply to wet skin. 
â­ Work into a foam. 
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water. 
â­ Gently dry. 
â­ Follow with an Atoderm skincare product.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bioderma Atoderm Gel Douche**: 
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Coco-Betaine, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Glycerin, Methylpropanediol, Coco-Glucoside, Glyceryl Oleate, Disodium Edta, Citric Acid, Capryloyl Glycine, Copper Sulfate, Xylitylglucoside, Anhydroxylitol, Xylitol, Niacinamide, Glucose, Fructooligosaccharides, Mannitol, Tocopherol, Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides Citrate, Lecithin, Rhamnose, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Fragrance (Parfum). Please refer to the packaging for the most up-to-date ingredient list.

description_en:
**Bioderma Atoderm Intensive Baume 200ml** is an effective moisturizer for dry, very dry, irritated, and eczema-prone skin. It quickly stops itching and reduces the urge to scratch thanks to its anti-itching active ingredient PEA. Enriched with soothing and purifying agents, it instantly soothes irritation. **Bioderma Atoderm Intensive Baume 200ml** restores the skin barrier thanks to its exclusive Lipigeniumâ„¢ complex. It limits the adhesion and proliferation of Staphylococcus aureus and the penetration of allergens. Its fragrance-free, paraben-free, hypoallergenic, and non-comedogenic formula is suitable for sensitive skin.

â­ Use once or twice a day.

description_en:
**Bioderma Atoderm Hand Cream** is a rich and nourishing hand cream designed for dry and sensitive skin. Provides immediate hydration and long-lasting protection.  Restores the skin's natural barrier, making it perfect for daily use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bioderma Atoderm Hand Cream**:
â­ Use daily as needed.
â­ Apply to hands and massage gently until fully absorbed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bioderma Atoderm Hand Cream**:
â­ AQUA/WATER/EAU, GLYCERIN, ALUMINUM STARCH OCTENYLSUCCINATE, ISONONYL ISONONANOATE, BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA) OIL, PALMITIC ACID, STEARIC ACID, SORBITAN STEARATE, AMMONIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYLTAURATE/VP COPOLYMER, PENTYLENE GLYCOL, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, DISODIUM EDTA, MANNITOL, XYLITOL, RHAMNOSE, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, NIACINAMIDE, POLYQUATERNIUM-51, FRAGRANCE (PARFUM). [BI 707]

For external use only. If irritation occurs, discontinue use and consult a healthcare professional. Keep out of reach of children.
