description_en:
**Bioderma Sebium Kerato + 30 milliliters** is the perfect solution to fight acne and skin imperfections. Its efficacy is clinically proven, eliminating pimples and blackheads, reducing existing marks, and preventing the formation of new ones. It features a high-tolerance formula that hydrates the skin for 8 hours without drying it out.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bioderma Sebium Kerato +**:
â­ Apply morning and/or evening to dry, cleansed skin.
â­ Apply to the entire face or just to problem areas.
â­ Use at the first signs of spot formation.
â­ Cleanse your face first using SÃ©bium Gel moussant actif or SÃ©bium Gel moussant.
â­ Apply **Bioderma Sebium Kerato +** to the entire face or problem areas.
â­ Gently massage until absorbed.
â­ In case of sun exposure, apply suitable sun protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bioderma Sebium Kerato +**:
â­ AQUA/WATER/EAU, DI-C12-13 ALKYL MALATE, PROPANEDIOL, PROPYLHEPTYL CAPRYLATE, GLYCERIN, SALICYLIC ACID, SODIUM POLYACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE, ARACHIDYL ALCOHOL, DIMETHICONE, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, BEHENYL ALCOHOL, COCO-GLUCOSIDE, ARACHIDYL GLUCOSIDE, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, SODIUM CITRATE, CHONDRUS CRISPUS EXTRACT, MANNITOL, PROPYL GALLATE, XYLITOL, RHAMNOSE, SODIUM METABISULFITE, TOCOPHEROL, FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)

**Bioderma Photoderm** SPF 50+ Sunscreen Fluid offers lightweight protection for daily use against harmful sun rays. â­ Broad-spectrum UVA/UVB protection. â­ Non-greasy, fast-absorbing formula. â­ Suitable for all skin types, even sensitive skin. â­ Water and sweat resistant. â­ Excellent makeup base.

description_en:
**Bioderma Pigmentbio C-Concentrate 15ml** is a powerful serum that reduces the appearance of dark spots and gives you radiant skin. â­ Reduces the intensity and size of existing spots. â­ Prevents the appearance of new pigmentation spots. â­ Smooths and refines skin texture. â­ Evens and brightens complexion. â­ Hydrates for 8 hours. â­ Non-comedogenic. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bioderma Pigmentbio C-Concentrate 15ml**: 
â­ For first use, press firmly on the cap to release vitamin C. â­ Unscrew the white cap and check that all vitamin C powder has been released. â­ Screw on the dropper and shake for 10 seconds to mix vitamin C. â­ Apply 5 drops every evening to face and neck after cleansing. â­ Can be used before Pigmentbio Night Renewer. â­ Avoid the eye contour area. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bioderma Pigmentbio C-Concentrate 15ml**: 
â­ AQUA/WATER/EAU, PROPANEDIOL, GLYCOLIC ACID, GLYCERIN, DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL, PROPYLHEPTYL CAPRYLATE, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, ASCORBYL GLUCOSIDE, NIACINAMIDE, SALICYLIC ACID, AMMONIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYLTAURATE/VP COPOLYMER, SORBITAN SESQUIOLEATE, PENTYLENE GLYCOL, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, XANTHAN GUM, SODIUM CITRATE, LYSINE, AZELAIC ACID, MANNITOL, XYLITOL, SODIUM METABISULFITE, ANDROGRAPHIS PANICULATA LEAF EXTRACT, RHAMNOSE, SACCHARIDE ISOMERATE, GLYCYRRHIZA GLABRA (LICORICE) ROOT EXTRACT, TOCOPHEROL, FRUCTOOLIGOSACCHARIDES, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE,LAMINARIA OCHROLEUCA EXTRACT, FRAGRANCE (PARFUM).

description_en:
**Bioderma Hydrabio Hyaluronic Serum** 30ml, an anti-aging serum with antioxidants, allows the skin to reactivate its natural hydration mechanisms and retain the water essential for its balance. Formulated with HYALU+ Technology, it combines high-molecular-weight hyaluronic acid for immediate and intense surface hydration and a self-rehydrating sugar to boost hyaluronic acid synthesis and protect its life cycle.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bioderma Hydrabio Hyaluronic Serum**:
â­ Apply in the morning and/or evening after toner and before moisturizer.
â­ Apply **Bioderma Hydrabio Hyaluronic Serum** onto the face.
â­ Gently massage until absorbed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bioderma Hydrabio Hyaluronic Serum**:
â­ Low molecular weight hyaluronic acid: Plumps skin and reduces fine lines and wrinkles.
â­ High molecular weight hyaluronic acid: Intensely moisturizes skin.
â­ Carnosine: Provides powerful antioxidant protection.
â­ Niacinamide: Strengthens skin barrier to reduce dehydration.

description_en:
**Bioderma Sebium Lotion**, a balancing, liquid toning lotion that helps regulate skin's pH and visible oil production. â­ Hydrates for up to 8 hours. â­ Regulates sebum production and skin pH balance. â­ Diminishes the appearance of irregularities. â­ Visibly tightens pores. Suitable for adults and teens. All Bioderma products are formulated according to ecobiology principles.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bioderma Sebium Lotion**: 
â­ Apply morning and/or evening. 
â­ Apply to the face after cleansing. 
â­ Gently massage into skin using fingertips or a cotton pad. 
â­ Follow up by applying your daily skincare.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bioderma Sebium Lotion**: 
â­ AQUA/WATER/EAU â­ PEG-11 METHYL ETHER DIMETHICONE â­ BUTYLENE GLYCOL â­ GLYCERIN â­ FOMES OFFICINALIS (MUSHROOM) EXTRACT â­ CAPRYLOYL GLYCINE â­ POLYSORBATE 20 â­ SODIUM CITRATE â­ ZINC GLUCONATE â­ SALICYLIC ACID â­ SODIUM HYDROXIDE â­ MANNITOL â­ SODIUM METABISULFITE â­ XYLITOL â­ RHAMNOSE â­ PYRIDOXINE HCL â­ PROPYL GALLATE â­ PEG-40 HYDROGENATED CASTOR OIL â­ FRUCTOOLIGOSACCHARIDES â­ PHENOXYETHANOL â­ FRAGRANCE (PARFUM). Please refer to the ingredient list on the packaging for the most up-to-date information.

description_en:
**Bioderma Sebium Hydra Cleanser**, an eco-friendly soothing cleansing balm, designed to restore comfort during intensive acne treatments. Experience gentle cleansing, 24-hour hydration, and a calming pH balance. Nourish your skin and embrace comfort with **Bioderma Sebium Hydra Cleanser**, your oasis in acne treatment!

â­ Gentle and soothing cleansing
â­ 24-hour hydration and comfort
â­ Physiological pH for skin balance
â­ Highly tolerated formulation
â­ Luxuriously enveloping balm texture

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bioderma Sebium Hydra Cleanser**: 
â­ Apply in the morning and/or night on damp skin.
â­ Gently massage and rinse thoroughly. Pat dry without friction.
â­ Can be used as a makeup remover.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bioderma Sebium Hydra Cleanser**: Contains 93% biomimetic ingredients, gentle cleansing agents, DAFTM Complex, and biomimetic lipids like shea butter.

description_en:
**Photoderm Spray Spf 50 +200 Ml** is a very high protection spray for sensitive skin, suitable for the whole family. It combines UVA/UVB filters and patented Cellular Bioprotection, providing enhanced protection against the harmful effects of UV rays.  It features a light texture that spreads easily without leaving white marks, and also moisturizes the skin. It offers very high protection that activates the skin's natural defenses.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Photoderm Spray Spf 50 +200 Ml**:
â­ Use several times a day when exposed to the sun.
â­ Apply evenly and generously before sun exposure (a small amount reduces protection).
â­ For the face, spray onto your hands first, then apply.
â­ Reapply frequently, before and after each swim, bath, or sporting activity.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Photoderm Spray Spf 50 +200 Ml**:(Ingredients will be added here when available)

description_en:
**Bioderma Photoderm Cream Spf50+ Doree- Light 40ml** offers the highest sun protection for sensitive and dry skin.  It provides up to 8 hours of hydration and protection from harmful UV rays.  Its smooth, creamy texture and tinted formula create a natural, radiant complexion.  The antioxidants protect skin cells and prevent premature aging. It's water, heat, and humidity resistant. Fragrance-free.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bioderma Photoderm Cream Spf50+ Doree- Light 40ml**:
â­ Apply evenly and generously before sun exposure.
â­ Reapply frequently, before and after swimming, sweating, or playing sports.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bioderma Photoderm Cream Spf50+ Doree- Light 40ml**:
â­ SUN ACTIVE DEFENSEâ„¢ patent
â­ High-performance filters protect against UVB and UVA damage
â­ Powerful antioxidants
â­ Gentle formula for sensitive skin

**Bioderma Atoderm Intensive Moussant 500 milliliters** gently cleanses and soothes very dry to atopic sensitive skin. Its rich, moisturizing formula leaves skin feeling soft and comfortable without drying it out.  Perfect for daily use.

â­ Rinse with lukewarm water.
â­ Pat your skin dry with a soft towel.

â­ AQUA/WATER/EAU

**Bioderma Photoderm Gel Cream Spot Age Spf 50+ 40 Ml** offers maximum sun protection with antioxidant properties. It reduces the appearance of dark spots and wrinkles, rejuvenates, and moisturizes the skin.  Its unique formula combines high-protection sun filters with effective anti-aging ingredients.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bioderma Photoderm Gel Cream Spot Age Spf 50+ 40 Ml**:

â­ Reapply after sweating, swimming, or towel drying.

description_en:
**Bioderma XDefense Ultra Fluid SPF50+ Shade 03 - 40 ml** is an ultra-fluid, SPF50+ sun protection fluid, ideal for protecting your skin from harmful sun rays and pollution. It absorbs quickly without leaving any greasy residue.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bioderma XDefense Ultra Fluid SPF50+ Shade 03 - 40 ml**
â­ Apply evenly and generously to the face and neck before sun exposure.
â­ Reapply every two hours, or after swimming or sweating.
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Can be used as a makeup base.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bioderma XDefense Ultra Fluid SPF50+ Shade 03 - 40 ml**
â­ AQUA/WATER/EAU, DIETHYLAMINO HYDROXYBENZOYL HEXYL BENZOATE, HOMOSALATE, DIISOPROPYL SEBACATE, BIS-ETHYLHEXYLOXYPHENOL METHOXYPHENYL TRIAZINE, DIBUTYL ADIPATE, PROPANEDIOL, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, ETHYLHEXYL TRIAZONE, GLYCERIN, SILICA, TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), SUCROSE LAURATE, UNDECANE, C20-22 ALKYL PHOSPHATE, SODIUM STEAROYL GLUTAMATE, C20-22 ALCOHOLS, SODIUM POLYACRYLATE, TRIDECANE, CAPRYLOYL GLYCINE, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, SODIUM CITRATE, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, ECTOIN, MANNITOL, XYLITOL, RHAMNOSE, SODIUM LAUROYL GLUTAMATE, LYSINE, MAGNESIUM CHLORIDE, FRUCTOOLIGOSACCHARIDES, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, TOCOPHEROL, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER) SEED OIL, LAMINARIA OCHROLEUCA EXTRACT. description_en:
**Bioderma** XDefense Ultra Fluid SPF50+ offers superior sun protection and pollution defense. Formulated with ecobiological principles, it respects your skin's ecosystem and preserves its health. It activates the Nrf2 pathway, boosting the skin's production of pollutant-neutralizing and antioxidant enzymes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bioderma** XDefense Ultra Fluid:
â­ Apply evenly and generously daily to face and neck before sun exposure.
â­ Reapply after sweating, swimming, or towel drying.
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Excellent makeup base.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bioderma** XDefense Ultra Fluid:
â­ AQUA/WATER/EAU, DIETHYLAMINO HYDROXYBENZOYL HEXYL BENZOATE, HOMOSALATE, DIISOPROPYL SEBACATE, BIS-ETHYLHEXYLOXYPHENOL METHOXYPHENYL TRIAZINE, DIBUTYL ADIPATE, PROPANEDIOL, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, ETHYLHEXYL TRIAZONE, GLYCERIN, SILICA, TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), SUCROSE LAURATE, UNDECANE, C20-22 ALKYL PHOSPHATE, SODIUM STEAROYL GLUTAMATE, C20-22 ALCOHOLS, SODIUM POLYACRYLATE, TRIDECANE, CAPRYLOYL GLYCINE, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, SODIUM CITRATE, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, ECTOIN, MANNITOL, XYLITOL, RHAMNOSE, SODIUM LAUROYL GLUTAMATE, LYSINE, MAGNESIUM CHLORIDE, FRUCTOOLIGOSACCHARIDES, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, TOCOPHEROL, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER) SEED OIL, LAMINARIA OCHROLEUCA EXTRACT. description_en:
**Bioderma XDefense Ultra Fluid SPF50+ Shade 04 - 40 ml** provides optimal protection against harmful sun rays and pollution. This product is based on ecobiology principles, respecting the skin's ecosystem and preserving its health. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bioderma XDefense Ultra Fluid SPF50+ Shade 04 - 40 ml**:
â­ Apply several times a day when exposed to the sun.
â­ Can be used alone or as a makeup base.
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Apply evenly and generously to the face and neck before sun exposure.
â­ Reapply after sweating, swimming, or towel drying.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bioderma XDefense Ultra Fluid SPF50+ Shade 04 - 40 ml**:
â­ AQUA/WATER/EAU
â­ DIETHYLAMINO HYDROXYBENZOYL HEXYL BENZOATE
â­ HOMOSALATE
â­ DIISOPROPYL SEBACATE
â­ BIS-ETHYLHEXYLOXYPHENOL METHOXYPHENYL TRIAZINE
â­ DIBUTYL ADIPATE
â­ PROPANEDIOL
â­ ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE
â­ ETHYLHEXYL TRIAZONE
â­ GLYCERIN
â­ and other effective ingredients.

description_en:
**Bioderma Photoderm Brume Invisible Spf50 150Ml** is a fragranced mist of high UVA/UVB sun protection that protects cells against oxidative stress thanks to antioxidant Vitamin E. â­ Photostable. â­ Non-comedogenic. â­ Tested under dermatological control. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bioderma Photoderm Brume Invisible Spf50 150Ml**: 
â­ Apply on wet or dry skin. 
â­ Spray generously before sun exposure (a reduced amount decreases the level of sun protection). 
â­ Renew after each bath or friction. 
â­ Spray in the palm of your hand before any application on the face. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bioderma Photoderm Brume Invisible Spf50 150Ml**: 
â­ Butane, Dibutyl Adipate, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Dicaprylyl Ether, Diethylamino Hydroxybenzoyl Hexyl Benzoate, Homosalate, Bis-Ethylhecyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyl Triazine, Diisopropyl Sebacate, Propane, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Ethylhexyl Triazone, Isobutane, Tocopherol, Glycine Soja (soybean) Oil, Fragrance (parfum).

**Bioderma Photoderm M Spf50+ Light 40Ml** is an advanced sunscreen offering superior protection against harmful sun rays. â­ High UVA/UVB protection. â­ Reinforced protection against visible radiation. â­ Contains glabridin, an active tyrosinase inhibitor. â­ Smoothes blemishes and evens skin tone. â­ Suitable for melasma-prone skin, and recommended for pregnant women. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bioderma Photoderm M Spf50+ Light 40Ml**: â­ Use daily to minimize pigmentation risk. â­ Apply to the face in the morning after your day cream. â­ Reapply frequently before and after swimming or sports activities. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bioderma Photoderm M Spf50+ Light 40Ml**: â­ Effective UVA/UVB filters. â­ Glabridin. â­ Other ingredients to enhance skin protection and hydration.

description_en:
**Blevit** Special Multigrain and Fiber Cereal is a delicious and healthy option for your little one! â­ Provides optimal nutrition with a diverse blend of grains, vitamins, and minerals. â­ Supports the immune system with high iron and zinc content. â­ Contributes to healthy growth and development thanks to calcium, vitamin C, and vitamin D. â­ High in fiber (4g/dose) for easy digestion. â­ Protects the intestines with prebiotics (FOS and Inulin). â­ 0% added sugar. â­ No palm oil. â­ No preservatives or added salts. â­ GMO-free. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Blevit**: â­ Serve as directed by your doctor or nutritionist. â­ Store in a cool, dry place. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Blevit**: â­ Wheat, Rice, Corn, Rye, Oat, Buckwheat, Spelt, Barley, FOS, Inulin, Vitamins, and Minerals.

**Blevit Special Ad Carrots And Rice 0% Added Suger 250 Gm** is the perfect baby food for the first months. â­ Contains a combination of rice, hydrolyzed rice, and carrot flakes, making it easy to digest and with astringent properties. â­ Helps reduce the number of bowel movements and increase their consistency. â­ Rich in sodium, potassium, pectin, and cellulose. â­ Protects the intestines thanks to its 3% GOS prebiotics content. â­ Supports the immune system thanks to its high iron and zinc content. â­ Contributes to growth and development thanks to its calcium, vitamin C, and vitamin D content. â­ Free of added sugar, palm oil, gluten, preservatives, and added salts. â­ GMO-free. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Blevit Special Ad Carrots And Rice 0% Added Suger 250 Gm**: â­ Prepare according to the instructions on the package. â­ Serve to the baby after making sure its temperature is suitable.

**Bourjois Healthy Mix BB Cream** offers full, even coverage with a radiant finish, all while maintaining a natural, flawless complexion. Its vegan formula, made with 81% ingredients of natural origin, evens skin tone, minimizes the appearance of pores, and effectively conceals imperfections and redness.  Infused with calming Schisandra berry extract, pore-regulating green lentil, and antioxidant vitamins C, E, and B5, it helps you achieve healthy-looking, radiant skin all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix BB Cream**:
â­ Apply to clean skin.

description_en:
**Bourjois Healthy Mix BB Cream - Ivory** provides full, even coverage with a radiant finish for a naturally flawless complexion. It evens skin tone, minimizes pores, and conceals imperfections. The 81% naturally derived vegan formula features Schisandra berry extract, green lentil, and Vitamins C, E, and B5 for all-day radiant, healthy-looking skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix BB Cream - Ivory**:
â­ Apply to clean skin.
â­ Blend evenly from the center of the face outwards.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Healthy Mix BB Cream - Ivory**:
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau, Ammonium Acrylates Copolymer, Copernicia Cerifera Cera/Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Cire De Carnauba, Glyceryl Stearate Se, Candelilla Cera/Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax/Cire De Candelilla, Sucrose Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Vp/Hexadecene Copolymer, Propanediol, C10-18 Triglycerides, Lecithin, Polybutene, Cera Microcrystallina/Microcrystalline Wax/Cire Microcrystalline, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Oleic Acid, Alcohol Denat., Stearic Acid, Arginine, Caesalpinia Spinosa Gum, Stearyl Stearate, Benzyl Alcohol, Caprylyl Glycol, Disodium Deceth-6 Sulfosuccinate, Panthenol, Laureth-30, Simethicone, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Chenopodium Quinoa Seed Extract, Hydrolyzed Cicer Seed Extract, Lens Esculenta (Lentil) Seed Extract, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Ultramarines (Ci 77007), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891)].

**Bourjois Contour Edition T11 Funky Brown Lip Liner** - The secret to a flawless lip look!  **Bourjois Contour Edition Lip Pencil** features a smooth, creamy texture enriched with shea butter and grape seed oil for comfortable 12-hour wear. It delivers an undetectable perfecting line and prevents lipstick bleeding or feathering. Available in 12 stunning shades.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Contour Edition Lip Pencil**: 
â­ Line your lips, starting at the cupid's bow, drawing the outer corners and the middle of your lower lip.
â­ Use small strokes to connect the lines and outline your entire lip edge.
â­ Blend the lip contour with a lip brush from the edge of the lips towards the center.
â­ Apply a matching lipstick color.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Contour Edition Lip Pencil**: 
â­ Shea Butter
â­ Grape Seed Oil

description_en:
**Bourjois Brow Reveal Pencil Dark Brown**: Reveal the natural beauty of your brows with **Bourjois Brow Reveal Pencil Dark Brown**. This pencil gives you effortless yet precisely filled and natural-looking brows. This 2-in-1 eyebrow makeup features a brush and a 1.7mm ultrafine tip pencil. Its creamy texture is highly pigmented, easy to blend, and lightweight.  Its vegan formula is dermatologist and ophthalmologist tested. Made with shea butter and vitamins C & E, the smudge-resistant color lasts up to 10 hours.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Brow Reveal Pencil Dark Brown**:
â­ Gently brush eyebrows to shape.
â­ Draw eyebrows with light strokes, following their natural line to fill in sparse areas, then color the inside by modulating the intensity of the tint.

Its new soft and gliding formula is easy to apply on the inner and outer rims of the eye, ensuring a precise line and irresistible contour.  **Bourjois Khol & Contour 002 Ultra - Black** does not smudge or transfer, staying comfortable all day. Available in ten extra-long wear shades, it's ophthalmologist and dermatologist tested and safe for contact lens wearers.

â­ Apply a line on the upper and lower lash line.

description_en:
**Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation - 51 Light Vanilla** gives you healthy-looking skin without compromising on coverage. This liquid foundation instantly brightens and evens out your skin tone thanks to a healthy mix of vitamins C, E, and B5. Its lightweight vegan formula is made with 85% natural ingredients and is available in 22 beautiful shades. **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation - 51 Light Vanilla** offers buildable coverage, concealing imperfections and signs of fatigue for a flawless complexion that lasts all day. Bourjois, a leading French cosmetics brand, brings you the essence of Parisian beauty.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation - 51 Light Vanilla**:
â­ Apply all over the face using a brush or sponge.
â­ Focus on the T-zone, blending outwards.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation - 51 Light Vanilla**:
â­Aqua/Water/Eau, Dicaprylyl Ether, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Glycerin, Corn Starch Modified, Isododecane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Sodium Chloride, TRI(POLYGLYCERYL-3/LAURYL) HYDROGENATED TRILINOLEATE, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Silica, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, 2,3-Butanediol, Propylene Carbonate, Parfum/Fragrance, Mica, Tocopherol, Sodium Benzoate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Chlorphenesin, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Propylene Glycol, Panthenol, Cucumis Melo (Melon) Fruit Extract, Methicone, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Fruit Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Pantolactone, Benzoic Acid, Sorbic Acid, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)]

**Bourjois Rouge Velvet The Lipstick 16 - Brown**, a luxurious long-lasting lipstick that hydrates and nourishes your lips without drying them out. The secret lies in its moisturizing waxes, light oils, and rich pigments, giving you a velvety soft finish. One swipe delivers intense color that lasts up to 24 hours! 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Rouge Velvet The Lipstick 16 - Brown**: 
â­ Apply color to the center of your upper and lower lips. 
â­ Blend the color from the outer corners towards the center of your lips. 
â­ Optional: Add a layer of lip gloss for a more shiny look. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Rouge Velvet The Lipstick 16 - Brown**: 
â­ Moisturizing waxes 
â­ Light oils 
â­ Rich pigments

**Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation** - 53 Light Beige: Get a naturally radiant look with flawless coverage! This liquid foundation instantly brightens and evens your skin tone thanks to a healthy mix of vitamins C, E, and B5. It provides intense hydration that lasts all day long. The vegan and lightweight formula is made with 85% natural ingredients and is available in 22 beautiful shades. It offers buildable coverage, concealing imperfections and enhancing your complexion. Enjoy your day with confidence! Bourjois, a renowned French brand, embodies Parisian beauty for 160 years.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation**:
â­ Apply **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation** all over your face using a brush or sponge.

â­ Aqua/Water/Eau

â­ Trimethylsiloxysilicate

â­ and other natural ingredients.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Khol & Contour Charkohl #001- Black**: 
â­ Apply to upper or lower eyelids. â­ Use the integrated sharpener for precise application. â­ Complete your look with Bourjois waterproof mascara. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Khol & Contour Charkohl #001- Black**: 
â­ DIMETHICONE, SYNTHETIC WAX, POLYMETHYLSILSESQUIOXANE, LAUROYL LYSINE, DIISOSTEARYL MALATE, OCTYLDODECANOL, ISODECYLNEOPENTANOATE, DICALCIUM PHOSPHATE, POLYHYDROXYSTEARIC ACID, DISTEARDIMONIUM HECTORITE, PROPYLENE CARBONATE, LECITHIN, TOCOPHEROL, ASCORBYL PALMITATE, CITRIC ACID, [May Contain/May Contain/+/-: IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), FERRIC AMMONIUM FERROCYANIDE (CI 77510), MICA, D&C BLACK NO. 2 [nano] (CI 77266), FD&C BLUE NO. 1 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 42090)].

description_en:
**Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation - 54 Beige**, achieve a natural-looking radiance with flawless coverage. This liquid foundation instantly brightens and evens out your skin tone with a healthy mix of vitamins C, E, and B5. It provides intense hydration that lasts all day long.  The lightweight, vegan formula is made with 85% natural ingredients and is available in 22 beautiful shades.  **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation - 54 Beige** offers buildable coverage, concealing imperfections and enhancing your complexion. Enjoy your day with confidence!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation - 54 Beige**:
â­ Apply the foundation all over your face using a brush or sponge.
â­ Focus on the T-zone, blending outwards.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation - 54 Beige**:
â­Aqua/Water/Eau, Dicaprylyl Ether, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Glycerin, Corn Starch Modified, Isododecane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Sodium Chloride, TRI(POLYGLYCERYL-3/LAURYL) HYDROGENATED TRILINOLEATE, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Silica, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, 2,3-Butanediol, Propylene Carbonate, Parfum/Fragrance, Mica, Tocopherol, Sodium Benzoate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Chlorphenesin, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Propylene Glycol, Panthenol, Cucumis Melo (Melon) Fruit Extract, Methicone, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Fruit Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Pantolactone, Benzoic Acid, Sorbic Acid, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)]

**Bourjois Rouge Velvet The Lipstick 11 - Red**, a luxurious, long-lasting lipstick with a unique moisturizing formula. â­ Rich formula with hydrating waxes, light oils, and rich pigments. â­ Velvety soft finish. â­ Intense color that lasts up to 24 hours. â­ Precise application thanks to its innovative design. â­ Doesn't dry out lips, keeps them soft and hydrated.

**Bourjois Khol & Contour Hennadorable#003- Brown**, a 2-in-1 kohl pencil: eyeliner & pencil with an integrated sharpener that suits the eye contour and its interior for effective and burr-free makeup. Its creamy and shiny formula offers intense color and easy application thanks to its ultra-precise applicator.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Khol & Contour Hennadorable#003- Brown**:
â­ Suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers.
â­ Ophthalmologically tested.
â­ Use the eyeliner flush with the lower eyelashes to intensify and emphasize the eye contour.
â­ Apply the eyeliner to the upper eyelashes to define the look.
â­ Complete the look with a waterproof Bourjois mascara for a long-lasting makeup result.
â­ For better and more accurate application, use the pencil sharpener as a tip.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Khol & Contour Hennadorable#003- Brown**:
â­ DIMETHICONE
â­ SYNTHETIC WAX
â­ POLYMETHYLSILSESQUIOXANE
â­ LAUROYL LYSINE
â­ DIISOSTEARYL MALATE
â­ OCTYLDODECANOL
â­ ISODECYL NEOPENTANOATE
â­ DICALCIUM PHOSPHATE
â­ POLYHYDROXYSTEARIC ACID
â­ DISTEARDIMONIUM HECTORITE
â­ PROPYLENE CARBONATE
â­ LECITHIN
â­ TOCOPHEROL
â­ ASCORBYL PALMITATE
â­ CITRIC ACID
â­ [May Contain/May Contain/+/-: IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), FERRIC AMMONIUM FERROCYANIDE (CI 77510), MICA, D&C BLACK NO. 2 [nano] (CI 77266), FD&C BLUE NO. 1 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 42090)].

description_en:
**Bourjois Fabuleux Air Mat Foundation -04 Beige** provides a smooth, matte finish that lasts up to 24 hours. Its lightweight formula allows skin to breathe and is enhanced with micronized powders to cover imperfections while maintaining a natural look. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Fabuleux Air Mat Foundation -04 Beige**: 
â­ Apply foundation to the center of your face. 
â­ Blend outwards and upwards. 
â­ Enjoy a flawless look that lasts all day. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Fabuleux Air Mat Foundation -04 Beige**: (Ingredients may vary, please check your packaging) 
â­ Micronized powders 
â­ Other ingredients (For a full list of ingredients, please refer to packaging)

title_ar: Ø¨ÙˆØ±Ø¬ÙˆØ§ ÙØ§Ø¨ÙˆÙ„ÙŠÙˆ Ø¥ÙŠØ± Ù…Ø§Øª ÙØ§ÙˆÙ†Ø¯ÙŠØ´Ù† -03 Ø¨ÙŠØ¬ ÙØ§ØªØ­
description_en:
**Bourjois Fabuleux Air Mat Foundation -03 Light Beige** is designed for a smooth, matte finish that lasts up to 24 hours without the mask effect. Its lightweight, non-drying formula allows your skin to breathe.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Fabuleux Air Mat Foundation -03 Light Beige**:
â­ Apply to the center of your face.
â­ Blend outwards for even coverage.
â­ Enjoy a flawless, natural look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Fabuleux Air Mat Foundation -03 Light Beige**:
â­ Aqua (Water), Dimethicone, Cyclopentasiloxane, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Caprylyl Methicone,Propylene Glycol,Peg/Ppg-18/18 Dimethicone, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Sodium Chloride, Isononyl Isononanoate, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Zinc Pca, Silica, Phenoxyethanol,Tocopheryl Acetate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Lysolecithin, Chlorphenesin, Parfum (Fragrance), Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Peg/Ppg-19/19 Dimethicone, Cassia Angustifolia Seed Polysaccharide, Alcohol Denat.,Lauroyl Lysine, Disodium Edta, Geraniol, Linalool, Gossypium Herbaceum (Cotton) Extract, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Methicone, Tocopherol. [+/- (May Contain): Mica, Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77288 (Chromium Oxide Greens), Ci 77742 (Manganese Violet)]

It provides a perfect line that lasts up to 12 hours and prevents lipstick bleeding. Available in 12 shades to coordinate with all your lipstick colors. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Contour Edition Lip Liner**: 
â­ Line your lips, starting at the cupid's bow, drawing the outer corners, and the middle of your lower lip.

â­ Blend the lip contour with a lip brush from the edge of the lips towards the center.
â­ Apply lipstick in a matching color.

â­ Shea Butter
â­ Grape Seed Oil

title_en: **Bourjois Brow Reveal Pencil Soft Brown**
title_ar: **Ø¨ÙˆØ±Ø¬ÙˆØ§ Ù‚Ù„Ù… ØªØ­Ø¯ÙŠØ¯ Ø§Ù„Ø­ÙˆØ§Ø¬Ø¨ Ø¨Ù†ÙŠ ÙØ§ØªØ­**
description_en:
**Bourjois Brow Reveal Pencil Soft Brown** Discover the natural beauty of your brows with the **Bourjois Brow Reveal Micro Brow Pencil**. It gives you effortless yet precisely filled and natural-looking brows. This 2-in-1 eyebrow makeup includes a brush and a 1.7mm ultrafine tip pencil. The creamy texture cosmetic is highly pigmented, easy to blend, and lightweight.  Its vegan formula is dermatologist and ophthalmologist tested. Made with shea butter and vitamins C & E, the smudge-resistant color lasts up to 10 hours.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Brow Reveal Pencil Soft Brown**
â­ Gently brush your eyebrows to shape them.
â­ Draw light lines following your natural brow shape to fill in sparse areas.
â­ Color the inner areas, adjusting the intensity as needed.
â­ Blend with the brush for a natural finish.
â­ Tip: Use two shades, one lighter and one darker, to mimic natural hair.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Brow Reveal Pencil Soft Brown**
â­ Diisostearyl Malate
â­ C20-40 Acid
â­ Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride
â­ C20-40 Alcohols
â­ Mica
â­ Synthetic Wax
â­ Isoamyl Laurate
â­ Glyceryl Behenate/Eicosadioate
â­ Ethylcellulose
â­ Boron Nitride
â­ Shea Butter
â­ Tocopherol
â­ Ascorbyl Palmitate
â­ Propanediol
â­ [May Contain: Iron]

description_en:
**Bourjois Brow Reveal Pencil 004 Dark Brunette**, the perfect automatic brow pencil to highlight the beauty of your brows. This angled tip pencil gives you a precise and easy application, allowing you to shape your brows easily and professionally. Its super-gliding formula guarantees a smooth and flawless application, giving you perfectly groomed brows. **Bourjois Brow Reveal Pencil 004 Dark Brunette** is long-lasting and enhances the shape of your brows, helping to reshape and magnify them. Choose it for beautifully defined brows. Say OUI to chic and beautiful brows! 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Brow Reveal Pencil 004 Dark Brunette**: 
â­ Use the angled tip to draw fine, soft lines. 
â­ Start from the inside and work your way outwards to shape your brows. 
â­ Use a brush to comb your brows after applying the product.

description_en:
**Bourjois Fabuleux Air Mat Foundation - 02 Vanille** provides high coverage with a natural matte finish that lasts up to 24 hours. Its light-as-air texture allows skin to breathe while absorbing excess sebum thanks to zinc extract and silica beads. Suitable for all skin types, including combination skin, with pigments that stay fixed for a flawless, long-lasting result.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Fabuleux Air Mat Foundation - 02 Vanille**:
â­ Apply foundation to the center of your face.
â­ Blend outwards and upwards.
â­ Enjoy a perfect matte look that lasts up to 24 hours.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Fabuleux Air Mat Foundation - 02 Vanille**:
â­ Zinc Extract
â­ Silica Beads
â­ Encapsulated Pigments
â­ Non-fat Evanescent Oils

Avoid direct contact with eyes. In case of irritation, discontinue use and consult a physician. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.

title_ar: Ø¨ÙˆØ±Ø¬ÙˆØ§ Ù‡ÙŠÙ„Ø«ÙŠ Ù…ÙŠÙƒØ³ Ø®Ø§ÙÙŠ Ø¹ÙŠÙˆØ¨ 53 Ù‚ÙˆÙ„Ø¯Ù† Ø¨ÙŠØ¬
description_en:
**Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Concealer - 53 Golden Beige** gives you a healthy, radiant complexion! This amazing concealer provides perfect coverage to hide blemishes, dark circles, and signs of fatigue, with a vegan formula enriched with Vitamins C, E, and B5 for up to 24 hours of hydration. Its unique formula, made with 84% natural ingredients, gives you a natural, radiant look. Available in nine shades to suit all skin types. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Concealer - 53 Golden Beige**: 
â­ Apply the concealer to dark circles and blemishes. 
â­ Gently blend with your fingertips or a makeup brush.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Concealer - 53 Golden Beige**:
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau, Corn Starch Modified, Dicaprylyl Ether, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Isododecane, Glycerin, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Silica, Sodium Chloride, TRI(POLYGLYCERYL3/LAURYL) HYDROGENATED TRILINOLEATE, Stearalkonium Bentonite, 2,3 Butanediol, Cetyl PEG/PPG10/1 Dimethicone, Mica, Propylene Carbonate, Parfum/Fragrance, Tocopherol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Sodium Benzoate, Chlorphenesin, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Propylene Glycol, Panthenol, Methicone, Cucumis Melo (Melon) Fruit Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Fruit Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Benzoic Acid, Sorbic Acid, Pentaerythrityl Tetraditbutyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)]

title_en: Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation - 52 Vanilla
title_ar: Ø¨ÙˆØ±Ø¬ÙˆØ§ Ù‡ÙŠÙ„Ø«ÙŠ Ù…ÙƒØ³ ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ø£Ø³Ø§Ø³ 52 ÙØ§Ù†ÙŠÙ„Ø§
description_en:
**Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation - 52 Vanilla**, achieve a natural-looking radiance with flawless coverage. This liquid foundation instantly brightens and evens your skin tone thanks to a healthy mix of vitamins C, E, and B5. It provides intense hydration that lasts all day long. The lightweight, vegan formula is made with 85% natural ingredients and is available in 22 beautiful shades. **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation - 52 Vanilla** offers buildable coverage, concealing imperfections and signs of fatigue for a naturally enhanced complexion. Enjoy your day with confidence! Bourjois is a renowned French brand, delivering Parisian beauty for 160 years.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation - 52 Vanilla**:
â­ Apply the foundation all over your face using a brush or sponge.
â­ Focus on the T-zone, blending outwards for a radiant and flawless complexion that lasts all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation - 52 Vanilla**:
â­Aqua/Water/Eau, Dicaprylyl Ether, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Glycerin, Corn Starch Modified, Isododecane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Sodium Chloride, TRI(POLYGLYCERYL-3/LAURYL) HYDROGENATED TRILINOLEATE, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Silica, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, 2,3-Butanediol, Propylene Carbonate, Parfum/Fragrance, Mica, Tocopherol, Sodium Benzoate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Chlorphenesin, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Propylene Glycol, Panthenol, Cucumis Melo (Melon) Fruit Extract, Methicone, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Fruit Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Pantolactone, Benzoic Acid, Sorbic Acid, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)]

â­ Aqua/water/eau, paraffin, cera alba/beeswax/beeswax, stearic acid, pvp, cetyl alcohol, propylene glycol, arginine, polysorbate 20, copernicia cerifera cera/copernicia cerifera (carnauba) wax/carnauba wax, synthetic wax, panthenol, talc, candelilla cera/euphorbia cerifera (candelilla) wax/candelilla wax, phenoxyethanol, caprylyl glycol, hectorite, simethicone, cera microcrstallina/microcrystalline wax/microcrystalline wax, argania spinosa kernel oil, tocopheryl acetate, hydrolyzed collagen (derived from fish), silica, pantolactone, hdi/trimethylol hexyllactone crosspolymer, polyethylene, hydrolyzed keratin, sodium sulfate, potassium sorbate, sodium benzoate.

**Bourjois Mascara Twist Up The Volume 23 - Black** gives you that captivating cat-eye look! This amazing mascara volumizes and defines your lashes with precision, thanks to its curved brush that gives you a wide-eyed, irresistible look.  Its formula enriched with silk proteins gives intense volume to your lashes while keeping them soft. Try it now!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Mascara Twist Up The Volume 23 - Black**:
â­ Look down into a mirror and apply the mascara with a wriggling motion from side-to-side, starting at the roots.
â­ Use the clever brush tip to intensify the curve.
â­ Look up and do the same on the lower lashes.
â­ Apply a second coat if necessary.

â­ Silk Proteins

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Velvet The Pencil 02 Amourose**:
â­ Step 1: Precisely define your lips.
â­ Step 2: Fill your lips in one stroke for a flawless matte finish.

**Bourjois Fabuleux Air Mat Foundation** - 01 Rose Ivory (30 ml / 1.0 fl oz) is a lightweight foundation with high coverage and a matte finish. It gives you a natural, smooth, flawless complexion that lasts up to 24 hours. Ideal for a natural matte look. Blends easily.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Fabuleux Air Mat Foundation**: 
â­ Apply the foundation to the center of your face. 
â­ Blend outwards and upwards. 
â­ Enjoy a perfect matte look that lasts up to 24 hours. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Fabuleux Air Mat Foundation**: 
â­ Aqua (Water), Dimethicone, Cyclopentasiloxane, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Caprylyl Methicone,Propylene Glycol,Peg/Ppg-18/18 Dimethicone, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Sodium Chloride, Isononyl Isononanoate, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Zinc Pca, Silica, Phenoxyethanol,Tocopheryl Acetate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Lysolecithin, Chlorphenesin, Parfum (Fragrance), Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Peg/Ppg-19/19 Dimethicone, Cassia Angustifolia Seed Polysaccharide, Alcohol Denat.,Lauroyl Lysine, Disodium Edta, Geraniol, Linalool, Gossypium Herbaceum (Cotton) Extract, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Methicone, Tocopherol. [+/- (May Contain): Mica, Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77288 (Chromium Oxide Greens), Ci 77742 (Manganese Violet)]

**Bourjois Velvet The Pencil 01 Nudifull** is a 2-in-1 matte lip pencil, perfect for lining and filling. It features richly saturated pigments for all-day velvety colour and comfort. With its twistable pack, no sharpener is needed! Enjoy flawless lip colour, whether you're at home or on-the-go.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Velvet The Pencil 01 Nudifull**:
â­ Precisely define your lips.
â­ Fill your lips in one stroke for a flawless matte finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Velvet The Pencil 01 Nudifull**:
â­ Isododecane
â­ Caprylyl Methicone
â­ Synthetic Fluorphlogopite
â­ Synthetic Wax
â­ Diisostearyl Malate
â­ Polybutene
â­ Cetearyl Behenate

description_en:
**Bourjois Khol & Contour Milleet1 #005- Blue**, a 2-in-1 kohl pencil: eyeliner & pencil with an integrated mine trimmer that suits the eye contour and its interior for effective and burr-free makeup. Its creamy and shiny formula offers intense color and easy application thanks to its ultra-precise applicator. Waterproof and long-lasting, **Bourjois Khol & Contour Milleet1 #005- Blue** doesn't smudge and remains comfortable all day long!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Khol & Contour Milleet1 #005- Blue**:
â­ Suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers.
â­ Ophthalmologically tested.
â­ Use eyeliner flush with the lower eyelashes to intensify and emphasize the eye contour.
â­ Apply the eyeliner on the level of the upper eyelashes to define the look.
â­ Complete the look with a waterproof Bourjois mascara for a long-lasting makeup result.
â­ For a better, more accurate application, use the integrated sharpener.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Khol & Contour Milleet1 #005- Blue**:
â­ DIMETHICONE
â­ SYNTHETIC WAX
â­ POLYMETHYLSILSESQUIOXANE
â­ LAUROYL LYSINE
â­ DIISOSTEARYL MALATE
â­ OCTYLDODECANOL
â­ ISODECYL NEOPENTANOATE
â­ DICALCIUM PHOSPHATE
â­ POLYHYDROXYSTEARIC ACID
â­ DISTEARDIMONIUM HECTORITE
â­ PROPYLENE CARBONATE
â­ LECITHIN
â­ TOCOPHEROL
â­ ASCORBYL PALMITATE
â­ CITRIC ACID
â­ [May Contain/May Contain/+/-: IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), FERRIC AMMONIUM FERROCYANIDE (CI 77510), MICA, D&C BLACK NO. 2 [nano] (CI 77266), FD&C BLUE NO. 1 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 42090)].

With a velvety cream-to-powder texture, for smooth and easy application.

description_en:
**Bourjois Fabuleux Air Mat Foundation** - This foundation is designed to provide a smooth matte finish that lasts up to 24 hours. Its lightweight formula allows skin to breathe and is enhanced with micronized powders for a flawless, natural look. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Fabuleux Air Mat Foundation**:
â­ Apply starting from the center of your face and blend outwards.
â­ For an even, flawless complexion.
â­ Enjoy a perfect matte look that lasts up to 24 hours.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Fabuleux Air Mat Foundation**:
â­Aqua (Water), Dimethicone, Cyclopentasiloxane, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Caprylyl Methicone,Propylene Glycol,Peg/Ppg-18/18 Dimethicone, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Sodium Chloride, Isononyl Isononanoate, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Zinc Pca, Silica, Phenoxyethanol,Tocopheryl Acetate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Lysolecithin, Chlorphenesin, Parfum (Fragrance), Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Peg/Ppg-19/19 Dimethicone, Cassia Angustifolia Seed Polysaccharide, Alcohol Denat.,Lauroyl Lysine, Disodium Edta, Geraniol, Linalool, Gossypium Herbaceum (Cotton) Extract, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Methicone, Tocopherol. [+/- (May Contain): Mica, Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77288 (Chromium Oxide Greens), Ci 77742 (Manganese Violet)]

description_en:
**Bourjois Velvet The Pencil 03 In Mauve Again** is a 2-in-1 matte lip pencil perfect for lining and filling. It features richly saturated pigments for all-day velvety color and comfort.  No sharpener needed with the twistable pack! Easy mess-free application at home and on-the-go. Features a lightweight velvety matte finish that is incredibly comfortable and long-lasting.  The matte formula is long-lasting and transfer-proof, it wonâ€™t smear, smudge, or feather. Available in 8 playful shades. The creamy pencil glides on effortlessly for intense color in one stroke and is infused with a lightweight oil to leave lips feeling smooth and moisturized.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Velvet The Pencil 03 In Mauve Again**
â­ Step 1: Contour and precisely define your lips.
â­ Step 2: Fill your lips in one stroke to enjoy a flawless matte finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Velvet The Pencil 03 In Mauve Again**
â­ Isododecane
â­ Caprylyl Methicone
â­ Synthetic Fluorphlogopite
â­ Synthetic Wax
â­ DiisostearylMalate
â­ Polybutene
â­ Cetearyl Behenate
â­ Silica
â­ Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate
â­ [May Contain/PeutContenir/+/-:Red28Lake (CI45410),Mica(CI 77019),IronOxides (77491,77492,77499), TitaniumDioxide(CI77891),Red7(CI15850),Yellow6Lake(CI15985),Red6(CI15850),Yellow5Lake(CI19140),Red30(CI73360)].

description_en:
**Bourjois Liquid Lipstick Rouge Edition Velvet #29 - Beige**, who knew that a long-lasting matte lip color could be this light and ever-so-comfortable? **Bourjois Liquid Lipstick Rouge Edition Velvet #29 - Beige** glides on soft as a whisper. Once dry, the richly pigmented color won't budge. The velvety texture melts on lips with a bare lip feeling. Forget you are wearing lip color when you want intense, matte color that won't dry out your lips, **Bourjois Liquid Lipstick Rouge Edition Velvet #29 - Beige** delivers the look you love in a long-lasting liquid lipstick. The soft flocked applicator deposits just the right amount of color with precision. For an extra-intense effect, add a second coat after the first one dries. Tuck it into your makeup bag for those times when you want to step up your glamour game.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Liquid Lipstick Rouge Edition Velvet #29 - Beige**
â­ Apply the applicator to your lips.
â­ Reapply for a more intense color.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Liquid Lipstick Rouge Edition Velvet #29 - Beige**
â­ Enhanced formula with pure pigments that provide bold, intense color.
â­ Soft, melting texture with velvet concentrate that leaves lips matte, smooth and soft as velvet.
â­ Enhanced by evanescent oils that give lips a natural and healthy feel.

**Bourjois Lip Gloss Fabuleux 7 Standing Rose-Vation** for a dazzling shine! Enjoy long-lasting, high-shine with **Bourjois Lip Gloss Fabuleux 7 Standing Rose-Vation**. Its lightweight, non-sticky formula hydrates your lips thanks to argan oil and vitamin E. Its beautiful colors give you an instantly luscious look.

**Bourjois Liner Feutre Ultra - Black** effortlessly defines your eyes with its soft, precise felt tip.  Glide it smoothly across your eyelid to create a bold, graphic line.  The rich, deep-black formula lasts up to 24 hours, ensuring a flawless look all day long.  **Bourjois Liner Feutre Ultra - Black** is easy to use, even for beginners, delivering an intense line quickly and efficiently.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Liner Feutre Ultra - Black**:
â­ Apply along the upper lash line for a classic look.
â­ Use to create a wing at the outer corner of your eye.
â­ Smudge for a smoky effect.
â­ Remove with a gentle makeup remover before bed.

description_en:
**Bourjois Contour Velvet Parisienne Lip Liner** is your perfect lip liner! It gives you precise and natural lip definition. Designed with a melting formula that's easy to apply, enriched with Shea butter and grape seed oil.  A long-lasting matte velvety finish, with up to 8-hour wear.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Contour Velvet Parisienne Lip Liner**:
â­ Apply color to the center of the upper and lower lip.
â­ Blend color from the outer corners towards the center of the lip.
â­ For added shine, apply lip gloss.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Contour Velvet Parisienne Lip Liner**:
â­ ISODODECANE, C9-12 ALKANE, POLYETHYLENE, BIS-CARBOXYDECYL DIMETHICONE, PHENYL TRIMETHICONE, OZOKERITE, COCOCAPRYLATE/CAPRATE, HDI/TRIMETHYLOL HEXYLLACTONE CROSSPOLYMER, TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE, QUATERNIUM-90 SEPIOLITE, PHENOXYETHANOL, TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYLSILANE, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, UNDECYLENIC ACID, QUATERNIUM-90 MONTMORILLONITE, SILICA, PARFUM/FRAGRANCE, LINALOOL, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL, HEXYL CINNAMAL, BHT, Peut Contenir/+/-: MICA, D&C RED NO. 7 CALCIUM LAKE (CI 15850), IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), D&C RED NO. 6 BARIUM LAKE (CI 15850), FD&C YELLOW NO. 5 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 19140), FD&C YELLOW NO. 6 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 15985),FD&C BLUE NO. 1 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 42090).

description_en:
**Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Concealer - 52 Beige**: Achieve a healthy, radiant complexion with **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Concealer - 52 Beige**. It seamlessly covers imperfections, signs of fatigue, and dark circles for a natural finish.  Its vegan formula, enriched with Vitamins C, E, and B5, provides up to 24 hours of hydration and leaves skin looking naturally radiant. Available in nine shades to match all skin tones.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Concealer - 52 Beige**:
â­ Apply a small amount of **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Concealer - 52 Beige** to dark circles and blemishes.
â­ Blend gently with your fingertips or a makeup brush.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Concealer - 52 Beige**:
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau
â­ Corn Starch Modified
â­ Dicaprylyl Ether
â­ Dicaprylyl Carbonate
â­ Isododecane
â­ Glycerin
â­ and other natural ingredients.

**Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Concealer - 51 Light Vanilla** gives you a healthy, radiant look. This concealer from Bourjois provides medium to full coverage that lasts all day. Its vegan formula is enriched with Vitamins C, E, and B5 for up to 24 hours of hydration. Available in nine shades to perfectly match your skin tone. Try **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Concealer - 51 Light Vanilla** today!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Concealer - 51 Light Vanilla**: 
â­ Apply a small amount of concealer to areas needing coverage. 
â­ Gently blend using fingertips or a makeup brush. 
â­ Blend well for a natural finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Concealer - 51 Light Vanilla**: 
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau 
â­ Corn Starch Modified 
â­ Dicaprylyl Ether 
â­ Dicaprylyl Carbonate 
â­ Isododecane 
â­ Glycerin 
â­ Trimethylsiloxysilicate 
â­ Silica 
â­ Sodium Chloride 
â­ and other natural ingredients.

description_en:
**Bourjois Liner Pinceau** Liquid Eyeliner delivers intense color and a precise application all day long. â­Long-lasting and waterproof formula. â­ Perfectly modular curved path, from thinnest to thickest. â­Glossy finish. â­Lasts up to 24 hours. â­Ophthalmologically tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Liner Pinceau**: 
â­ Apply eyeliner from the center to the outer corner of the eyelid.
â­ Resume the trace from the inner corner to the center of the eyelid.
â­ Extend the line to create a comma at the outer corner of the eye and add a few dots above the moving eyelid for a unique look.
â­ Complete the look with a Bourjois volume mascara.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Liner Pinceau**: 
â­AQUA/WATER/EAU, AMMONIUM ACRYLATES COPOLYMER, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, PENTYLENE GLYCOL, ALCOHOL DENAT., SYNTHETIC FLUORPHLOGOPITE, POLYSORBATE 20, DISODIUM DECETH-6 SULFOSUCCINATE, PHENOXYETHANOL, LAURETH-30, CELLULOSE GUM, MAGNESIUM ALUMINUM SILICATE, SILICA, SODIUM DEHYDROACETATE, TALC, PANTHENOL, TIN OXIDE, PANTOLACTONE,[May Contain/May Contain/+/-:MICA, IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499, CI 77499, CI 77499), TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), ULTRAMARINES (CI 77007), CHROMIUM OXIDE GREENS (CI 77288), FD&C BLUE NO .1 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 42090)].

description_en:
**Bourjois Contour Velvet Brunette Lip Liner** is the perfect lip liner you've been searching for! It provides precise and natural definition to your lips. â­ Easy-to-apply, velvety smooth texture. â­ Enriched with Shea butter and grape seed oil to moisturize your lips. â­ Long-lasting color that stays put for up to 8 hours. â­ Keeps lipstick in place and prevents smudging. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Contour Velvet Brunette Lip Liner**: 
â­ Apply color to the center of your upper and lower lips. 
â­ Line from the outer corners towards the center of your lips. 
â­ For a glossy finish, apply a layer of lip gloss on top.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Contour Velvet Brunette Lip Liner**: 
â­ ISODODECANE, C9-12 ALKANE, POLYETHYLENE, BIS-CARBOXYDECYL DIMETHICONE, PHENYL TRIMETHICONE, OZOKERITE, COCOCAPRYLATE/CAPRATE, HDI/TRIMETHYLOL HEXYLLACTONE CROSSPOLYMER, TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE, QUATERNIUM-90 SEPIOLITE, PHENOXYETHANOL, TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYLSILANE, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, UNDECYLENIC ACID, QUATERNIUM-90 MONTMORILLONITE, SILICA, PARFUM/FRAGRANCE, LINALOOL, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL, HEXYL CINNAMAL, BHT, Peut Contenir/+/-: MICA, D&C RED NO. 7 CALCIUM LAKE (CI 15850), IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), D&C RED NO. 6 BARIUM LAKE (CI 15850), FD&C YELLOW NO. 5 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 19140), FD&C YELLOW NO. 6 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 15985),FD&C BLUE NO. 1 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 42090).

**Fabuleux Ink Lacquer 01 Marshma'Love - 3.5 ml**, write your own fabulous shine story! A hydrating glossy lip stain with buildable colour payoff. Lightweight formula enriched with sunflower oil, leaves lips hydrated, smooth and healthy-looking. Enjoy a comfortable, non-sticky feel with up to 8 hours of wear. Choose from 8 fabulous shades.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Fabuleux Ink Lacquer 01 Marshma'Love - 3.5 ml**:

â­ Wait until it dries. 
â­ Enjoy the long-lasting shine. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Fabuleux Ink Lacquer 01 Marshma'Love - 3.5 ml**: 
â­ Sunflower oil (for hydrated lips). 
â­ High-quality pigments (for buildable color).

description_en:
**Bourjois Contour Clubbing Waterproof Ultra - Black**, a colorful, long-lasting, and waterproof eyeliner pencil. Achieve an intense and vibrant look with its ultra-soft texture that glides effortlessly along the lash line.  The color stays put all day until removed with waterproof makeup remover.  Its formula, enriched with jojoba and cotton oils, provides absolute comfort, even for contact lens wearers. It can be used as a liner or smudged as an eyeshadow. Make your eyes pop with vibrant colors that won't smudge, crease, or fade.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Contour Clubbing Waterproof Ultra - Black**: 
â­ Draw a thin line along your upper eyelid.
â­ Thicken the line as desired.
â­ Use it as eyeliner or eyeshadow by gently smudging.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Contour Clubbing Waterproof Ultra - Black**: 
â­ Jojoba and cotton oils
â­ Vitamin E (ingredients may vary by shade)

description_en:
**Bourjois Always Fabulous Compact Powder- 100** takes you from fabulous to Always Fabulous! This 2-in-1 must-have powder foundation from the famous French brand gives a lightweight, skin-like matte finish. Combining the long-wear coverage of a liquid foundation with the mattifying power of a powder, the formula lasts all day and is enriched with skin-loving hyaluronic acid, anti-pollution Lipochroman, and SPF20. Available in 8 shades, it provides a flawless finish.  It comes in a luxurious compact with a built-in mirror and a versatile sponge.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Always Fabulous Compact Powder- 100**:
â­ Apply using the flat side of the sponge for medium coverage or touch-ups.
â­ Use the fluffier side for full coverage.
â­ Press powder onto skin for a smooth effect.
â­ Use a face mist for drier skin types for a final touch.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Always Fabulous Compact Powder- 100**:
â­ MICA, ZINC OXIDE, KAOLIN, ZINC STEARATE, DIMETHICONE, BUTYLOCTYL SALICYLATE, BORON NITRIDE, TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE, SACCHAROMYCES FERMENT, SILICA, TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYLSILANE, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, SODIUM BENZOATE, METHICONE, ALUMINA, LAUROYL LYSINE, PARFUM/FRAGRANCE, SODIUM HYALURONATE, HYDROGEN DIMETHICONE, DIMETHYLMETHOXY CHROMANOL, BENZYL SALICYLATE, [MAY CONTAIN/PEUT CONTENIR/+/-: TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)].

**Bourjois Lip Gloss Fabuleux 6 Cream Comes True** - It's your time to shine with the new Fabuleux Lip Gloss from Bourjois! â­ Lightweight and non-sticky formula. â­ High shine, long-lasting colour. â­ Infused with argan oil and vitamin E to keep lips hydrated. â­ Available in nine beautiful shades. â­ Easy and smooth application with a precise applicator. â­ Gives lips an instantly luscious look. â­ Perfect for everyday use. â­ Refreshing formula with a pleasant scent. â­ Provides all-day lip care and hydration. â­ Enhances natural lip beauty.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Lip Gloss Fabuleux 6 Cream Comes True**:
â­ Apply an appropriate amount of **Bourjois Lip Gloss Fabuleux 6 Cream Comes True** to the centre of your upper and lower lips. â­ Spread evenly across your lips using the applicator. â­ Apply additional layers as desired for a more intense finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Lip Gloss Fabuleux 6 Cream Comes True**:
â­ POLYBUTENE, HYDROGENATED POLYISOBUTENE, PARAFFINUM LIQUIDUM/MINERAL OIL/HUILE MINERALE, ETHYLHEXYL PALMITATE, ETHYLENE/PROPYLENE/STYRENE COPOLYMER, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, PHENOXYETHANOL, PARFUM/FRAGRANCE, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, BUTYLENE/ETHYLENE/STYRENE COPOLYMER, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, ARGANIA SPINOSA KERNEL OIL, BENZYL ALCOHOL, LINALOOL, GERANIOL, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, CITRONELLOL, BHT

**Bourjois Rouge Velvet The Lipstick**, a bold matte lipstick that lasts long and never dries out your lips. Its unique formula combines moisturizing waxes with light oils and rich pigments for a soft, velvety finish. For intense, long-lasting color, one swipe is enough.

â­ Apply color to the center of your upper and lower lips.
â­ Blend color from the outer corners to the center.
â­ Optional: Apply lip gloss for extra shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Rouge Velvet The Lipstick**:
â­ ISODODECANE, C9-12 ALKANE, POLYETHYLENE, BIS-CARBOXYDECYL DIMETHICONE, PHENYL TRIMETHICONE, MICA, COCO-CAPRYLATE/CAPRATE, PARAFFIN, HDI/TRIMETHYLOL HEXYLLACTONE CROSSPOLYMER, TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE, CERA MICROCRISTALLINA/MICROCRYSTALLINE WAX/CIRE MICROCRYSTALLINE, QUATERNIUM-90 SEPIOLITE, PHENOXYETHANOL, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, UNDECYLENIC ACID, TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYLSILANE, QUATERNIUM-90 MONTMORILLONITE, PARFUM/FRAGRANCE, SILICA, LINALOOL, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL, HEXYL CINNAMAL, [MAY CONTAIN/PEUT CONTENIR/+/-: IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), RED 7 LAKE (CI 15850), TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891)].

description_en:
**Bourjois Clubbing Waterproof Pencil** is a colorful, long-lasting, and waterproof eyeliner pencil. Its ultra-soft texture glides smoothly along the lash line for an intense and vibrant effect. The color stays put until removed with waterproof makeup remover. The formula, enriched with jojoba and cotton oils, offers absolute comfort, even for contact lens wearers. It can be used as a liner or eyeshadow. Make your eyes pop!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Clubbing Waterproof Pencil**: 
â­ Draw a thin line along your upper lash line.
â­ Gently smudge the color using a brush (optional).
â­ Use it as eyeliner or eyeshadow as desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Clubbing Waterproof Pencil**: 
â­ Jojoba and cotton oils
â­ Vitamin E (ingredients may vary by shade)

**Bourjois Fabuleux Air Mat Foundation** -06 Hale Clair, a foundation designed to give you a smooth, matte finish that lasts up to 24 hours. Its lightweight, non-drying formula allows skin to breathe, enhanced with micronized powders to conceal imperfections while maintaining a natural look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Fabuleux Air Mat Foundation**: 
â­ Apply from the center of your face and blend outwards.
â­ Blend well for an even complexion.
â­ Enjoy a flawless, long-lasting look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Fabuleux Air Mat Foundation**: 
â­ Aqua (Water), Dimethicone, Cyclopentasiloxane, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Caprylyl Methicone,Propylene Glycol,Peg/Ppg-18/18 Dimethicone, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Sodium Chloride, Isononyl Isononanoate, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Zinc Pca, Silica, Phenoxyethanol,Tocopheryl Acetate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Lysolecithin, Chlorphenesin, Parfum (Fragrance), Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Peg/Ppg-19/19 Dimethicone, Cassia Angustifolia Seed Polysaccharide, Alcohol Denat.,Lauroyl Lysine, Disodium Edta, Geraniol, Linalool, Gossypium Herbaceum (Cotton) Extract, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Methicone, Tocopherol. [+/- (May Contain): Mica, Ci 77007 (Ultramarines), Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77288 (Chromium Oxide Greens), Ci 77742 (Manganese Violet)]

description_en:
**Bourjois Eye Shadow Palette Volume Glamour 02** - Multicolors, perfect for a captivating eye look! â­6 ultra-pigmented shades with a smooth cream-powder texture. â­Easy to apply and long-lasting. â­Creates a natural look or a bold makeup statement. â­Versatile options to invent your own looks.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Eye Shadow Palette Volume Glamour 02**: 
â­Apply the light shade as a base on the entire eyelid. â­Apply the medium shade to the outer corner of the eye to intensify the look. â­Use the dark shade close to the lashes for definition. â­Choose shades that suit you to create your own unique look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Eye Shadow Palette Volume Glamour 02**: 
Mica, talc, dimethicone, caprylic/capric triglyceride, magnesium stearate, phenoxyethanol, cocos nucifera (coconut) oil, caprylyl glycol, synthetic fluorphlogopite, aloe barbadensis leaf extract, alumina, triethoxycaprylylsilane, tinoxide, [may contain/may contain/+/-:iron oxides (ci 77491, ci 77492, ci 77499), titanium dioxide (ci 77891), ultramarines (ci 77007),manganese violet (ci 77742), carmine (ci 75470), d&c red no. 30 lake (ci 73360), d&c red no.7 calcium lake (ci 15850)].

**Bourjois Rouge Velvet The Lipstick** is a bold, long-lasting matte lipstick. Its unique formula combines hydrating waxes, light oils, and rich pigments for an irresistibly soft, velvety finish. Get smooth, hydrated lips with intense color that lasts up to 24 hours!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Rouge Velvet The Lipstick**: 
â­ Apply color to the center of your upper and lower lips.
â­ Blend color from the outer corners to the center of your lips.
â­ Optional: Add lip gloss for extra shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Rouge Velvet The Lipstick**: 
â­ Hydrating waxes
â­ Light oils
â­ Rich pigments

description_en:
**Bourjois Rouge Edition Velvet Nude-Ist 07- Pink**, a long-lasting matte lip color that's light and comfortable. It glides on smoothly and once dry, the richly pigmented color won't budge. The velvety texture melts onto your lips, leaving a bare lip feeling.  Enjoy intense matte color that won't dry out your lips. **Bourjois Rouge Edition Velvet Nude-Ist 07- Pink** gives you the look you love in a long-lasting liquid lipstick. The soft flocked applicator deposits just the right amount of color precisely. For an extra-intense effect, add a second coat after the first one dries. Keep it in your makeup bag for those times when you want to step up your glam game. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Rouge Edition Velvet Nude-Ist 07- Pink**:

description_en:
**Bourjois Contour Velvet Rose Water Lip Liner** is the perfect lip liner that gives you precisely defined and natural-looking lips. â­ Its easy-to-apply formula contains Shea butter and grape seed oil. â­ It provides all-day color and keeps your lipstick in place for 8 hours. â­ Its creamy matte texture glides effortlessly onto your lips. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Contour Velvet Rose Water Lip Liner**: 
â­ Apply color to the center of your upper and lower lips. 
â­ Blend color from the outer corners towards the center of your lips. 
â­ You can add lip gloss for a shiny finish. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Contour Velvet Rose Water Lip Liner**: 
â­ ISODODECANE, C9-12 ALKANE, POLYETHYLENE, BIS-CARBOXYDECYL DIMETHICONE, PHENYL TRIMETHICONE, OZOKERITE, COCOCAPRYLATE/CAPRATE, HDI/TRIMETHYLOL HEXYLLACTONE CROSSPOLYMER, TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE, QUATERNIUM-90 SEPIOLITE, PHENOXYETHANOL, TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYLSILANE, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, UNDECYLENIC ACID, QUATERNIUM-90 MONTMORILLONITE, SILICA, PARFUM/FRAGRANCE, LINALOOL, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL, HEXYL CINNAMAL, BHT, Peut Contenir/+/-: MICA, D&C RED NO. 7 CALCIUM LAKE (CI 15850), IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), D&C RED NO. 6 BARIUM LAKE (CI 15850), FD&C YELLOW NO. 5 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 19140), FD&C YELLOW NO. 6 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 15985),FD&C BLUE NO. 1 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 42090).

description_en:
**Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation** - 55 Deep Beige, achieve a natural-looking radiance with flawless coverage. This liquid foundation instantly brightens and evens your skin tone thanks to a healthy mix of vitamins C, E, and B5. It provides intense hydration that lasts all day long. Its lightweight, vegan formula is made with 85% natural ingredients and is available in 22 beautiful shades. **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation** offers buildable coverage, concealing imperfections and enhancing your complexion. Enjoy your day with confidence!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation**: 
â­ Apply the foundation all over your face using a brush or sponge.
â­ Focus on the T-zone, blending outwards.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation**: 
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau, Dicaprylyl Ether, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Glycerin, Corn Starch Modified, Isododecane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Sodium Chloride, and other natural ingredients.

#Bourjois #Makeup #Foundation #HealthyMix #Beauty #Skincare #MakeUp #Cosmetics #SkinHealth #YourBeauty

description_en:
**Bourjois Mascara Big Lashes Oh. Oui! 01 - Black** - Achieve a captivating cat-eye look! This amazing mascara thickens and defines each lash, giving you a wide-eyed, irresistibly feline gaze. Its formula, enriched with silk proteins, delivers intense volume while keeping lashes soft and silky. Try it now!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Mascara Big Lashes Oh. Oui! 01 - Black**:
â­ Look down into a mirror and apply the mascara with a wriggling motion from side-to-side, starting at the roots.
â­ Use the clever brush tip to intensify the curve.
â­ Look up and do the same on the lower lashes.
â­ Apply a second coat if necessary.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Mascara Big Lashes Oh. Oui! 01 - Black**:
â­ Silk proteins
â­ Other ingredients to enhance volume and softness.

title_ar: **Ø¨Ø±Ø¬ÙˆØ§ ÙØ§Ø¨ÙŠÙˆÙ„Ùˆ Ù‚Ù„ÙˆØ³ Ù…Ù„Ù…Ø¹ Ø§Ù„Ø´ÙØ§Ù‡ 1 Ù‚Ù„Ùˆ Ø¨Ø§Ù„ÙŠ**
description_en:
**Bourjois Lip Gloss Fabuleux 1 Glow Bally Chic** is your time to shine with Bourjois's new lip gloss. A long-lasting, high-shine, non-sticky and lightweight lip gloss in beautiful colours for instantly luscious lips.  Its unique lip balm-like formula is infused with argan oil and vitamin E to keep lips hydrated and comfortable all day long. Available in nine gorgeous shiny colours and featuring an ultra-soft, precise applicator. Make every day fabulous with **Bourjois Lip Gloss Fabuleux 1 Glow Bally Chic**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Lip Gloss Fabuleux 1 Glow Bally Chic**:
â­ Apply lip gloss to the centre of the upper and lower lip.
â­ The soft, flocked, angled applicator delivers a precise finish that glides on easily with a single coat.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Lip Gloss Fabuleux 1 Glow Bally Chic**:
â­ POLYBUTENE
â­ HYDROGENATED POLYISOBUTENE
â­ PARAFFINUM LIQUIDUM/MINERAL OIL/HUILE MINERALE
â­ ETHYLHEXYL PALMITATE
â­ ETHYLENE/PROPYLENE/STYRENE COPOLYMER
â­ ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE
â­ PHENOXYETHANOL
â­ PARFUM/FRAGRANCE
â­ TOCOPHERYL ACETATE
â­ BUTYLENE/ETHYLENE/STYRENE COPOLYMER
â­ BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE
â­ ARGANIA SPINOSA KERNEL OIL
â­ BENZYL ALCOHOL
â­ LINALOOL
â­ GERANIOL
â­ ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE
â­ CITRONELLOL
â­ BHT

**Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation - 56 Light Bronze** delivers a natural-looking radiance with flawless coverage. This liquid foundation instantly brightens and evens your skin tone thanks to a healthy mix of vitamins C, E, and B5. Its lightweight, vegan formula is made with 85% natural ingredients and available in 22 beautiful shades.  **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation - 56 Light Bronze** offers buildable coverage, concealing imperfections and signs of fatigue for a radiant complexion all day long. Bourjois, a leading French cosmetics brand, brings you the Parisian charm and joy.

description_en:
**Bourjois Contour Velvet Nohalicious Lip Liner** is the perfect lip liner that gives you precise and natural definition. â­ Its velvety formula is easy to apply with a creamy matte texture. â­ It contains shea butter and grape seed oil that nourish your lips. â­ Provides long-lasting color that stays put for 8 hours. â­ Gives you a perfect definition all day long. â­ Rich and beautiful color. â­ Suitable for all skin types. â­ Easy to use and blends seamlessly. â­ Enhances lipstick staying power. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Contour Velvet Nohalicious Lip Liner**: 
â­ Apply color to the center of the upper and lower lip. 
â­ Blend color from the outer corners to the center of the lips. 
â­ For added shine, apply lip gloss. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Contour Velvet Nohalicious Lip Liner**: 
â­ ISODODECANE, C9-12 ALKANE, POLYETHYLENE, BIS-CARBOXYDECYL DIMETHICONE, PHENYL TRIMETHICONE, OZOKERITE, COCOCAPRYLATE/CAPRATE, HDI/TRIMETHYLOL HEXYLLACTONE CROSSPOLYMER, TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE, QUATERNIUM-90 SEPIOLITE, PHENOXYETHANOL, TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYLSILANE, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, UNDECYLENIC ACID, QUATERNIUM-90 MONTMORILLONITE, SILICA, PARFUM/FRAGRANCE, LINALOOL, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL, HEXYL CINNAMAL, BHT, Peut Contenir/+/-: MICA, D&C RED NO. 7 CALCIUM LAKE (CI 15850), IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), D&C RED NO. 6 BARIUM LAKE (CI 15850), FD&C YELLOW NO. 5 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 19140), FD&C YELLOW NO. 6 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 15985),FD&C BLUE NO. 1 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 42090).

description_en:
**Bourjois Rouge Velvet Ink #020 20Iv- Pink**, a long-lasting matte liquid lipstick in a rich pink shade. â­ Long-lasting color that stays put all day. â­ Lightweight and comfortable liquid formula. â­ Precise applicator for accurate lip definition and filling. â­ Transfer-proof and smudge-proof, even under a face mask. â­ Wide range of shades to suit every taste. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Rouge Velvet Ink #020 20Iv- Pink**: 
â­ Apply the lipstick to the center of your upper and lower lips. 
â­ Blend the lipstick outwards from the corners towards the center. 
â­ Optionally, apply a lip gloss for extra shine. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Rouge Velvet Ink #020 20Iv- Pink**: 
â­ ISODODECANE, POLYETHYLENE, BIS-CARBOXYDECYL DIMETHICONE, C9-12 ALKANE, POLYPROPYLENE, QUATERNIUM-90 SEPIOLITE, PHENYL TRIMETHICONE, TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE, HDI/TRIMETHYLOL HEXYLLACTONE CROSSPOLYMER, QUATERNIUM-90 MONTMORILLONITE, COCO-CAPRYLATE/CAPRATE, PARFUM/FRAGRANCE, SILICA DIMETHYL SILYLATE, PHENOXYETHANOL, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, LIMONENE, UNDECYLENIC ACID, SILICA, TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYLSILANE, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, [May Contain/May Contain/+/-: MICA, IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), D&C RED NO.7 CALCIUM LAKE (CI 15850), D&C RED NO .6 BARIUM LAKE (CI 15850), FD&C YELLOW NO .5 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 19140), FD&C YELLOW NO .6 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 15985), TITANIUM DIOXIDE (IC 77891), FD&C BLUE NO .1 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 42090)].

description_en:
**Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Concealer - 52.5 Vanilla** gives you a healthy, radiant complexion!  This amazing concealer effectively covers imperfections, signs of fatigue, and dark circles, with a vegan formula rich in Vitamins C, E, and B5 for up to 24-hour hydration. Its unique formula instantly enhances the appearance of your skin, providing medium to full coverage. Available in 9 shades to match all skin tones. Enjoy confidence all day long!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Concealer - 52.5 Vanilla**:
â­ Apply concealer to dark circles and blemishes.
â­ Blend gently with fingertips or a makeup brush.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Concealer - 52.5 Vanilla**:
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau
â­ Corn Starch Modified
â­ Dicaprylyl Ether
â­ Dicaprylyl Carbonate
â­ Isododecane
â­ Glycerin

description_en:
**Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Concealer - 54 Sun Bronze** gives you a healthy, radiant complexion! This amazing concealer provides perfect coverage to hide blemishes, dark circles, and signs of fatigue, with a vegan formula packed with vitamins (2.4 times more than our previous products!). Its clean, long-lasting formula provides up to 24 hours of hydration, keeping your skin refreshed all day long. Available in 9 shades to suit all skin tones. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Concealer - 54 Sun Bronze**: 
â­ Apply concealer to dark circles and blemishes. 
â­ Gently blend with your fingertips or a makeup brush. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Concealer - 54 Sun Bronze**: 
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau 
â­ Corn Starch Modified 
â­ Dicaprylyl Ether 
â­ Dicaprylyl Carbonate 
â­ Isododecane 
â­ Glycerin 
â­ Trimethylsiloxysilicate 
â­ Silica 
â­ Sodium Chloride 
â­ and more natural ingredients rich in vitamins.

**Bourjois Always Fabulous Concealer** keeps you looking fabulous for 24 hours a day! This unique concealer provides full coverage that lasts up to 24 hours. â­ Hyaluronic Acid

title_ar: Ø¨ÙˆØ±Ø¬ÙˆØ§ Ù‡ÙŠÙ„Ø«ÙŠ Ù…ÙƒØ³ ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ø§Ø³Ø§Ø³ 57 Ø¨Ø±ÙˆÙ†Ø²
description_en:
**Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation - 57 Bronze**: Get a natural-looking radiance without compromising on coverage. This liquid foundation instantly brightens and evens your skin tone thanks to a healthy mix of Vitamins C, E, and B5. It provides intense hydration that lasts all day long. The lightweight, vegan formula is made with 85% natural-origin ingredients and is available in 22 beautiful shades. It offers buildable coverage, concealing imperfections and enhancing your complexion. Enjoy your day with confidence! Bourjois is a renowned French brand, deeply rooted in Parisian beauty for 160 years. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation - 57 Bronze**:
â­ Apply the foundation all over your face using a brush or sponge.
â­ Focus on the T-zone, blending outwards.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation - 57 Bronze**:
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau, Dicaprylyl Ether, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Glycerin, Corn Starch Modified, Isododecane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Sodium Chloride, TRI(POLYGLYCERYL-3/LAURYL) HYDROGENATED TRILINOLEATE, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Silica, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, 2,3-Butanediol, Propylene Carbonate, Parfum/Fragrance, Mica, Tocopherol, Sodium Benzoate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Chlorphenesin, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Propylene Glycol, Panthenol, Cucumis Melo (Melon) Fruit Extract, Methicone, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Fruit Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Pantolactone, Benzoic Acid, Sorbic Acid, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)]

description_en:
**Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Powder**, a light to medium coverage pressed powder, gives you a healthy, mattified, and radiant complexion. â­ Perfect natural coverage. â­ 93% vegan formula with ingredients of natural origin. â­ Contains Vitamins C, E, and B5. â­ Sets makeup for up to 10 hours. â­ Available in 8 shades. â­ Free of animal-derived ingredients. â­ Recycled packaging. â­ Pore-blurring effect. â­ Smooth and silky texture. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Powder**: â­ Apply powder all over your face from the center outwards using the provided sponge. â­ Blend well for an even finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Powder**: â­ Mica, Kaolin, Zinc Stearate, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Flour, Isopropyl Palmitate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Dimethicone, Lauroyl Lysine, Parfum/Fragrance, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Caprylyl Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Benzoate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Punica Granatum Fruit Juice, Euterpe Oleracea Juice, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Panthenol, Glycerin, Aqua/Water/Eau, Lycium Barbarum Fruit Extract, Pantolactone, Potassium Sorbate, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)].

description_en:
**Bourjois New Little Round Pot Rouge Shade 18** - Ultra fine and easy-to-blend powder blush.  For almost 150 years, Bourjois has been famous worldwide thanks to this timeless blush's amazing texture and stunning packaging. Its baked texture transforms into an ultra-fine pressed powder upon application, blending seamlessly. One brush stroke releases the irresistible aroma of rose-scented powder.  It features a built-in mirror and brush, perfect for touch-ups on the go!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois New Little Round Pot Rouge Shade 18**:
â­ Smile and apply blush to cheekbones using circular motions.
â­ Blend towards temples.
â­ If you apply too much, simply dust with powder on top.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois New Little Round Pot Rouge Shade 18**:
â­ Talc
â­ Parfum (Fragrance)
â­ Bentonite
â­ Zea Mays (Corn) Starch
â­ Hydroxycitronellal
â­ Sodium Methylparaben
â­ Cinnamyl Alcohol
â­ Eugenol
â­ Benzyl Salicylate
â­ Linalool
â­ Evernia Prunastri (Oakmoss) Extract
â­ Citronellol
â­ Geraniol
â­ Amyl Cinnamal
â­ Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone
â­ Hexyl Cinnamal
â­ Coumarin
â­ Limonene
â­ Benzyl Benzoate
â­ Benzyl Alcohol
â­ Farnesol
â­ Benzyl Cinnamate

description_en:
**Bourjois Eyeliner Contour Clubbing 70 - Green** is a waterproof eyeliner pencil ideal for emphasizing the eye contour with vibrant, long-lasting color. â­ Its ultra-soft creamy texture, enriched with jojoba and cotton oils, glides on smoothly. â­ Its waterproof formula prevents smudging or transfer. â­ Available in three finishes: matte, glittery, or metallic. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Eyeliner Contour Clubbing 70 - Green**: â­ Suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers. â­ Use it on the upper lashes to define the eyes, or on the lower lashes to intensify them. â­ Use Bourjois waterproof mascara for a long-lasting look. â­ For a smoky effect, blend the color onto the eyelid. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Eyeliner Contour Clubbing 70 - Green**: â­ Cyclopentasiloxane, c11-12 isoparaffin, paraffin, polybutene, simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) seed oil, hydrogenated cottonseed oil, ceresin, ozokerite, ceramicrocristallina (microcrystalline wax), phenoxyethanol, tocopherol, ascorbyl palmitate, [+/-(may contain): ci 75470 (carmine), ci 77007 (ultramarines), ci 77163 (bismuth oxychloride), ci 77288 (chromium oxide greens), ci 77289 (chromium hydroxide green), ci 77491, ci 77492, ci 77499 (iron oxides), ci 77510 (ferric ferrocyanide), ci 77742 (manganese violet), ci 77891 (titanium dioxide)].
