description_en:
**Bourjois Fabuleux Ink Lacquer**, a hydrating glossy lip stain with a buildable colour payoff.  Enriched with sunflower oil, the lightweight formula leaves lips hydrated, smooth, and healthy-looking, while instantly improving the appearance of lip texture. Enjoy the comfortable, non-sticky feel with up to 8 hours of transfer-proof wear. Choose from 8 fabulous shades with a calligraphy precision applicatorâ€”it's your time to shine! An iconic French cosmetics & fragrance brand, Bourjoisâ€™s heritage has been deeply rooted in Parisian & joyful beauty for 160 years. We empower and inspire women to be playful and experiment with make-up, as we believe the more you enjoy yourself, the more beautiful you are. Distributed in 39 markets worldwide, Bourjois has established itself as one of the masters of make-up innovation and colour experts. From the Little Round Pot to Twist Up The Volume Mascara, we create products that put a smile on your face.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Fabuleux Ink Lacquer**
â­ Use the calligraphy precision applicator to line and fill lips and give them a coat of fabulous shine.
â­ Build up to a great colour payoff and enjoy a glossy, non-sticky shine for up to 8 hours!

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Fabuleux Ink Lacquer**
â­ Sunflower Oil
â­ Shiny Pigments

title_en: Bourjois Always Fabulous Compact Powder - 210
title_ar: Ø¨ÙˆØ¯Ø±Ø© Ø¨ÙˆØ±Ø¬ÙˆØ§ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø¶ØºÙˆØ·Ø© Ø£ÙˆÙ„ÙˆÙŠØ² ÙØ§ÙŠØ¨Ù„ÙˆØ³ Ø±Ù‚Ù… 210
description_en:
**Bourjois Always Fabulous Compact Powder - 210** is your new secret weapon for achieving a flawless, long-lasting finish. This 2-in-1 powder foundation combines the coverage of a liquid foundation with the mattifying power of a powder, for an all-day, lightweight feel. Enriched with skin-loving hyaluronic acid, anti-pollution Lipochroman, and SPF20 for UV protection, it's available in 8 shades to match your complexion.  The luxurious compact comes with a mirror and a dual-sided sponge for easy application and touch-ups on the go. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Always Fabulous Compact Powder - 210**: 
â­ For medium coverage: Apply using the flat side of the sponge. 
â­ For full coverage: Apply and build using the fluffier side of the sponge.
â­ Bourjois Tip: Press powder onto skin for a smooth finish. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Always Fabulous Compact Powder - 210**:
MICA, ZINC OXIDE, KAOLIN, ZINC STEARATE, DIMETHICONE, BUTYLOCTYL SALICYLATE, BORON NITRIDE, TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE, SACCHAROMYCES FERMENT, SILICA, TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYLSILANE, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, SODIUM BENZOATE, METHICONE, ALUMINA, LAUROYL LYSINE, PARFUM/FRAGRANCE, SODIUM HYALURONATE, HYDROGEN DIMETHICONE, DIMETHYLMETHOXY CHROMANOL, BENZYL SALICYLATE, [MAY CONTAIN/PEUT CONTENIR/+/-: TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)].

title_en: Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation - 55.5 Honey
title_ar: Ø¨ÙˆØ±Ø¬ÙˆØ§ Ù‡ÙŠÙ„Ø«ÙŠ Ù…ÙƒØ³ ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ø£Ø³Ø§Ø³ 55.5 Ù‡ÙˆÙ†ÙŠ
description_en:
**Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation - 55.5 Honey** gives you a naturally radiant complexion with flawless coverage. This liquid foundation brightens and evens your skin tone with a healthy mix of vitamins C, E, and B5. Its lightweight, vegan formula, made with 85% natural ingredients, provides all-day hydration. Available in 22 beautiful shades to match every skin tone, it offers buildable coverage, concealing imperfections for a radiant, confident finish. Bourjois, a leading French beauty brand, brings you the Parisian touch of beauty and joy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation - 55.5 Honey**: 
â­ Apply the foundation all over your face using a brush or sponge.
â­ Focus on the T-zone, blending outwards.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation - 55.5 Honey**: 
â­Aqua/Water/Eau, Dicaprylyl Ether, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Glycerin, Corn Starch Modified, Isododecane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Sodium Chloride, TRI(POLYGLYCERYL-3/LAURYL) HYDROGENATED TRILINOLEATE, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Silica, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, 2,3-Butanediol, Propylene Carbonate, Parfum/Fragrance, Mica, Tocopherol, Sodium Benzoate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Chlorphenesin, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Propylene Glycol, Panthenol, Cucumis Melo (Melon) Fruit Extract, Methicone, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Fruit Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Pantolactone, Benzoic Acid, Sorbic Acid, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)]

**Bourjois Always Fabulous Concealer** for a flawless look that lasts all day long. â­ Provides extreme coverage that lasts up to 24 hours. â­ 3-in-1 formula camouflages dark circles and imperfections, illuminates highlights, and contours shadows. â­ Moisturizing formula with hyaluronic acid and Vitamin E. â­ Easy application with its XXL tip.

description_en:
**Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation - 52.2 Golden Beige** gives you healthy-looking skin without compromising on coverage. This liquid foundation instantly brightens and evens out your skin tone with a healthy mix of vitamins C, E, and B5. Its lightweight, vegan formula is made with 85% natural ingredients and is available in 22 beautiful shades.  **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation - 52.2 Golden Beige** provides buildable coverage, concealing imperfections and signs of tiredness for a flawless complexion that lasts all day. Bourjois, a leading French beauty brand.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation - 52.2 Golden Beige**:
â­ Apply all over the face using a brush or sponge. 
â­ Focus on the T-zone, blending outwards.

â­Aqua/Water/Eau, Dicaprylyl Ether, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Glycerin, Corn Starch Modified, Isododecane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Sodium Chloride, TRI(POLYGLYCERYL-3/LAURYL) HYDROGENATED TRILINOLEATE, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Silica, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, 2,3-Butanediol, Propylene Carbonate, Parfum/Fragrance, Mica, Tocopherol, Sodium Benzoate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Chlorphenesin, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Propylene Glycol, Panthenol, Cucumis Melo (Melon) Fruit Extract, Methicone, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Fruit Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Pantolactone, Benzoic Acid, Sorbic Acid, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)]

**Bourjois Velvet The Pencil 08 Rouge Diva**: It's a 2-in-1 lining and filling matte lip pencil featuring richly saturated pigments for all-day velvety colour and comfort. Create your makeup story with **Bourjois Velvet The Pencil 08 Rouge Diva**. No sharpener is needed with the included twist able pack for even easier, mess-free use at home and on-the-go.  Matte lip pencil with a long-lasting, transfer-proof formula, so you can be confident that it won't smear, smudge or feather. The creamy pencil glides on effortlessly and is infused with a lightweight oil to leave lips feeling smooth and moisturised. Lip pencil available in 8 playful shades ranging from nude to intense red.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Velvet The Pencil 08 Rouge Diva**
â­ Precisely define your lips.
â­ Fill in your lips in one stroke for a flawless matte finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Velvet The Pencil 08 Rouge Diva**
â­ Isododecane
â­ Caprylyl Methicone
â­ Synthetic Fluorphlogopite
â­ Synthetic Wax
â­ DiisostearylMalate
â­ Polybutene
â­ Cetearyl Behenate
â­ Silica
â­ Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate
â­ [May Contain/PeutContenir/+/-:Red28Lake (CI45410),Mica(CI 77019),IronOxides (77491,77492,77499), TitaniumDioxide(CI77891),Red7(CI15850),Yellow6Lake(CI15985),Red6(CI15850),Yellow5Lake(CI19140),Red30(CI73360)].

description_en:
**Bourjois Always Fabulous Compact Powder - 115** - Go from fabulous to Always Fabulous with Bourjois Always Fabulous Powder Foundation, a 2-in-1 must-have that combines long-lasting coverage with a mattifying effect. This all-day formula is enriched with hyaluronic acid for hydration, Lipochroman for anti-pollution, and SPF20 for UV protection. Available in 8 shades, it provides flawless coverage and controls shine. Comes in an elegant compact with a mirror and a multi-use sponge.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Always Fabulous Compact Powder - 115**:
â­ Medium coverage: Use the flat side of the sponge.
â­ Full coverage: Use the fluffier side of the sponge.
â­ Tip: Press powder onto skin, don't drag.
â­ For dry skin: Use a face mist.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Always Fabulous Compact Powder - 115**:
MICA, ZINC OXIDE, KAOLIN, ZINC STEARATE, DIMETHICONE, BUTYLOCTYL SALICYLATE, BORON NITRIDE, TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE, SACCHAROMYCES FERMENT, SILICA, TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYLSILANE, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, SODIUM BENZOATE, METHICONE, ALUMINA, LAUROYL LYSINE, PARFUM/FRAGRANCE, SODIUM HYALURONATE, HYDROGEN DIMETHICONE, DIMETHYLMETHOXY CHROMANOL, BENZYL SALICYLATE, [MAY CONTAIN/PEUT CONTENIR/+/-: TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)].

description_en:
**Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Powder** provides a naturally radiant look with light to medium coverage. â­ Perfect coverage to blur pores. â­ 93% vegan formula with ingredients of natural origin. â­ Contains Vitamins C, E, and B5. â­ Sets makeup for up to 10 hours. â­ Available in 8 shades. â­ Gentle on the skin. â­ Suitable for all skin types. â­ Eco-friendly packaging. â­ Gives a healthy and radiant complexion. â­ Smooth and natural finish. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Powder**: 
â­ Apply powder all over the face from the center outwards using a sponge.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Powder**: 
Mica, Kaolin, Zinc Stearate, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Flour, Isopropyl Palmitate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Dimethicone, Lauroyl Lysine, Parfum/Fragrance, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Caprylyl Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Benzoate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Punica Granatum Fruit Juice, Euterpe Oleracea Juice, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Panthenol, Glycerin, Aqua/Water/Eau, Lycium Barbarum Fruit Extract, Pantolactone, Potassium Sorbate, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)]

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Brow Reveal Pencil 002 Soft Brown**:

description_en:
**Bourjois Foundation Airmat** provides a rested, natural glow for healthy-looking skin. With vitamins C, E, and B5, it instantly erases imperfections and signs of fatigue, boosting radiance for a fresh complexion. Experience 70% more radiance than bare skin for up to 16 hours, with hydration lasting up to 24 hours. Its non-comedogenic formula won't clog pores.  The smooth, blendable texture of **Bourjois Foundation Airmat** feels comfortable all day, offering medium, buildable coverage for a natural, semi-matte finish. **Bourjois Foundation Airmat** is your secret weapon for a fresh, radiant look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Foundation Airmat**:
â­ Apply with fingers or a sponge.
â­ Start at the center of your face and blend outwards and upwards.
â­ Blend thoroughly to erase imperfections and achieve a radiant finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Foundation Airmat**:
â­ Vitamins C, E, and B5.
â­ Hyaluronic acid derivative.
â­ Non-comedogenic formula.

description_en:
**Bourjois Contour Velvet Places Des Roses Lip Liner**, your favourite lip liner just got even better! This velvety lip liner from Bourjois defines your lips with precision and a natural shape. â­ Its melting formula is easy to apply and contains Shea butter and grape seed oil. â­ The creamy matte texture glides on easily, providing all-day colour and keeping your lipstick in place for 8 hours.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Contour Velvet Places Des Roses Lip Liner**:
â­ Apply colour to the centre of the upper and lower lip.
â­ Apply colour starting from the outer corners to the centre of the upper and lower lip.
â­ For a final touch and more shine, you can apply lip gloss.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Contour Velvet Places Des Roses Lip Liner**:
â­ ISODODECANE, C9-12 ALKANE, POLYETHYLENE, BIS-CARBOXYDECYL DIMETHICONE, PHENYL TRIMETHICONE, OZOKERITE, COCOCAPRYLATE/CAPRATE, HDI/TRIMETHYLOL HEXYLLACTONE CROSSPOLYMER, TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE, QUATERNIUM-90 SEPIOLITE, PHENOXYETHANOL, TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYLSILANE, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, UNDECYLENIC ACID, QUATERNIUM-90 MONTMORILLONITE, SILICA, PARFUM/FRAGRANCE, LINALOOL, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL, HEXYL CINNAMAL, BHT, Peut Contenir/+/-: MICA, D&C RED NO. 7 CALCIUM LAKE (CI 15850), IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), D&C RED NO. 6 BARIUM LAKE (CI 15850), FD&C YELLOW NO. 5 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 19140), FD&C YELLOW NO. 6 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 15985),FD&C BLUE NO. 1 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 42090).

description_en:
**Bourjois Rouge Velvet** is a bold, long-lasting matte lipstick that won't dry out your lips. Its unique formula combines hydrating waxes, light oils, and rich pigments for an irresistibly soft, velvety finish. It keeps its intense color for up to 24 hours.  Its teardrop shape ensures perfect application in one stroke.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Rouge Velvet**: 
â­ Apply color to the center of your upper and lower lips.
â­ Blend color from outer corners to the center.
â­ Optionally, add lip gloss for extra shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Rouge Velvet**: 
â­ Hydrating waxes
â­ Light oils
â­ Rich pigments

description_en:
**Bourjois Rouge Velvet The Lipstick**, a bold matte lipstick that lasts long and hydrates your lips! Its unique formula combines hydrating waxes, light oils, and rich pigments for a velvety soft finish. For intense color that lasts up to 24 hours, just one swipe of **Bourjois Rouge Velvet The Lipstick** is enough.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Rouge Velvet The Lipstick**:
â­ Apply color to the center of the upper and lower lip.
â­ Blend color from the outer corners to the center.
â­ Optionally, add lip gloss for a shiny look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Rouge Velvet The Lipstick**:
â­ Hydrating waxes
â­ Light oils
â­ Rich pigments

description_en:
Start your day with wide-awake eyes using **Bourjois Volume Glamour Lift Moisture Mascara**. Its lightweight formula is enriched with vitamin C and phytocycleâ„¢ orange, giving your lashes a refreshed and rejuvenated look, leaving them feeling protected and strong. The unique double-sided brush volumizes and lifts lashes, providing amazing length from root to tip, without clumps or flaking. Smooth, comfortable, and quick-drying, for an instant eye-opening effect! **Bourjois**, a leading French cosmetics brand, creates products designed to bring you joy and confidence.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Volume Glamour Lift Moisture Mascara**:
â­ Start with either side of the brush.
â­ Apply mascara from root to tip to both upper and lower lashes.
â­ Repeat for extra volume.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Volume Glamour Lift Moisture Mascara**:
â­ AQUA/WATER/EAU, PARAFFIN, STEARIC ACID, PVP, CETYL ALCOHOL, CERA MICROCRISTALLINA/MICROCRYSTALLINE WAX/CIRE MICROCRYSTALLINE, HYDROGENATED VEGETABLE OIL, ARGININE, POLYSORBATE 20, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, RHUS VERNICIFLUA PEEL WAX, COPERNICIA CERIFERA CERA/COPERNICIA CERIFERA (CARNAUBA) WAX/CIRE DE CARNAUBA, 2,3-BUTANEDIOL, STEARYL STEARATE, PANTHENOL, SYNTHETIC WAX, CANDELILLA CERA/EUPHORBIA CERIFERA (CANDELILLA) WAX/CIRE DE CANDELILLA, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, ASCORBYL PALMITATE, HECTORITE, SIMETHICONE, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, SILICA, KAOLIN, PANTOLACTONE, ARGANIA SPINOSA KERNEL OIL, CELLULOSE, COFFEA ARABICA (COFFEE) SEED OIL, CITRUS AURANTIUM DULCIS (ORANGE) FRUIT EXTRACT, POLYETHYLENE, LACTOBACILLUS FERMENT, [MAY CONTAIN/PEUT CONTENIR/+/-: IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), ULTRAMARINES (CI 77007)].

**Bourjois Liner Ultra Fine 16 Noir- Black** delivers effortless precision and definition to your eyes. This liner creates a bold, graphic line that lasts all day long.  Its rich formula and fine felt tip ensure a flawless look for up to 24 hours. Easy to use, even for beginners, **Bourjois Liner Ultra Fine 16 Noir- Black** is the perfect choice for creating a stunning eye look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Liner Ultra Fine 16 Noir- Black**:
â­ Draw a thin line along your upper lash line.

â­ Clean the applicator after each use.

**Bourjois Eyeliner Contour Clubbing Cont Club 73- Brown**: This waterproof eyeliner pencil is ideal for emphasizing the eye contour with a vibrant and long-lasting color. â­ Ultra-soft creamy texture enriched with jojoba and cotton oils. â­ Provides intense and precise definition. â­ Waterproof, smudge-proof, and transfer-proof. â­ Available in three finishes: matte, glittery, or metallic. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Eyeliner Contour Clubbing Cont Club 73- Brown**: â­ Suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers. â­ Ophthalmologist tested. â­ Use on upper lashes to define, and lower lashes to intensify. â­ Complete the look with Bourjois waterproof mascara. â­ For a smoky look, blend the color across the eyelid. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Eyeliner Contour Clubbing Cont Club 73- Brown**: â­ Cyclopentasiloxane, c11-12 isoparaffin, paraffin, polybutene, simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) seed oil, hydrogenated cottonseed oil, ceresin, ozokerite, microcristallina (microcrystalline wax), phenoxyethanol, tocopherol, ascorbyl palmitate, [ +/- (may contain) : ci 75470 (carmine) ci 77007 (ultramarines) ci 77163 (bismuth oxychloride) ci 77288 (chromium oxide greens) ci 77289 (chromiumhydroxide green) ci 77491, ci 77492, ci 77499 (iron oxides) ci 77510 (ferric ferrocyanide) ci 77742 (manganese violet) ci 77891 (titanium dioxide).

**Bourjois Always Fabulous Concealer 10Ml - Ivory** keeps you looking fabulous all day long! This unique concealer provides flawless coverage that lasts up to 24 hours. A true 3-in-1, it camouflages dark circles and imperfections, illuminates highlighted areas, and sculpts shadows.  Its moisturizing formula with hyaluronic acid and Vitamin E leaves your skin feeling hydrated and smooth. Easy application thanks to its XXL tip. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Always Fabulous Concealer 10Ml - Ivory**: 
â­ Apply the concealer to areas you wish to conceal, such as dark circles and blemishes. 
â­ Blend gently with your fingertips for a natural look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Always Fabulous Concealer 10Ml - Ivory**: 
â­ Cyclopentasiloxane, aqua/water/eau, butylene glycol, talc, cetyl peg/ppg-10/1 dimethicone, ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate, trimethylsiloxysilicate, acrylates crosspolymer, cetearyl ethylhexanoate, ammonium acrylates copolymer, dimethicone/vinyl dimethicone crosspolymer, magnesium sulfate, bis-peg/ppg-14/14 dimethicone, polymethyl methacrylate, tribehenin, disteardimonium hectorite, laureth-7, lecithin, parfum/fragrance, phenoxyethanol, trihydroxystearin, chlorphenesin, triethoxycaprylylsilane, alcohol denat., propylene carbonate, dimethiconol, xanthan gum, glycerin, disodium deceth-6 sulfosuccinate, disodium edta, tocopheryl acetate, laureth-30, sodium pca, urea, sodium dehydroacetate, trehalose, benzyl salicylate, alpha-isomethyl ionone, hexylene glycol, linalool, citronellol, bht, polyquaternium-51, caprylyl glycol, triacetin, sodium hyaluronate, pentaerythrityl tetra-di-t-butyl hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [may contain/may contain/+/-:titanium dioxide (ci 77891), iron oxides (ci 77491, ci 77492, ci 77499)].

**Bourjois Volume Glamour Soirs de Paris 01 Gold Eyeshadow Palette** for endless glamour. â­ 8 luminous beige gold and deep black gold shades. â­ Cream-to-powder texture, crease-proof and fade-proof. â­ Highly pigmented colours with matte, shimmer and metallic finishes. â­ Long-lasting wear up to 15 hours. â­ Perfect for day-to-night Parisian glam looks.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Volume Glamour Soirs de Paris 01 Gold Eyeshadow Palette**:
â­ Apply the lightest shade as a base. â­ Blend medium tones into the crease. â­ Deepen the outer corner with a darker shade. â­ Highlight the inner corner and brow bone with a lighter shade. â­ Finish with eyeliner and mascara.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Volume Glamour Soirs de Paris 01 Gold Eyeshadow Palette**:
â­ Mica, Kaolin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride,... (Full ingredient list above).

description_en:
**Bourjois Always Fabulous Foundation 24H - Beige**: Stay fabulous for 24 hours a day with **Bourjois Always Fabulous Foundation 24H - Beige**! This high-coverage foundation boasts a semi-matte finish, ensuring a flawless complexion that lasts all day long.  Its hydrating formula, enriched with SPF 20, keeps your skin moisturized and protected. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Always Fabulous Foundation 24H - Beige**:
â­ Apply **Bourjois Always Fabulous Foundation 24H - Beige** using your fingers, a sponge, or a brush.
â­ Start application in the center of your face.
â­ Blend outwards and upwards for a seamless, flawless finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Always Fabulous Foundation 24H - Beige**:
â­ CYCLOPENTASILOXANE, AQUA / WATER / Water, Butylene Glycol, Talc, Cetyl PEG / PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate, trimethyl, ACRYLATES CROSSPOLYMER, Cetearyl ethylhexanoate, AMMONIUM ACRYLATE COPOLYMER, Dimethicone / VINYL DIMETHICONE CROSSPOLYMER, MAGNESIUM SULFATE, BIS-PEG / PPG-14/14 Dimethicone, polymethyl methacrylate, Tribehenin, disteardimonium hectorite lAURETH-7 LECITHIN, PERFUME / FRAGRANCE, PHENOXYETHANOL, TRIHYDROXYSTEARIN, chlorphenesin, triethoxycaprylylsilane, Alcohol Denat., PROPYLENE CARBONATE, Dimethiconol, XANTHAN GUM, GLYCERIN, DISODIUM Deceth -6 SULFOSUCCINATE, DISODIUM EDTA, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, LAURETH-30, SODIUM PCA, UREA, SODIUM DEHYDROACETATE, TREHALOSE, BENZYL SALICYLATE, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, HEXYLENE GLYCERNYCOLACE, POLYCYLENE GLYCRYCOLACE, 51, BRITISHOLTIN, POLYCYLENE GLYCERNO, 51 SODIUM HYALURONATE,PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRA-DI-T-BUTYL HYDROXYHYDROCINNAMATE, [May Contain / Peut Contenir / + / -: TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)].

**Bourjois Healthy Mix Serum Foundation 54 Beige 30 ml** is a unique liquid foundation that combines the benefits of a serum with the coverage of a foundation. Its vegan formula is enriched with 82% natural origin ingredients, making it ideal for sensitive skin. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix Serum Foundation 54 Beige 30 ml**:
â­ Apply a small amount to your skin and blend evenly. 
â­ Use a sponge or makeup brush for seamless and natural application. 
â­ Buildable coverage for a customized finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Healthy Mix Serum Foundation 54 Beige 30 ml**:
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Isododecane, 2,3-Butanediol, Glycerin, Polyglyceryl-4 Diisostearate/Polyhydroxystearate/Sebacate, Mica, Diisostearoyl Polyglyceryl-3 Dimer Dilinoleate, Sodium Chloride, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Boron Nitride, Saccharomyces Ferment, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Parfum/Fragrance, Tocopheryl Acetate, Trioctyldodecyl Citrate, Xanthan Gum, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Chlorphenesin, Propylene Carbonate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Panthenol, Lauroyl Lysine, Methicone, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Fruit Extract, Tocopherol, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Pantolactone, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499)].

description_en:
**Bourjois Healthy Mix Serum Foundation 53 Light Beige 30 ml** is a fluid foundation enriched with a vegan formula, 82% of its ingredients are naturally derived. It combines the benefits of a serum with the coverage of a liquid foundation. Easy to apply, it blends smoothly onto the skin to conceal imperfections, leaving a unified and radiant complexion. Enriched with cranberry extract, vitamins C, B5, and E to moisturize, nourish, and firm the skin. Comes in an elegant bottle with a dropper.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix Serum Foundation 53 Light Beige 30 ml**:
â­ Apply an appropriate amount to your skin. 
â­ Spread evenly using your fingers or a makeup brush. 
â­ You can add layers for desired coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Healthy Mix Serum Foundation 53 Light Beige 30 ml**:
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Isododecane, 2,3-Butanediol, Glycerin, Polyglyceryl-4 Diisostearate/Polyhydroxystearate/Sebacate, Mica, Diisostearoyl Polyglyceryl-3 Dimer Dilinoleate, Sodium Chloride, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Boron Nitride, Saccharomyces Ferment, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Parfum/Fragrance, Tocopheryl Acetate, Trioctyldodecyl Citrate, Xanthan Gum, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Chlorphenesin, Propylene Carbonate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Panthenol, Lauroyl Lysine, Methicone, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Fruit Extract, Tocopherol, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Pantolactone, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499)].

title_ar: **Ø¨ÙˆØ±Ø¬ÙˆØ§ ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ø£Ø³Ø§Ø³ Ø³ÙŠØ±ÙˆÙ… Ù‡ÙŠÙ„Ø«ÙŠ Ù…ÙŠÙƒØ³ Ø±Ù‚Ù… 51 Ù„Ø§ÙŠØª ÙØ§Ù†ÙŠÙ„Ø§ 30 Ù…Ù„**
description_en:
**Bourjois Healthy Mix Serum Foundation 51 Light Vanilla 30 ml** is a luxurious foundation that combines the benefits of a serum with the coverage of a liquid foundation.  It's formulated with a vegan blend containing 82% ingredients of natural origin. It provides deep hydration, conceals imperfections, and gives you a natural radiance. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix Serum Foundation 51 Light Vanilla 30 ml**: 
â­ Apply an appropriate amount to your skin. 
â­ Spread evenly using your fingers or a makeup brush. 
â­ Use daily for a radiant and healthy complexion. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Healthy Mix Serum Foundation 51 Light Vanilla 30 ml**: 
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Isododecane, 2,3-Butanediol, Glycerin, Polyglyceryl-4 Diisostearate/Polyhydroxystearate/Sebacate, Mica, Diisostearoyl Polyglyceryl-3 Dimer Dilinoleate, Sodium Chloride, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Boron Nitride, Saccharomyces Ferment, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Parfum/Fragrance, Tocopheryl Acetate, Trioctyldodecyl Citrate, Xanthan Gum, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Chlorphenesin, Propylene Carbonate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Panthenol, Lauroyl Lysine, Methicone, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Fruit Extract, Tocopherol, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Pantolactone, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499)].

description_en:
**Bourjois Always Fabulous Compact Powder - 310**, Go from fabulous to Always Fabulous with Bourjois Always Fabulous Powder Foundation. This 2-in-1 must-have gives a skin-like matte finish so lightweight youâ€™ll forget youâ€™re wearing it! It combines long-lasting coverage with mattifying power, lasting all day. Enriched with hydrating hyaluronic acid, anti-pollution Lipochroman, and SPF 20. Available in 8 shades, it hides imperfections and controls shine. It comes in an elegant compact with a mirror and a multi-use sponge.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Always Fabulous Compact Powder - 310**:
â­ For medium coverage: Use the flat side of the sponge.
â­ For full coverage: Use the fluffier side, building gradually.
â­ Tip: Press the powder instead of dragging for a smooth effect.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Always Fabulous Compact Powder - 310**:
MICA, ZINC OXIDE, KAOLIN, ZINC STEARATE, DIMETHICONE, BUTYLOCTYL SALICYLATE, BORON NITRIDE, TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE, SACCHAROMYCES FERMENT, SILICA, TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYLSILANE, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, SODIUM BENZOATE, METHICONE, ALUMINA, LAUROYL LYSINE, PARFUM/FRAGRANCE, SODIUM HYALURONATE, HYDROGEN DIMETHICONE, DIMETHYLMETHOXY CHROMANOL, BENZYL SALICYLATE, [MAY CONTAIN/PEUT CONTENIR/+/-: TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)].

description_en:
**Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation** 52.5 Rose Beige, get a natural glow with flawless coverage. This liquid foundation instantly brightens and evens out your skin tone thanks to a healthy mix of vitamins C, E, and B5. It provides intense hydration that lasts all day long. The lightweight, vegan formula is made with 85% natural ingredients and is available in 22 beautiful shades. **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation** offers buildable coverage, concealing imperfections and signs of fatigue, for a perfect complexion. Enjoy your day with confidence!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation**: 
â­ Apply all over the face using a brush or sponge. 
â­ Focus on the T-zone, blending outwards.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation**:
â­Aqua/Water/Eau, Dicaprylyl Ether, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Glycerin, Corn Starch Modified, Isododecane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Sodium Chloride, TRI(POLYGLYCERYL-3/LAURYL) HYDROGENATED TRILINOLEATE, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Silica, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, 2,3-Butanediol, Propylene Carbonate, Parfum/Fragrance, Mica, Tocopherol, Sodium Benzoate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Chlorphenesin, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Propylene Glycol, Panthenol, Cucumis Melo (Melon) Fruit Extract, Methicone, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Fruit Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Pantolactone, Benzoic Acid, Sorbic Acid, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)]

description_en:
**Rouge Velvet The Lipstick N.46 Honey Nougat - 2.4 gm**, looking to wow with a bold matte lipstick that wonâ€™t smudge? Meet **Bourjois Rouge Velvet The Lipstick**, a gorgeous long-wearing lipstick that will never dry out lips! â­ Moisturizing formula with hydrating waxes, light oils, and rich pigments. â­ Velvety soft, long-lasting matte finish. â­ Intense color in one stroke. â­ Suitable for everyday use. â­ Keeps your lips soft and plump. â­ Stylish and modern design.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Rouge Velvet The Lipstick N.46 Honey Nougat - 2.4 gm**
â­ Apply color to the center of the upper and lower lip. 
â­ Blend color from the outer corners to the center of the lips. 
â­ Optionally, apply lip gloss for extra shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Rouge Velvet The Lipstick N.46 Honey Nougat - 2.4 gm**
â­ ISODODECANE, C9-12 ALKANE, SYNTHETIC WAX, BIS-CARBOXYDECYL DIMETHICONE, PHENYL TRIMETHICONE, MICA, COCO-CAPRYLATE/CAPRATE, PARAFFIN, HDI/TRIMETHYLOL HEXYLLACTONE CROSSPOLYMER, TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE, CERA MICROCRISTALLINA/MICROCRYSTALLINE WAX/CIRE MICROCRYSTALLINE, QUATERNIUM-90 SEPIOLITE, PHENOXYETHANOL, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, UNDECYLENIC ACID, TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYLSILANE, QUATERNIUM-90 MONTMORILLONITE, PARFUM/FRAGRANCE, SILICA, LINALOOL, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL, VANILLIN, HEXYL CINNAMAL, LINALYL ACETATE, [MAY CONTAIN/PEUT CONTENIR/+/-: IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), RED 7 LAKE (CI 15850)].

description_en:
**Bourjois Rouge Velvet The Lipstick** offers a luxurious, bold matte lipstick that lasts. Its unique formula combines hydrating waxes, light oils, and rich pigments for an irresistibly soft, velvety finish.  One swipe of **Bourjois Rouge Velvet The Lipstick** is all you need for perfect, show-stopping lips. Enjoy up to 24 hours of stunning color and comfortable hydration.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Rouge Velvet The Lipstick**:
â­ Apply color to the center of your upper and lower lips.
â­ Blend outwards from the center to the corners of your lips.
â­ Optional: Top with a lip gloss for extra shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Rouge Velvet The Lipstick**:
â­ ISODODECANE, C9-12 ALKANE, SYNTHETIC WAX, BIS-CARBOXYDECYL DIMETHICONE, PHENYL TRIMETHICONE, COCO-CAPRYLATE/CAPRATE, PARAFFIN, HDI/TRIMETHYLOL HEXYLLACTONE CROSSPOLYMER, MICA, TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE, CERA MICROCRISTALLINA/MICROCRYSTALLINE WAX/CIRE MICROCRYSTALLINE, QUATERNIUM-90 SEPIOLITE, PHENOXYETHANOL, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYLSILANE, UNDECYLENIC ACID, QUATERNIUM-90 MONTMORILLONITE, PARFUM/FRAGRANCE, SILICA, LINALOOL, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL, VANILLIN, HEXYL CINNAMAL, LINALYL ACETATE, [MAY CONTAIN/PEUT CONTENIR/+/-: IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), RED 7 LAKE (CI 15850)].

**Bourjois Rouge Velvet Ink Liquid Lipstick-15- Pink**, the ultimate long-lasting matte liquid lipstick.  Its unique formula provides flawless coverage and all-day comfort. With **Bourjois Rouge Velvet Ink Liquid Lipstick-15- Pink**, you'll achieve perfectly pigmented, alluring lips. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Rouge Velvet Ink Liquid Lipstick-15- Pink**:

â­ Fill in the rest of your lips with color.

description_en:
**Bourjois Rouge Velvet Ink #024 20Iv - Pink**, a high-intensity matte liquid lipstick from Bourjois.  Enjoy long-lasting color that keeps your lips flawless all day. Features a precise applicator for sharp definition and even application.  The lightweight, comfortable liquid formula lasts up to 24 hours and is transfer-proof and smudge-proof, even under a face mask.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Rouge Velvet Ink #024 20Iv - Pink**:
â­ Apply lipstick to the center of your upper and lower lips.
â­ Apply lipstick from the outer corners to the center of your upper and lower lips.
â­ Optionally, apply lip gloss over lipstick for extra shine and glamour.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Rouge Velvet Ink #024 20Iv - Pink**:
â­ ISODODECANE, POLYETHYLENE, BIS-CARBOXYDECYL DIMETHICONE, C9-12 ALKANE, POLYPROPYLENE, QUATERNIUM-90 SEPIOLITE, PHENYL TRIMETHICONE, TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE, HDI/TRIMETHYLOL HEXYLLACTONE CROSSPOLYMER, QUATERNIUM-90 MONTMORILLONITE, COCO-CAPRYLATE/CAPRATE, PARFUM/FRAGRANCE, SILICA DIMETHYL SILYLATE, PHENOXYETHANOL, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, LIMONENE, UNDECYLENIC ACID, SILICA, TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYLSILANE, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, [May Contain/May Contain/+/-: MICA, IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), D&C RED NO.7 CALCIUM LAKE (CI 15850), D&C RED NO .6 BARIUM LAKE (CI 15850), FD&C YELLOW NO .5 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 19140), FD&C YELLOW NO .6 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 15985), TITANIUM DIOXIDE (IC 77891), FD&C BLUE NO .1 ALUMINUM LAKE (CI 42090)]

title_en: Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation - 56.5 Maple
title_ar: Ø¨ÙˆØ±Ø¬ÙˆØ§ Ù‡ÙŠÙ„Ø«ÙŠ Ù…ÙƒØ³ ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… Ø£Ø³Ø§Ø³ 56.5 Ù…ÙŠØ¨Ù„
description_en:
**Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation - 56.5 Maple** gives you a natural-looking radiance without compromising on coverage. This liquid foundation instantly brightens and evens your skin tone thanks to a healthy mix of vitamins C, E, and B5. It provides intense hydration that lasts all day long. The lightweight, vegan formula is made with 85% natural ingredients and is available in 22 beautiful shades. Offering buildable coverage, it conceals imperfections and enhances your complexion. Enjoy your day with confidence! Bourjois, a renowned French brand, brings you a touch of Parisian elegance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation - 56.5 Maple**:
â­ Apply the foundation all over your face using a brush or sponge.
â­ Focus on the T-zone, blending outwards for a radiant and flawless complexion.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation - 56.5 Maple**:
â­Aqua/Water/Eau, Dicaprylyl Ether, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Glycerin, Corn Starch Modified, Isododecane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Sodium Chloride, TRI(POLYGLYCERYL-3/LAURYL) HYDROGENATED TRILINOLEATE, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Silica, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, 2,3-Butanediol, Propylene Carbonate, Parfum/Fragrance, Mica, Tocopherol, Sodium Benzoate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Chlorphenesin, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Propylene Glycol, Panthenol, Cucumis Melo (Melon) Fruit Extract, Methicone, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Fruit Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Pantolactone, Benzoic Acid, Sorbic Acid, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)]

description_en:
**Bourjois Rouge Velvet The Lipstick**, a bold matte lipstick that lasts and hydrates! Its unique formula combines moisturizing waxes, light oils, and rich pigments for a smooth, velvety finish. For plump, glamorous lips that last up to 24 hours!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Rouge Velvet The Lipstick**:
â­ Apply colour to the centre of the upper and lower lip.
â­ Blend colour from the outer corners to the centre.
â­ Optionally, add a lip gloss for extra shine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Rouge Velvet The Lipstick**:
â­ ISODODECANE, C9-12 ALKANE, SYNTHETIC WAX, BIS-CARBOXYDECYL DIMETHICONE, PHENYL TRIMETHICONE, MICA, COCO-CAPRYLATE/CAPRATE, PARAFFIN, HDI/TRIMETHYLOL HEXYLLACTONE CROSSPOLYMER, TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE, CERA MICROCRISTALLINA/MICROCRYSTALLINE WAX/CIRE MICROCRYSTALLINE, QUATERNIUM-90 SEPIOLITE, PHENOXYETHANOL, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, UNDECYLENIC ACID, TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYLSILANE, QUATERNIUM-90 MONTMORILLONITE, PARFUM/FRAGRANCE, SILICA, LINALOOL, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL, VANILLIN, HEXYL CINNAMAL, LINALYL ACETATE, [MAY CONTAIN/PEUT CONTENIR/+/-: IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), RED 7 LAKE (CI 15850)].

**Bourjois Foundation Airmat** T02 Vanilla: Achieve a naturally radiant and healthy-looking complexion! â­ Provides a rested, natural glow. â­ Instantly erases imperfections and signs of fatigue. â­ Enriched with Vitamins C, E, and B5. â­ 24-hour hydration. â­ Up to 16 hours of radiance. â­ Non-comedogenic formula. â­ Suitable for all skin types, especially dry skin. â­ Medium to buildable coverage. â­ Melting texture blends seamlessly.

description_en:
**Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Beautifier Foundation 04 Medium** is a light-to-medium coverage liquid foundation that provides a healthy glow and natural radiance. It perfectly conceals skin imperfections and gives a beautiful appearance within two weeks.  Its rich formula contains Vitamins C & E and coconut oil, making it ideal for all skin types. It provides all-day (24-hour) coverage with a comfortable and smooth feel.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Beautifier Foundation 04 Medium**:
â­ Apply a small amount of foundation to your skin.
â­ Spread evenly using a sponge or your fingers.
â­ Apply additional layers as needed for better coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Beautifier Foundation 04 Medium**:
â­ Vitamin C
â­ Vitamin E
â­ Coconut Oil
â­ Natural Pigments

â­ POLYBUTENE, HYDROGENATED POLYISOBUTENE, PARAFFINUM LIQUIDUM/MINERAL OIL/HUILE MINERALE, ETHYLHEXYL PALMITATE, ETHYLENE/PROPYLENE/STYRENE COPOLYMER, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, PHENOXYETHANOL, PARFUM/FRAGRANCE, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, BUTYLENE/ETHYLENE/STYRENE COPOLYMER, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, ARGANIA SPINOSA KERNEL OIL, BENZYL ALCOHOL, LINALOOL, GERANIOL, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, CITRONELLOL, BHT

description_en:
**Bourjois Always Fabulous Concealer**, your perfect partner for a flawless look that lasts all day long! â­ Extreme coverage that lasts up to 24 hours. â­ A true 3-in-1 formula: hides dark circles and imperfections, and illuminates for a natural glow. â­ Enriched with Hyaluronic Acid and Vitamin E for hydrated skin. â­ Easy application thanks to its XXL tip. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Always Fabulous Concealer**: â­ Apply **Bourjois Always Fabulous Concealer** to areas you want to conceal, such as dark circles and imperfections. â­ Blend gently with your fingertips. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Always Fabulous Concealer**: â­ Cyclopentasiloxane, aqua/water/eau, butylene glycol, talc, cetyl peg/ppg-10/1 dimethicone, ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate, trimethylsiloxysilicate, acrylates copolymer, cetearyl ethylhexanoate, ammonium acrylates copolymer, dimethicone/vinyl dimethicone crosspolymer, magnesium sulfate, bis-peg/ppg-14/14 dimethicone, polymethyl methacrylate, tribehenin, disteardimonium hectorite, laureth-7, lecithin, parfum/fragrance, phenoxyethanol, trihydroxystearin, chlorphenesin, triethoxycaprylylsilane, alcohol denat., propylene carbonate, dimethiconol, xanthan gum, glycerin, disodium deceth-6 sulfosuccinate, disodium edta, tocopheryl acetate, laureth-30, sodium pca, urea, sodium dehydroacetate, trehalose, benzyl salicylate, alpha-isomethyl ionone, hexylene glycol, linalool, citronellol, bht, polyquaternium-51, caprylyl glycol, triacetin, sodium hyaluronate, pentaerythrityl tetra-di-t-butyl hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [may contain/peut contenir/+/-:titanium dioxide (ci 77891), iron oxides (ci 77491, ci 77492, ci 77499)].

description_en:
**Bourjois Velvet The Pencil 07 Rouge Es Carmin** is a 2-in-1 matte lip pencil with richly saturated pigments for all-day velvety color and comfort. Its transfer-proof and smudge-proof formula is easy to use thanks to its twist-up design (no sharpener needed!).  Infused with a lightweight oil to leave lips feeling smooth and moisturized. Available in 8 stunning shades.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Velvet The Pencil 07 Rouge Es Carmin**:
â­ Step 1: Precisely define your lips.
â­ Step 2: Fill your lips in one stroke for a flawless matte finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Velvet The Pencil 07 Rouge Es Carmin**:
â­ Isododecane, Caprylyl Methicone, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Synthetic Wax, Diisostearyl Malate, Polybutene, Cetearyl Behenate, Silica, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Mica (CI 77019), Iron Oxides (77491, 77492, 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Red 7 (CI 15850), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985), Red 6 (CI 15850), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Red 30 (CI 73360)].

description_en:
**Bourjois Gloss Fabuleux** - Experience luxurious shine! â­Infused with argan oil and Vitamin E for 24-hour hydration. â­Lightweight, non-sticky finish. â­Beautiful color payoff in a single coat. â­Delightful scent. â­Easy and precise application with angled applicator. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Gloss Fabuleux**: 
â­Apply gloss to the center of your lips. 
â­Evenly distribute using the applicator. 
â­One coat for a natural look, or more for a bolder look. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Gloss Fabuleux**: 
â­Polybutene, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Paraffinum Liquidum/Mineral Oil/Huile Minerale, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Lanolin Oil, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Polyethylene, Phenoxyethanol, Silica, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Parfum/Fragrance, Tocopheryl Acetate, Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Benzyl Alcohol, Linalool, Geraniol, Tin Oxide, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Citronellol, Bht.

description_en:
**Bourjois Always Fabulous R-Bronze Powder** for a naturally tanned and sunny complexion all day long! Opt for a gorgeous look with **Bourjois Always Fabulous R-Bronze Powder**'s bright natural tanning powder finish. This tanning powder reveals your complexion's natural radiance thanks to its mosaic of 6 subtly pearly shades. Its ultra-soft and lightweight texture allows for quick application and long-lasting results. The essential for a good look all year round!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Always Fabulous R-Bronze Powder**:
â­ Apply the powder using our blush brush, tracing a 'B' from the forehead, across the cheekbones, and down to the chin.
â­ Finish with a light brush stroke on the tip of the nose.
â­ Blend lightly and evenly across the entire face.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Always Fabulous R-Bronze Powder**:
â­ Talc, synthetic fluorphlogopite, mica, magnesium myristate, octyldodecyl stearoyl stearate, diisostearyl malate, hydrogenated polyisobutene, phenoxyethanol, caprylyl glycol, benzyl alcohol, silica, hexylene glycol, dehydroacetic acid, aqua/water/eau, alumina, magnesium oxide, maltodextrin, tin oxide [may contain/may contain/+/-: iron oxides (ci 77491, ci 77492, ci 77499), titanium dioxide (ci 77891), manganese violet (ci 77742), carmine (ci75470)].

#Bourjois #AlwaysFabulous #BronzePowder #SaudiMakeup #SaudiBeauty #SunKissedSkin #NaturalMakeup #NaturalTan #Makeup #Beauty

description_en:
**Bourjois Clubbing Waterproof Pencil Disco Ball**, a colorful, long-lasting, and waterproof eyeliner pencil. Its ultra-smooth texture glides effortlessly along the lash line for an intense and vibrant effect. The color stays put all day long, and won't budge until removed with waterproof makeup remover. Formulated with jojoba and cotton oils, providing absolute comfort, even for contact lens wearers. It can be used as eyeliner or eyeshadow. Choose your favorite shade from our vibrant color range.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Clubbing Waterproof Pencil Disco Ball**
â­ Draw a thin line along your upper lash line.
â­ Gently smudge the color with a small brush for a smoky look.
â­ Use it as eyeliner or eyeshadow as desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Clubbing Waterproof Pencil Disco Ball**
â­ Jojoba oils
â­ Cotton oils
â­ Other ingredients to ensure color and longevity.

**Bourjois Always Fabulous Foundation 24H** offers all-day flawless coverage with a comfortable, semi-matte finish that lasts up to 24 hours.  Enriched with hydrating ingredients and SPF 20 sun protection, it keeps your skin looking perfect all day long!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Always Fabulous Foundation 24H**:
â­ Apply **Bourjois Always Fabulous Foundation 24H** using your fingers or a sponge.
â­ Apply foundation to the center of your face.
â­ Blend outwards and upwards for a flawless, even finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Always Fabulous Foundation 24H**:
â­ CYCLOPENTASILOXANE, AQUA / WATER / Water, Butylene Glycol, Talc, Cetyl PEG / PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate, trimethyl, ACRYLATES CROSSPOLYMER, Cetearyl ethylhexanoate, AMMONIUM ACRYLATE COPOLYMER, Dimethicone / VINYL DIMETHICONE CROSSPOLYMER, MAGNESIUM SULFATE, BIS-PEG / PPG-14/14 Dimethicone, polymethyl methacrylate, Tribehenin, disteardimonium hectorite lAURETH-7 LECITHIN, PERFUME / FRAGRANCE, PHENOXYETHANOL, TRIHYDROXYSTEARIN, chlorphenesin, triethoxycaprylylsilane, Alcohol Denat., PROPYLENE CARBONATE, Dimethiconol, XANTHAN GUM, GLYCERIN, DISODIUM Deceth -6 SULFOSUCCINATE, DISODIUM EDTA, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, LAURETH-30, SODIUM PCA, UREA, SODIUM DEHYDROACETATE, TREHALOSE, BENZYL SALICYLATE, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, HEXYLENE GLYCERNYCOLACE, POLYCYLENE GLYCRYCOLACE, 51, BRITISHOLTIN, POLYCYLENE GLYCERNO, 51 SODIUM HYALURONATE,PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRA-DI-T-BUTYL HYDROXYHYDROCINNAMATE, [May Contain / Peut Contenir / + / -: TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)].

description_en:
**Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation - 51.2 Golden Vanilla** gives you healthy-looking skin without compromising on coverage. This liquid foundation instantly brightens and evens out your skin tone with a healthy mix of vitamins C, E, and B5. Its lightweight, vegan formula is made with 85% natural ingredients and is available in 22 beautiful shades. **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation - 51.2 Golden Vanilla** offers buildable coverage, concealing imperfections and signs of tiredness for a flawless complexion all day long. Enjoy your day with confidence!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation - 51.2 Golden Vanilla**:
â­ Apply all over the face using a brush or sponge.
â­ Focus on the T-zone, blending outwards.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Foundation - 51.2 Golden Vanilla**:
â­Aqua/Water/Eau, Dicaprylyl Ether, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Glycerin, Corn Starch Modified, Isododecane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Sodium Chloride, TRI(POLYGLYCERYL-3/LAURYL) HYDROGENATED TRILINOLEATE, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Silica, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, 2,3-Butanediol, Propylene Carbonate, Parfum/Fragrance, Mica, Tocopherol, Sodium Benzoate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Chlorphenesin, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Propylene Glycol, Panthenol, Cucumis Melo (Melon) Fruit Extract, Methicone, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Fruit Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Pantolactone, Benzoic Acid, Sorbic Acid, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)]

description_en:
**Bourjois Foundation Airmat** gives you a rested, natural glow that will make your skin look healthy. With its blend of vitamins C, E and B5, it instantly erases imperfections and signs of fatigue and boosts skin radiance for a fresh-looking complexion. Your skin will be 70% more radiant than bare skin for up to 16 hours and will stay hydrated for up to 24 hours. Thanks to its non-comedogenic formula, it won't clog your pores. Its melting texture blends perfectly into the skin and stays comfortable all day. The medium buildable coverage gives a natural semi-matte finish immediately after application. **Bourjois Foundation Airmat** is your new secret weapon to always look fresh and radiant.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Foundation Airmat**: 
â­ Use your fingers or a sponge to apply the foundation.
â­ Apply the foundation to the center of your face.
â­ Blend the formula outwards and upwards for a flawless finish while erasing any imperfections.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Foundation Airmat**:
â­ Vitamins C, E, and B5
â­ Hyaluronic acid derivative

description_en:
**Bourjois Healthy Mix Serum Foundation 57 Bronze 30 ml** is a luxurious serum foundation packed with benefits. â­ 82% natural origin vegan formula. â­ Combines serum skincare benefits with the coverage of a liquid foundation. â­ Easy to apply and blends seamlessly onto the skin. â­ Conceals minor imperfections, leaving a flawless, radiant complexion. â­ Enriched with cranberry extract, vitamins C, B5 and E to moisturize, nourish, and firm. â­ Comes in a glass bottle with a dropper.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix Serum Foundation 57 Bronze 30 ml**: 
â­ Apply a suitable amount to your skin. â­ Blend evenly using a sponge or your fingertips. â­ Apply additional layers for optimal coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Healthy Mix Serum Foundation 57 Bronze 30 ml**: 
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Isododecane, 2,3-Butanediol, Glycerin, Polyglyceryl-4 Diisostearate/Polyhydroxystearate/Sebacate, Mica, Diisostearoyl Polyglyceryl-3 Dimer Dilinoleate, Sodium Chloride, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Boron Nitride, Saccharomyces Ferment, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Parfum/Fragrance, Tocopheryl Acetate, Trioctyldodecyl Citrate, Xanthan Gum, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Chlorphenesin, Propylene Carbonate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Panthenol, Lauroyl Lysine, Methicone, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Fruit Extract, Tocopherol, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Pantolactone, [May Contain/Peut Contenir/+/-: Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499)].

description_en:
**Bourjois Foundation Airmat** gives you a rested, natural glow for a healthy-looking complexion.  Its blend of vitamins C, E, and B5 instantly erases imperfections and signs of fatigue. Experience 70% more radiance than bare skin, lasting up to 16 hours, with 24-hour hydration. The non-comedogenic formula won't clog pores, leaving your skin healthy and radiant. **Bourjois Foundation Airmat** provides medium, buildable coverage with a natural, semi-matte finish. Its smooth texture blends effortlessly, ensuring all-day comfort. Discover the secret to a radiant and glowing complexion with **Bourjois Foundation Airmat**. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Foundation Airmat**: 
â­ Use your fingers or a makeup sponge to apply the foundation. 
â­ Apply the foundation to the center of your face. 
â­ Blend outwards and upwards for a flawless finish. 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Foundation Airmat**: 
â­ Vitamins C, E, and B5 
â­ Hyaluronic acid derivative

**Bourjois Fabuleux Ink Lacquer 03 Moka'ddiction** - A liquid lip ink with a glossy finish that lasts up to 8 hours. Treat your lips to fabulous colors all day long with **Bourjois Fabuleux Ink Lacquer 03 Moka'ddiction**! It features a light and comfortable texture, with a formula enriched with moisturizing sunflower oil. It provides a perfect shine without stickiness. Its application is easy and precise thanks to its fine tip.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Fabuleux Ink Lacquer 03 Moka'ddiction**:
â­ Gently apply to your lips using the precise applicator.
â­ For a glossy finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Fabuleux Ink Lacquer 03 Moka'ddiction**:
â­ Aqua/Water/Water, Octyldodecanol, Isopentyldiol, Trimethylsiloxyphenyl Dimethicone, Phenyl Trimethicone, Ethylcellulose, Acrylamide/Sodium Acryloyldimethyltaurate Copolymer, C13-14 Isoalkane, Sodium Benzoate, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Perfume. /Fragrance, PPG-26-Buteth-26, Laureth-7, Potassium Sorbate, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Citric Acid, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Disodium EDTA, Panthenol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Hyalurononate, Stevia Rebaudiana Leaf/Stem Extract, Benzyl Alcohol, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Linalool, Geraniol, Polysorbate 60, Sorbitan Isostearate, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Citronellol, Silica, [May Contain/May Contain/+/-: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Red 33 (CI 17200), Red 40 (CI 16035), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Yellow 6 (CI 15985), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Red 22 (CI 45380), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410)].

title_en: **Bourjois Liner Feutre Black**
title_ar: **Ø¨ÙˆØ±Ø¬ÙˆØ§ Ù…Ø­Ø¯Ø¯ Ø¹ÙŠÙˆÙ† ÙÙŠÙˆØªØ´Ø±-Ø£Ø³ÙˆØ¯**
description_en:
**Bourjois Liner Feutre Black** takes the difficulty out of defining your eyes. Its soft, precise felt tip glides over the eyelid, creating a bold, graphic line. The saturated, deep-black formula lasts up to 24 hours for a flawless look all day long. **Bourjois Liner Feutre Black** is perfect to achieve an intense line quickly and easily, even for beginners. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Liner Feutre Black**:
â­ Draw a thin diagonal line out to the end of the wing.
â­ Make a straight line from the tip of the wing to the middle of your eyelid.
â­ Thicken the line at the inner eyelid.
â­ Fill in the outline.
â­ Always treat applicator with the same sanitary care you give your eyes.
â­ Reserve it for personal use.
â­ Cap tightly after each use.
â­ Do not use any eye cosmetic if your eye is irritated, injured, or infected.
â­ Consult with an eye doctor in case of an eye injury.

description_en:
**Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Concealer - 56.5 Maple** gives you a flawless, healthy-looking complexion. This concealer provides perfect coverage for blemishes, fatigue signs, and dark circles, with a vegan formula enriched with Vitamins C, E, and B5. **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Concealer - 56.5 Maple** features a lightweight and smooth texture that glides effortlessly onto the skin, providing up to 24 hours of hydration. Available in nine shades to match all skin tones. Enjoy radiant, healthy skin all day long!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Concealer - 56.5 Maple**:
â­ Apply an appropriate amount of concealer to areas needing coverage.
â­ Gently blend using your fingertips or a makeup brush.
â­ Blend thoroughly for a natural look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Concealer - 56.5 Maple**:
â­ Aqua/Water/Eau
â­ Corn Starch Modified
â­ Dicaprylyl Ether
â­ Dicaprylyl Carbonate
â­ Isododecane
â­ Glycerin
â­ Trimethylsiloxysilicate
â­ Silica
â­ Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)
â­ Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499) [May Contain]

description_en:
**Bourjois Eyeshadow Palette Volume Glamour 01- Multicolors** is a versatile eyeshadow palette perfect for creating a natural look or a full glam makeup. â­ 6 ultra-pigmented shades with a creamy-powder texture that's easy to apply and lasts all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Eyeshadow Palette Volume Glamour 01- Multicolors**:
â­ Apply the light shade as a base all over the eyelid.
â­ Apply the medium shade to the outer corner of the eye to intensify the look.
â­ Apply the dark shade along the lash line to emphasize the look.
â­ Create your own unique look with many options available.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Eyeshadow Palette Volume Glamour 01- Multicolors**:
â­ Mica, talc, dimethicone, caprylic/capric triglyceride, magnesium stearate, phenoxyethanol, cocos nucifera (coconut) oil, caprylyl glycol, synthetic fluorphlogopite, aloe barbadensis leaf extract, alumina, triethoxycaprylylsilane, tinoxide, [may contain/may contain/+/-:iron oxides (ci 77491, ci 77492, ci 77499), titanium dioxide (ci 77891), ultramarines (ci 77007),manganese violet (ci 77742), carmine (ci 75470), d&c red no. 30 lake (ci 73360), d&c red no.7 calcium lake (ci 15850)].

description_en:
**Bourjois Foundation Airmat** - Achieve a natural, radiant glow that lasts all day long. This foundation provides a flawless base with a rich formula containing Vitamins C, E, and B5, helping to conceal imperfections and signs of fatigue while significantly boosting your skin's radiance. You'll experience 70% more radiant skin for up to 16 hours, with hydration that lasts up to 24 hours. Its non-comedogenic formula makes it suitable for all skin types. Choose **Bourjois Foundation Airmat** for healthy, radiant skin all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Foundation Airmat**: 
â­ Use your fingers or a makeup sponge to apply evenly to your face. 
â­ Distribute the foundation from the center of your face outwards. 
â­ Blend well for a natural, flawless look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Foundation Airmat**: 
â­ Vitamins C, E, and B5 
â­ Hyaluronic acid derivative

description_en:
**Bourjois Gloss Fabuleux - 12 Truly Grapeful** is an ultra-shiny, non-sticky, lightweight lip gloss enriched with argan oil and vitamin E. It delivers up to 24 hours of hydration and absolute comfort. Available in 9 glossy shades, including the vibrant 12 Truly Grapeful. Its delicious scent enhances your smile effortlessly.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Gloss Fabuleux - 12 Truly Grapeful**:
â­ Apply the lip gloss to the center of your upper and lower lips.
â­ Use the soft applicator to glide the gloss evenly across your lips.
â­ Add a single coat for a natural shine or layer for a more intense look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Gloss Fabuleux - 12 Truly Grapeful**:
â­ Polybutene
â­ Hydrogenated Polyisobutene
â­ Paraffinum Liquidum/Mineral Oil/Huile Minerale
â­ Ethylhexyl Palmitate
â­ Lanolin Oil
â­ Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer
â­ Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate
â­ Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate
â­ Polyethylene
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ Silica
â­ Synthetic Fluorphlogopite
â­ Parfum/Fragrance
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate
â­ Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer
â­ Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane
â­ Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil
â­ Benzyl Alcohol
â­ Linalool
â­ Geraniol
â­ Tin Oxide
â­ Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone
â­ Citronellol
â­ BHT.

description_en:
**Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Nail Polish Plumplumpidou 340**, discover the new Healthy Mix Vegan & Clean 1 Second Nail Polish by Bourjois - 100% vegan from formula to brush. Itâ€™s a clean, caring beauty with a French accent. The formula contains 77% natural ingredients and is free from 16 nasties including sulfates, acetone, and phthalates. Yet, thereâ€™s no compromise on performance or long-lasting wear. Delivering up to 5 days of ultra-shiny and intense color, it is also quick-drying and easy to apply. The panoramic brush perfectly adapts to the shape of the nail for one second per nail application â€“ one coat is all you need.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Nail Polish Plumplumpidou 340**:
â­ Apply one coat of **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Nail Polish Plumplumpidou 340** to clean, dry nails.
â­ Allow to dry completely before applying a second coat, if desired.
â­ Use a gentle nail polish remover to remove.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Bourjois Healthy Mix Clean Nail Polish Plumplumpidou 340**:
â­ 77% natural ingredients.
â­ Free from 16 nasties (sulfates, acetone, phthalates).
